summary: The Gods of War DLC introduces two challenging events and two highly personalized legendary sets! Complete the trials of the God of War, Gortus, and the Goddess of Victory, Alyanas . Are you and your gladiators worthy of becoming the chosen champions of the gods?

name: Blackthorn Arena: The Roar from the North
summary: The Roar from the North DLC introduces a brand new story, player could unlock new skills as well as Kirrmans Legendary armors. The Kirrmans with the shapeshift ability from the North is coming to Freelands. Be Prepared!

name: Blackthorn Arena: Path of Kiren
summary: The Path of Kiren DLC introduces a brand new story, player could unlock new skills as well as Samurai Legendary armors. The ronin from the distant eastern lands is coming to Freelands. Be Prepared!

name: Black Desert: Conqueror Edition
summary:
Black Desert supports backwards-compatibility on Xbox Series X|S.

Black Desert: Conqueror Edition includes the following:
- Black Desert (Full Game)
- Conqueror Edition Item Pack: Value Pack (90 Days), Pearl Box - 3,000, Inventory +16 Expansion Coupon, Secret Book of Old Moon (15 Days), Horse Emblem: Tier 7 White Horse (Female), [Event] Premium Outfit Box, Polar Bear, Hedgehog, Wizard Gosphy, Trainer's Flute (Permanent), Contract: [Transaction Maid] Fairy Irene, Pearl Shop 20% DC Coupon

Note: The item package included in the bundle will only be sent to the server that corresponds to the region where the product is purchased.

name: Bloomee
summary: Delve into a virtual space free from the stresses of work, school and general day-to-day struggles. At times when it seems like we can't keep up with how fast the world is moving, take a load off and witness the worlds of Bloomee and satiate your desire to escape your current reality.

name: Blox
summary: Blox is a online block stacking game. Play against friends and compete for the top spots on the leaderboard.

name: Blasphemous II
summary: The Penitent One awakens as Blasphemous 2 joins him once again in an endless struggle against The Miracle. Dive into a perilous new world filled with mysteries and secrets to discover, and tear your way through monstrous foes that stand between you and your quest to end the cycle one and for all.

name: Blasphemous: Wounds of Eventide
summary: Join the Penitent One on his final trial in Blasphemous, with the introduction of the game's final DLC chapter, Wounds of Eventide.

name: Black Morph
summary: As a Black Morph, use your ability to turn into living things to make your way through an enchanting forest.

name: Blood for Poppies
summary: Uncover the dark and tortured legacy of mad science in this psychological horror interactive novel about entrapment and the lingering echoes of trauma.

name: Blood Safari
summary: Blood Safari is a fast paced 3rd person shooter in which you will gain no levels, no unlocks, no permanent account upgrades... You just drop in and start slaughtering.

name: Black Desert: Explorer Edition
summary:
Black Desert supports backward-compatibility on Xbox Series X|S.

Black Desert: Explorer Edition includes the following:
- Black Desert (Full Game)
- Explorer Edition Item Pack: Value Pack (60 Days), Pearl Box - 2,000, Polar Bear, Horse Emblem: Tier 7 White Horse (Female), [Event] Classic Outfit Box, Pearl Shop 20% DC Coupon

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 3: Hakumen/NaotoShirogane/Vatista
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 3 to add three new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 3 contains Hakumen from BlazBlue, Naoto Shirogane from Persona 4 Arena, and Vatista from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 1: Platinum/Kanji/Orie
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 1 to add three new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 1 contains Platinum the Trinity from BlazBlue, Kanji Tatsumi from Persona 4 Arena, and Orie Ballardiae from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 4: Izayoi/Mitsuru/Merkava
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 4 to add three new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 4 contains Izayoi from BlazBlue, Mitsuru Kirijo from Persona 4 Arena, and Merkava from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 2: Jubei/Aegis/Carmine
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 2 to add three new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 2 contains Jubei from BlazBlue, Aegis from Persona 4 Arena, and Carmine from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 7: Heart/NaotoKurogane/Teddie/Seth
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 7 to add four new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 7 contains Heart Aino from Arcana Heart, Naoto Kurogane from BlazBlue, Teddie from Persona 4 Arena, and Seth from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 5: Mai/Akihiko/Yuzuriha
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 5 to add three new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 5 contains Mai Natsume from BlazBlue, Akihiko Sanada from Persona 4 Arena, and Yuzuriha from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character Pack Vol. 6: Nine/Labrys/Mika
summary: Download Cross Tag Character Pack 6 to add three new fighters to your roster! Character Pack 6 contains Nine the Phantom from BlazBlue, Labrys from Persona 4 Arena, and Mika from Under Night In-Birth.

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character: Yang
summary: Download and play as Yang Xiao Long, member of Team RWBY and wielder of the Dual Ranged Shot Gauntlets, Ember Celica. Yang didn't come here to play, she came to lay the smackdown on all who challenge her!

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Character: Blake
summary: Download and play as Blake Belladonna, member of Team RWBY and wielder of the powerful Gambol Shroud. Blake's unique skills and powerful attacks make her an ideal tag partner in combat!

name: Bless Unleashed: Exalted Founder's Pack
summary: Purchase the [Exalted Founder's Pack] to obtain exclusive items to start your journey in the world of Lumios!

name: Bless Unleashed: Deluxe Founder's Pack
summary: Purchase the [Deluxe Founder's Pack] to obtain exclusive items to start your journey in the world of Lumios! (Available limited time only)

name: Bloodborne: Limited Hunter Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Premium SteelBook Game Case,
Premuim Art Book,
Digital Soundtrack,
Custom Theme,
DLC “Top Hat”,
“Bandage” and ”Fedora” Messenger Skins

name: Blacksea Odyssey: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Blacksea Odyssey Collector’s Box,
Blacksea Odyssey Game Disc (region free),
Blacksea Odyssey Original Soundtrack,
Blacksea Odyssey Numbered Certificate,
Blacksea Odyssey Full Color Manual

name: Bloody Walls: The Darkness
summary: How do you survive in a bunker infested with zombies given that your flashlight is the only source of light? This DLC will answer this question for you.

name: Bloody Walls: Hardcore
summary: This add-on does have NPC's, "find an item" tasks and inventory management. All you have are some bottles of antidote and some entry-level weapon sets you can choose from.

name: Bloody Walls: Hardcore x2
summary: The DLC contains: 5 levels (DLC - "Hardcore"); + 5 levels

name: Blair Witch: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Blair Witch
- Luxury Box
- Original Soundtrack on CD (15 tracks)
- Artbook (All colored 52 pages)
- DLC Ticket

name: Blacksad: Under the Skin - Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Collector's Box
Game: Blacksad: Under the Skin
Artbook
Blacksad Resin Figurine

name: Blazblue: Cross Tag Battle - Limited Box
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Blazblue: Cross Tag Battle
Special Box
Art Book
DLC: Additional character All-in-One pack (While supplies last)
Acrylic stand

name: Blackberry the Witch: Journey
summary: Embark on an adventure with the young witch Blackberry!

name: Blasphemer
summary: Blasphemer is a project to create a free software/open source Heretic IWAD file. Combined with the free source code, this results in a complete Doom-based game. This is the Heretic equivalent to Freedoom.

name: Blocked Out: Red V Blue
summary: Destroy, build, fight, and capture! Welcome to a voxel team-based first-person shooter that lets you dictate how you play. Blocked Out: Red V Blue gives you the opportunity to battle it out with 15 other players to see which team has what it takes to prevail!

name: Blaster Master Zero Trilogy: MetaFight Chronicle - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Blaster Master Zero Trilogy: MetaFight Chronicle
Artbook
Soundtrack CD

name: Blue Rider: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Blue Rider game disc
- Soundtrack CD
- Serial Numbered Certificate
- Collector's Box

name: Bleed + Bleed 2: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Collector’s Box
- Bleed Game Disc
- Bleed 2 Game Disc
- Bleed Original Soundtrack
- Numbered Certificate

name: Blue Reflection: Premium Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Blue Reflection
- Blue Reflection Official Soundtrack (3CD)
- Booklet
- Cloth Poster
- Puromaido Set (3 pcs)
- School Calendar

name: Blind Quest: The Frost Demon
summary: Blind Quest - The Frost Demon is a stand-alone adventure with 70 new maps in 7 different scenarios to explore and interact with! Fight new monsters and try to slay Killyus the Frost Demon. An adventure audiogame for real adventurers! Explore and fight in the magical world of Blind Quest 2!

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Ver 2.0 Expansion Pack
summary: Big update Ver 2.0 is now released! Below items are included in this DLC: 9 new characters, new avatars, icons, and VS plates, 4 new colors to choose for all 53 characters, new scenarios in story mode.

name: Blind Postman
summary: Help blind postman, who sees only walls, to collect all the letters and to find an exit out of labyrinth.

name: BlackJack Math
summary: BlackJack Math is a game about mixing the cards to match the correct formula in order to get 21 as a result. Swap the cards in order to find the correct order to solve the puzzles.

name: BlockLock
summary: BlockLock is a third-person 3D puzzle game unlike any other! You take the role of an android, tasked with returning the blocks to their matching home tiles. Walk up to a block, grab it and push it. Sounds simple? It's anything but! You'll need to think ahead or you may box yourself in!

name: Bleak End
summary: Bleak end is a hand-drawn poetic game about a girl got lost in a suddenly faded reality. Wander around through the labyrinth of entangled thoughts and sorrow. Is there an end to it?

name: Blon
summary: Blon is a cute pixel-art 2D platformer game. Unlock spells, heroes and weapons, fight monsters and bosses and explore an unknown world in hopes of rescuing your family.

name: Blaster Master Zero 2: Kanna Raising Simulator
summary: Adds the ultra weird mini-game "Kanna Raising Simulator" to the EXTRA menu. Capture a variety of materials to make fertilizer and grow your very own Kanna! There are loads of potential Kannas to grow, and you can check out every one you've completed in "Kanna's Strangallery"!

name: Blob.io
summary: The Most EPIC Blobs vs Blobs Online Action battles out here!

name: Blind_
summary: This game is a grid-based puzzle with a twist: The layout of each level is hidden from you at the start of every room. 60 levels filled with various puzzles. Make determinations on your surroundings, project your moves, utilize mechanics of teleportation, wraparounds and more!

name: Bloopy & Droopy
summary: A Game Boy style 8-bit platformer, giving you an old-school experience in which you can switch characters at any time and use your digging skills to make your way through the terrain!

name: Blaster Master Zero II: Copen from "Luminous Avenger iX"
summary: Adds COPEN from "Luminous Avenger iX" as a playable character in EX Character Mode. Blast mutant scum across the galaxy alongside your robo-partner, Lola!

name: Blaster Master Zero II: Empress from "Dragon Marked For Death"
summary: Adds EMPRESS from "Dragon Marked for Death" as a playable character in EX Character Mode.

name: Bloodland
summary: Bloodland is an online multiplayer combat game, based around magic and spell-casting. Join a team, play as different roles, and customize your character's attributes lead your team to victory. Battle across different landscapes in online matchmaking.

name: BlasterBeat
summary: Blasterbeat is a game that combines the mechanics of a third-person session shooter and rhythm game. Battles take place in music arenas for up to 8 players.

name: Bloodsports.TV: Blood Brawl
summary: BLOOD BRAWL is the first free DLC for Bloodsports.TV, including two new maps, four new items, a new boss as well as a brand new game mode: Blood Brawl!

name: Blades of Time: Dismal Swamp
summary: Michelle rushes into the Temple of Dragons to prevent Ayumi from joining Keeper of Chaos when her shuttle suddenly crashes in the middle of Dismal Swamp.

name: Blackhole: Challenge Vault
summary: Take everything you have experienced to the next level! Enter the Challenge Vault, a special simulation for Endera agents, and participate with others in a secret training protocol. Select your favourite character and beat the records set by other players in this brand new online mode.

name: Blackhole: Testing Laboratory
summary: Our hero just signed up for the Endera's suicide mission, but he wants to be captain of the mission. What really happens and why he ended up as the coffee-guy? Try to uncover this secret!

name: Black Smith 2
summary: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

name: Bloodwash
summary: A serial killer is terrorizing the city, and Sara's deadbeat boyfriend hasn't done the laundry. Can Sara survive a late-night trip to the laundromat, or will the Womb Ripper perform an early delivery?

name: Blockee
summary: Blockee is a simple slide-puzzle game. Just slide the blocks!

name: Blaster Master Zero: EX Character - Shantae
summary:
Shantae joins the underground adventure as a playable character in EX Character Mode!
Fascinate the mutant hordes with the power of magic and fancy dances!

This unlocks the EX Character "Shantae."

name: Blaster Master Zero: EX Character - Shovel Knight
summary:
Shovel Knight joins the underground adventure as a playable character in EX Character Mode! Steel thy shovel and dig your way through the depths of the planet!

This unlocks the EX Character "Shovel Knight."

name: Blue Snake Adventures: Master Level
summary: Blue Snake Adventures: Master level is a dlc for blue snake adventures base game.

name: Black Knight: Milena
summary: A gifted rookie Black Knight Milena is making her great debut!! …Or at least that was her goal before she messed up on her mission because of her inexperience. And so began her training to become a better Black Knight with Master Celia! If only her behavior could also be improved…

name: Block Smash
summary: Choose your powerup, ball, and paddle and face off against a variety of blocks in this game inspired by Breakout!

name: Blood Rage: Digital Edition - Gods of Asgard
summary: Gods of Ásgard DLC brings 7 gods: Loki, Heimdall, Tyr, Odin, Frigga, Hel and Thor to the board. Two of them, randomly chosen, will be present in each game, radically changing the rule of the region they are in.

name: Blood Rage: Digital Edition - Mystics of Midgard
summary: Known by many names (Seiðmenn, Völva, Vísendakona, etc.) and possessed of different powers granted by their connection to the gods, these warrior-shamans will be a boon to any clan able to recruit them!

name: Blaze
summary: Blaze is a 3rd person over the shoulder action adventure game where you a budding fire elemental seek to cleanse your fellow elementals from the corruption of humanity.

name: Blood and Zombies
summary: Blood and Zombies is a thrilling first-person shooter with horror elements and lots of zombies. You need to withstand as many waves of zombies as possible, by building up defenses and heavy weapons, using a large amount of guns.

name: Block Busters: Local Party
summary: This DLC contains :Local Play!All Cosmetics present & future!.. and our eternal love!

name: Black Sun
summary: Command your neural-network-powered assistant to fly a space ship through a 2D open world. Fight real-time space battles, upgrade your vessel and solve the conspiracy behind the Black Sun. Or if you decide so - just enjoy transporting space-made peach pastries.

name: Blood & Gold: Caribbean! - The Zombiest Adventures
summary: What would happen if a zombie apocalypse had occurred in 1650? Controlling a small group of survivors, you will have to do road robbery, hunt for gunpowder and constantly search for food. Welcome to The Zombiest Adventures!

name: Blossom Tales 2: The Minotaur Prince
summary:
The Minotaur King has returned...and it's all your fault! Lily's back for a new "classic" action-adventure set hundreds of years after The Sleeping King!

Grandpa’s latest tale takes you on a journey through haunted forests, pirate shores, and other mysterious lands across a vast open-world! Charming towns, terrible enemies, tricky puzzles, and powerful weapons await you.

Enjoy a “story within a story” as Grandpa narrates exciting moments throughout Lily’s incredible adventure.

Will you help Lily defeat the Minotaur King and save her brother?

name: Blades of the Three Kingdoms: Return
summary:
The super-popular action mobile game "Blades of The Three Kingdoms: Return", which has won a big game award and has been downloaded more than 3 million times in Korea, will be directly distributed by ACTION SQUARE Co., LTD!

More than 200 original skills! Reproduce the 81 legendary generals of the Three Kingdoms!
Different from the quality of the action mobile game of The Romance of the Three Kingdoms so far, the well-known generals of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms are completely original and recreated! Not to mention popular generals such as Guan Yu, Zhang Fei, Zhao Yun, Ma Chao, Zhuge Liang, Liu Bei, Cao Cao, Sun Quan, Lu Bu, and Diao Chan, as well as the original generals of "The Blade of The Three Kingdoms: Return" are also worth looking forward to! Enjoy the action duel of the Three Kingdoms that you can't experience in other games!

In addition to the general modes, there are mystic beast battles, infinite battles, one-on-one duels, alliance battles, national battles, 3v3 PVP mode for betting on honor and self-esteem, arena 10v10 fighting mode, and up to 50v50 alliance battle mode, etc. Various ways to play! Get the strongest generals and aim to dominate the world through the multi-mode that you can’t get tired of playing!

Looking forward to your heroic performance!

name: Block
summary:
A successful arcade game released by Taito in 1977. It is essentially a Breakout clone/variation.

The game was originally released in a tabletop format, known as T.T Block in black-and-white with a color overlay, similiar to the original Breakout. A color version and a pure black-and-white version of the tabletop both followed in 1978, as well as a stand-up cabinet. The game would also recieve sequels in 1978's Super Block and 1979's ZunZun Block.

name: Black Sheep
summary: Black Sheep is a 2D horizontal scrolling puzzle game, you will play a sophomore student in the flooded school ruins to explore the adventure, trace the shadow of the past, so that those buried in the bottom of the river of evil to see the light of day.

name: Blue Reflection: Second Light - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Blue Reflection: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following:

- Blue Reflection: Second Light base game
- Hoshinomiya Extreme Makeover Swimsuit – Costume Set
- Uniform Alt. Color – Costume Set
- Extreme School Makeover Kit
- Jump Start Fragment Set
- Special Photo Frame – Bulletin Board: Display your fondest memories on a bulletin board. The Photo Frame “Bulletin Board” is added.

name: Blood Impact
summary: Fight for your escape from this mysterious lab. Use your blood powers to achieve your goal in this action adventure game! But don’t forget, blood is vital...

name: Blues and Bullets: Episode 2
summary: Blues and Bullets is a dark and violent crime thriller. Set in an alternative Eliot Ness & Al Capone story, Blues and Bullets blends a stunning script with detective work to deliver an amazing interactive experience.

name: Blade of Darkness
summary: Blade of Darkness is a hardcore fantasy action-adventure with unique combat mechanics and role-playing elements that pioneered the “soulsborne” genre. Pick one of four characters to hack and slash through a gory quest to save the world from the forces of Chaos.

name: BlueGlow: Operation Blue Rain
summary: Operation Blue Rain[i/] has you sneak into a military base to steal the enemy's data. Quietly enter and move through the base. Kill all of the enemy, or sneak past them, it's all up to the player. Steal the data and try to escape. This is the first of the Operations with more coming soon.

name: Black Border: Border Simulator
summary: In this game, you play as a border officer of the border cross entry and exit gates, who supposed to check the passengers' papers and stop the smuggling of illegal items and bribery. As a border officer, you have to check entrants' papers and use all of your objects and tools to arresting people like terrorists, wanted criminals, smugglers, and passengers with forged or stolen documents.

name: Blast Soccer
summary: Blast Soccer combines intense arcade gameplay, gorgeous retro style, soccer and explosions. Score goals as fast as you can while blowing up your enemies! Avoid the ever increasing volley of bad guys as you score with soccer balls, footballs, basketballs, and Blast Balls. Complete missions to unlock new ball types such as the disco ball, mega ducky, and the cube. Blast Soccer's unique retro vector art style will take you back to the arcade’s golden days.

name: Blade Kitten: Episode 2
summary:
Episode 2 continues the story of Kit Ballard, Bounty Hunter, set three months after the original game’s cliffhanger ending. Kit has been living with her once bounty/rival, Justice Kreel, and now seeks to unravel the mysterious threads of the Magasse and their involvement in the troubles on Hollow Wish.

DLC includes 5 additional levels, 3 new blades and 15 unique costumes.

name: Blosics
summary:
Shoot at massive structures built from colored blocks and make them drop off the screen. It sounds simple at first but beware - the blocks are alive! They can talk and they have some serious tricks up their sleeves. Use all your power to get rid of them! Welcome to the vivid world of Blosics, filled with tons of exciting challenges.

MIGHTY POWER BALL ARSENAL
Use up to 13 different power balls to fulfill your mission. Each of the balls has unique abilities like the female attract ball, drawing the attention of macho blocks to pull them away. Or the psychic ball, pushing away blocks with additional telekinesis force. Find the right strategy to get rid of as many blocks as possible. It´s a blast!

name: Blyss
summary:
Travel through Beautiful mountains, serene valleys and harsh deserts solving Blyss' unique and self-evolving puzzles.
The endless puzzle adventure along with musical ambient themes will keep you hooked for hours as you write your own high scoring saga.

name: Bloody Layne
summary: Layne has been bitten by a vampire has to survive his way to his creator. Decide to become human again or stay a vampire! Will you be good or evil? Find out in Bloody Layne, an RPG action game with fully voiced dialogue (English & German).

name: Blockbusters
summary:
Blockbusters is a competitive online multiplayer PvP third person hero shooter with excellent 3D graphics and enthralling gameplay.

Choose a hero with your favorite fighting and killing style in this TPS - melee, assault or sniper. Equip most powerful gun, synergetic skills and go fight other players worldwide in fast-paced matches.

Team up with other players and defend your fortress. Play this third person online PvP shooter now! Complete missions, climb up PvP ranks, get guns and equipment as rewards, strengthen your heroes after every online battle full of intense shooting.

Choose your favorite class: sniper, special ops soldier, heavy lubber, street gangster or pro killer. Try all of them and decide who is more effective in defeating your enemies on the battle ground.

Decide what is your favorite weapon: machine gun, hunting rifle, bow, assault rifle, crowbar, knife, axe, pistol. Equip a grenade, health pack, helmet, kevlar.

If you like 3D hero shooters, special ops games, team gameplay or fortress defense you will become a fan of Blockbusters. The brand new third person multiplayer hero shooter outshines all other FPS shooters.

Join the league of shooting masters. Define your winning strategy and combat tactics.

Good luck, have fun!

name: Block vs. Block
summary: Block vs Block is a puzzle game allowing you play against a computer or a human (iPad only). Featuring 16 different shapes, 4 different special items, and VS mode. It has very attractive graphics and is very easy to control with very strong computer players.

name: Blitzkrieg Fire
summary:
Blitzkrieg Fire is a turn-based strategic wargame set in the European and North African theaters of World War II. Take command of the land, air, and naval forces of Britain, Germany, the USSR, the United States, Italy, France, Poland, Finland, Romania, and many other nations in the largest conflict in history.
Experience the entire war through 19 historically accurate campaigns, from the Spanish Civil War to the downfall of Germany. Command squadrons of more than 230 types of aircraft, from iconic warbirds like the Spitfire and Bf-109 to less well-known types like the Soviet I-16 and Polish P.24. Control the seas with more than 80 types of warships including submarines, battleships and aircraft carriers.

name: Blizzard World
summary: Its you against the world in this 21 level winter classic. The snowmen enemies are armed to the teeth with snowballs and they are relentless in attempting to take you OUT! Magic snowflakes are hard to come by but will deliver you an extra life, which you will need if you want to succeed. Your enemies are waiting in the Blizzard World!!!

name: Blocky Cars In Real World
summary:
Ever wanted to try a blocky car simulator in the real-life environment? Now you can drift, drive and experience blocky cars in real-world right now!
Run with your favorite car and enjoy the endless race. Explore a detailed open world environment, several different cameras. Enjoy realistic physics.
You can choose from 25 cars to unlock including tank, taxi, tir, police car, fire truck, jeep, ice cream truck, post car and more. Speed and lots of fun await you in the „Blocky Cars In Real World” game simulator.

name: Bloody Bunny: First Blood
summary: Don't let the ears fool you, this is no cuddly pet rabbit. Bloody Bunny is armed, she's dangerous and she'll stop at nothing to get her revenge. Master the one-touch controls to embark on a brutal, bloody, rhythmic rampage, slicing and dicing your way through Bunny's world, from Master Sloth's zen garden to the mysterious mechanical lair. Slay your way through the zombie mice minions using all your ninja skills to get to the big, scary evil bosses.

name: Blocky Cars Speed Racer: Underground Highway Reckless Edition
summary:
Enjoy the endless racing fun with your friend! Get this App!
Steve wants to become a famous racer! Help him to reach his ultimate goal on these blocky roads!

name: Blip 1977: The Digital Game
summary: Blip 1977 is an accurate recreation of the 1977 electronic and mechanical toy. It can be single player or multi-player. Blip was at the time a simulation of tennis,ping-pong and the early Pong video game made by Atari. You can play against the "computer" or two opponents can play each other.

name: Black Fist Ninja Run Challenge
summary: This runner game is filled with action and pure adrenalin. Story mode: To survive the first challenge you need to be faster than the ghosts of the north - so run, jump and fight against different enemies. Collect coins to buy helpful items in the store. Black Fist Ninja Run Challenge is completely free to play, but in-game items can also be purchased for real money, like the arcade modes for endless fun. Try the endless runner game or the fight training (swordplay and archery).

name: Blonde vs. Brunette Racing
summary:
Two player kart racing fun on one screen!
Are you ready to challenge your friends?

name: Blown Away
summary:
Hendrik is a schlimazel! One last hair on his head, and a pair of teleporting shoes, are all he has left. Everything else was blown away by the wind.
Let yourself get carried away and and find the scattered remains of Hendrik’s house. Charge your batteries and teleport Hendrik through the ever-moving levels.

name: Black Widow: Recharged
summary: The original cult classic arachnid-starring, twin-stick shooter returns! Just in time for Halloween, Black Widow: Recharged has been reimagined for modern gameplay, with vibrant visuals, powerful new abilities, and another original soundtrack from award-winning video game composer Megan McDuffee. Aim for a high score in the old school arcade mode and earn bragging rights with your name at the top of the leaderboard. Or test your skills and rank on the boards in one of 30 intensely creative challenges, which twist the gameplay in new and exciting ways. Collect cash from downed enemies to charge a powerful web blast, or pick up one of a dozen new power-ups including explosive blasts, spread-shots, and fear, trapping all enemies in your web. Every mode and level is playable in local co-op mode with a friend.

name: Bloops Game
summary:
A secret of the universe, hidden inside a riddle. Can you find it?
BloOp!
Out of the void, mysterious particles have appeared.
Some are slow, others fast, some are crazy, and some are spooky!
Pop all BloOps before time runs out.
A good pop will earn you time, a bad pop will steal it from you. And beware the black hole!

name: Block Yard

name: Black Out
summary:
Black Out was a cancelled game which would be played using the SNES Mouse. A leaflet about it was included with the Japanese version of Mario Paint.

A prototype (known as Sleep) was found in the Nintendo Gigaleak of 2020. It is a game where you help a sleepwalker traversing obstacles and shooting at projectiles. The game was made to be played using the Super Scope or the SNES Mouse. It has no sound and uses assets similar to those of Super Donkey (another prototype found in the Gigaleak, possibly related to the original Donkey Kong series) and Yoshi's Island.

As a game under the name of Sleep was never announced nor rumored, even though the game was never shown before and having a different name in the dataleak, Black Out and Sleep they are likely to be the same game given the time frame and the use of the SNES Mouse. Both games are also related to Super Scope 15 (a Super Scope compatible cancelled game) in the dataleak.

Acrobatically slash and shoot your way through the swamps of Louisiana, the cavernous depths of a mining operation in Argentina, and a ruinous German castle. Experience the origins of Rayne through her first missions for the Brimstone Society in this improved version of the horror-action classic.

BloodRayne is back with new acrobatic movements, rail sliding, fast-paced blade and gun combat and fatal finishing moves. Explore a Strange World. Quests and secrets abound in every corner of Abraxas. Engage in a variety of side quests with multiple endings, or simply wander the land in search of your fortune.
Loot the Bodies. Take on hordes of foes in turn-based combat. Sling spells, quaff potions, rend your enemies, and reap the glorious rewards. When your skills are honed, seek out powerful bosses who will truly challenge your abilities.

Bloom was made as part of the gamejam, a game by its cover 2018. it is based on the famicase entry of the same name, designed by richard perez of skinny ships.

It is a match-3 game with flowers created over time on random stems, indicated by a loading loop. Matches work horizontally using the color, shape or pattern of the flowers and the stems can be raised and lowered or have their places swapped.

Have a friend join you in a 2 player game. Each player is given an identical sequence of blocks to keep things fair. Clearing 2 or more lines at a time will send penalty lines to your opponent. In Classic Mode the player whose board fills to the top loses. In Speed Run Mode the first player to get to a specified number of cleared lines wins!

name: Blox 3D City Creator

Over 2 million different cities have been created and shared by kids worldwide since release.

Terminal Cut editions of BloodRayne 1 & 2 have been enhanced by the original developer, Terminal Reality and include many enhancements over the originals:

Blockman is back in an all new adventure! Return to the skies and take down a new threat and restore peace and order to the ski resort!

Blockman 1989 is a direct sequel to the cult favorite, Blockman 1988. Play as John Q. Blockman - the 'Q' stands for 'Qube' - and take down a new terrorist threat that's cutting into his vacation. Buy upgrades and expand your arsenal, and get creative with your kills. Blockman 1989 is a platformer made for the retro enthusiast, with tight controls, and old-school game mechanics (with a modern twist).

In light of world news, Blockman 1989 will be free for all. I hope you enjoy playing Blockman 1989 as much as I did making it. <3 i3

name: Blood Bay

summary: Blocky Snake is a scoring arcade runner.

name: Blue Jay Joyride
summary: Blue Jay Joyride is a fast-paced 2D space shooter. Go through waves of enemies and fight progressively harder bosses. Collect one of the many unique powerups to give your ship a fighting chance in this intense game.

name: Block Breaker
summary: Block Breaker - A colorful puzzle game with challenging levels and beautiful graphics.

name: Block Warriors: Definitive Edition
summary: Block Warriors: Definitive Edition is a game that shows life in a criminal area as it is. You play as an ordinary fighter who has great ambitions and strives for more. Make your way to the top of the criminal world, make your own orders, create your own gang and keep the whole city at bay.

name: Black Mesa: Blue Shift
summary: Initially developed and released by Gearbox Software in 2001, second Half-Life add-on, Half-Life: Blue Shift is a return to the Black Mesa Research Facility and another look at the Incident's consequences from the eyes of Gordon Freeman's best friend - Barney Calhoun. In 2012, Crowbar Collective has delighted Half-Life fans with release of the magnificent Half-Life remake, but there are still no released remakes for add-ons. This is when they are coming in - HECU Collective are developing the Black Mesa: Blue Shift - a free remake with use of Black Mesa resources and style.

name: Blox 3D World
summary: Create beautiful worlds with simple clicks, from giant windmills to craggy castles and add animals,humans and birds for an amazing creative experience.A super fun toy with a surprising amount of depth. No goals, no distractions, just a beautiful visual and audio experience for the zen at heart.

name: Black Swan: Collector's Edition
summary: Caught in the wrong place at the wrong time - after visiting a performance of the closed ballet school for orphan girls, you receive a letter for help from one of the students.

name: Blade & Sorcery: Nomad
summary: The era of the VR weightless, wiggle-sword combat is over. Blade & Sorcery: Nomad is a medieval fantasy sandbox like no other, focusing on melee, ranged and magic combat that fully utilizes a unique and realistic physics driven interaction and combat system. Built exclusively for VR, collisions are dictated by fine hitboxes, objects have weight and follow the laws of physics, creatures have full body physics and presence, and blades can be used to penetrate soft materials or deflect magic. In Blade & Sorcery: Nomad, the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your weapon, choose your stance, choose your fighting style; Be the powerful warrior, ranger or sorcerer you always dreamed of becoming!

name: Blacktop Hoops
summary: Blacktop Hoop is the world's first competitive VR streetball game. Chain together flashy dribble tricks, shots, and high-flying dunks to finish off opponents in epic games of 1-on-1 arcade basketball.

name: Blackout!!
summary: Blackout!! is a Tower Defence Action-RPG where you must defend the land of Suwemba from the evil Olrinds! Select one of two heroes to fight back wave after wave of enemies by summoning defences while participating in the action-packed combat!

name: BlockStar VR
summary: BlockStar is a VR shooter where you put your reflexes to the test shooting cubes and completing challenges in an action-packed futuristic tournament. Play the 40-mission story mode and show that you have what it takes to become a filthy-rich champion.

name: Block Kuzushi
summary: It is a retro 3D block breakout that you can easily play. All operations are possible with only the mouse, and the ball behaves by physics.

name: Blank Space
summary: In space, use your high-speed jetpack and unique items to play with your enemies and unleash overwhelming firepower with a variety of customizable weapons. Control the floating debris with physics and defeat your enemies!

name: Bloody Forest
summary: Bloody Forest is an online co-op survival horror game for 1-5 players. You got lost in the forest and you are looking for potential inhabitants or something to repair your car. But what you don't know is that a monster lives here.

name: Black Metal Man 2
summary: It's 1994 in a small nihilistic town in Norway. Black Metal is still an underground movement, grim, brutal and dark as hell. There's a festival coming up, the "Kriegfest 94" and you need to be there! You will need fast reaction skills, a blastbeat tapping finger, an ear for extreme heavy metal music, and a device with loud volume.

name: Black Block Blast
summary: Simple puzzle game with a new game mechanism to relax while having fun!

name: Bloom
summary: Bloom is a real-time narrative-driven social sim about starting up a flower shop made exclusively for Playdate. Tend to Midori's garden while texting friends and family as she starts a new chapter of her life. The game takes place over many real-life days.

name: BlockOn!
summary: BlockOn! is a platform game in which you have to collect all the red items, at which point the exit door will open and you can proceed to the next level. However, there is a serious twist - You have to create the levels yourself!

name: Bloody Pigs 1996
summary: Bloody Pigs a top down roguelike shooter with stunning 3D graphics and procedural generation coming to your home PC soon. The game is so difficult that nobody will ever beat it. It’s made to crush your spirit and taint your soul.

name: Blood Souls
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of hardcore RPG, playing as the undead. Use a variety of weapons, rune system and building to go through a path. You will meet various obstacles, unique enemies and many bosses! Control the territory, use all your powers and go through the story, finding out the truth.

name: Bluem
summary: The story of 1 robot and 1 cat

name: BlackSky
summary: Travel from one solar system to the other in this space action puzzle game. Match tiles to fire your ship's deadly weapons at a multitude of monsters. Upgrade your ship and its weapons to fight stronger enemies

name: Black Ink
summary: A hand-drawn action video game about love, weapons, comedy, more weapons, penguins, a2 + b2 = c2, and lots of weapons!

name: Blaston Spectator
summary: View and stream Blaston matches with broadcast-quality tools so that your audience never has to miss a moment of the action! Built with streamers and esports fans in mind, Blaston Spectator gives PC owners everything they need to keep an eye on the action of VR’s hottest competitive dueling game.

name: Bloodied Fear
summary: Poor Joe. His wife left him and his son was killed in a tragic accident. Now he's been tasked with rescuing the King's daughter. Unfortunately for the bad guys, Joe's in a really pissed off mood.

name: Blade of God
summary:
The game concept is based on Norse Mythology.
You will play as Chaos, a hero who has special blood. In order to save your family, you have to make tough choices between sin and redemption, between survival and destruction.

name: Blocked Zona
summary: Blocked Zona is a 2D shooter in which you play as a special unit mercenary who has gone to an infested area infested with zombies in search of the R-327 military chip. The fate of the world is at stake. Arm yourself with the best military weapons and go into battle!

name: Block Breaker 2
summary: Block Breaker 2 - Sequel to an exciting puzzle game with many challenging levels and beautiful graphics.

name: Blade Bros Action!
summary: Blade Bros Action!, presents you with a new game genre "Hack n' Platformer", is a fast-paced gameplay that is a mix of hack n' slash and platforms games, joins the retro pixel graphics, a cool soundtrack, stylish bosses, dynamic battles, swords, skills, magic elements and so forth.

name: BlackWhite
summary: Use black or white side to complete 48 levels.

name: Black Astral
summary:
In a world ravaged by disease, join a feeble, old man in his attempt to escape the plague, traversing dimensions.

Black Astral is an English Yume Nikki fangame, made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

name: Blue Oak Bridge
summary: Blue Oak Bridge features breathtaking 2D hand-painted art in a storybook world of powerful witches, ancient magic and royal secrets. Farm, forage and fish throughout the island of Eloria and use all you discover to brew potions, make produce and help your new friends.

name: Black Metal
summary: Colonize. Explore. Survive.

name: Blickel
summary: A colorful and retro 2D platformer where you must shoot enemies, platform around tough obstacles, and race through several distinct worlds each with its own unique challenges and gameplay elements. Can you make it to the end?

name: BlastMania
summary: Destroy as many robots as possible and survive until the end ! Improve your shoot, unlock abilities, upgrade your weapons and earn as many points as you can. Make the best decisions to optimize your run and reach the top of the leaderboard !

name: Block Fight
summary: It's a tower defense game that uses blocks to build fortresses against monsters. Gathering resources, building defenses, and keeping an eye out for the abilities of a variety of monsters.All of these will challenge the player's strategic choices, resource management, and immediate reactions.

name: Bleach
summary: The Fantasy Girls RPG Gacha Game

name: BlazeRush: Star Track
summary: BlazeRush: Star Track is a dynamic arcade survival racing game in a new space-themed setting. In this game, everyone can assemble a team of friends in local or online multiplayer. Choose a car to your taste and chase, blow up and cut your opponents off -- welcome to the world of racing and frantic fun!

name: Blind Monk's Society
summary: A class project in Navigation, Game features Audio only gameplay, to simulate being blind and is set in a Monty Python-ish comical world where a group of blind Monks are initiating you into their society by having you perform several audio navigatory task to help you learn to SEE with your EARS. Game Plays through in about half an hour. Created by Kyle Audick & Erik Carlson UCLA D|MA 2008

name: Blacksmith War
summary: There was a war between the east and the west, and as a blacksmith, you provided various weapons to the soldiers on the front line. From the initial dagger and short sword, to the sophisticated two-handed sword. For the sake of the warriors, please work hard to build the best weapons.

name: Blooms
summary:
blooms is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars two characters, Nonoka and Kiribana. The point of the game is to sleep in the bed and collect effects while dreaming. You always start off as Nonoka but can switch characters at any point. In Nonoka's bedroom, there is a music box where the player can access a sound test with unlockable tracks. In Kiribana's bedroom there is a minigame on her bookshelf called Little RPG.

Most of the time, it doesn't really matter which character the player controls, since the dream worlds are the same for both characters and effects are even shared in both of their inventories once collected. However there are a few situations where one character can do one thing where the other refuses or is unable to do the same thing.

Along with collecting effects, there are 3 additional menu types to be found hidden throughout the dream world.

name: Black Sheep
summary:
In the future, robots cater to man’s every want and need. That is, unless you’re a lowly line cook like Irene Turnsole. After Irene travels to her late father’s home, she discovers that her sister has gone missing and nobody is coming to help find her. To solve the mystery, Irene must dig into the secrets of her father’s corporation, a world on the edge of the Singularity, and her family's own painful past – before precious time runs out.

A cyberpunk point-and-click mystery brought to Twine.

name: Blood Under the Bridge
summary: Twine game about being 15 during the 2010 World Cup.

name: Blue Bayou
summary: Embody a crawdad caught in a web of usury. Defend yourself from sinister swamp things as you fight to erase your debts.

name: Blood Burger
summary:
Marco and his friend Thales are opening a hamburger shop but they don't know anything about cooking. So they decide to go after a secret hamburger formula in an abandoned "ShitDonalds" factory.

But what they don't expect is that the old factory's mascot is still there.

name: Blink God
summary: You must climb to the top of the world using a unique teleport called Blink. so... do you like bungee jumping?

name: Blowfly: DungHole Wanderer
summary: This is an NES style platformer game, fly and explore to find pink poo in the map and destroy them, which is the only condition to pass the level. You need to avoid dangerous traps, defeat the alien creature AssMan that invades the earth, and achieve the final victory!

name: Bleakstead
summary:
You wake up on a bus at it's last stop, a small desert town called Bleakstead.

Explore, talk to the residents, perform magical rituals, read ancient runes, to discover the secrets hidden in this strange town.

name: Blaze the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Blaze the Cat.

name: Blade Bros Impact!
summary: An action RPG with several essences from classic 16 and 32 bit era RPGs! Enjoy dynamic battles, scary bosses, get more powerful by gaining levels, getting swords, rods, bows, axes and so forth!

name: Blastboard: Casso
summary: Adds a character named ‘Casso’ into the game.

name: Blast Off Far Away
summary: Shoot to move, move to live, live to shoot! Blast Off Far Away (B.O.F.A.) is a space-themed, top-down arena shooter, with a focus on fast-paced arcade-esque gameplay, with the unique twist where movement is limited through the use of the player's gun.

name: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom
summary: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is an indie tower defense game, set in a pop-up sketch book. Players can place automated towers while controlling a character to defeat enemies and defend the king's statues.

name: Blitz Roads
summary: Blitz Roads is a futuristic action-packed vehicle combat racing world. Compete in numerous racing tracks with 6 different ways to play. - And test your racing skill with “Challenge Mode”. Start your engines. Ready. Set. Let’s Play!

name: Blocky Dungeon
summary: A weird mix of block-placing puzzle and roguelike, where you build a dungeon and explore it at the same time! Defeat enemies, clear lines and collect loot. Explore the different dungeons, complete quests and try to survive as long as you can!

name: Blazing War
summary: The aggressive planets challenged the Earth to a martial arts contest, and each loser would give up a piece of land to the planet for a colony on the other side.Start the game fighting and wipe out all the team members of the other side to be considered the winner!

name: Blind
summary:
A short visual novel for NaNoRenO 2020.

Someone wakes with no memory and can't move their body or see anything. They try to understand who they are while the trauma of their past catches up to them.

Inspired by PSX sound novels with very little art but instead a focus on sound effects and music to build atmosphere.

name: Block N Load 2
summary: Get ready to assemble, smash and dominate! Face off in epic 5v5 matches where you can build up and destroy every block on any level while playing as the 22nd century’s greatest heroes. Work together and utilize insane abilities to claim victory!

name: Blackjack
summary: Blackjack is an unlicensed game developed by Odyssey Software and published by American Video Entertainment. The game is just basic blackjack, but with some configurations such as how much money it takes to win the game, and palate-swapping the card colors.

name: Black Wolf
summary: Take the role of the titular Black Wolf as you run, jump, dash and wall slide through side-scrolling stages collecting bones and trying to survive!

name: Black Trail
summary: Black Trail is a VR FPS, set in an epic war in the old west. Play as a bounty hunter and a native warrior, follow their interwoven stories, use historic weapons, explore, escape, infiltrate, loot, adapt, survive and fight as you chase newly discovered artifacts to change the fate of war.

name: Blackjack Avenue
summary: Blackjack Avenue is a casual Blackjack game where the user can simulate a Casino Blackjack Experience.

name: Blob Dash
summary: Jump, dash and reverse time to avoid obstacles and achieve a high score.

name: Bleeding Abyss
summary: Run at high speeds surviving the chase of endless groups of enemies. Plan and manage your survival by investing your hard earned rewards into resources. Do you have what it takes to escape?

name: Blue Star Mobile Team
summary: After the Blue Star mobile team has assembled, control the mecha to fight and defeat the dangerous creatures in the universe.

name: Blasterball 3
summary: Blasterball 3 is a fresh new spin on the classic series that's sold millions worldwide! Get set to break your way through mesmerizing patterns of colorful bricks in the most exciting, customizable edition yet. The all-new Level Editor lets you design your own levels. Got a favorite song? Load up your own MP3's and build your own soundtracks as you sit back and let the stress fall away. Secret levels and additional features are just waiting to be discovered ... so don't delay - dive in and play Blasterball 3 today.

name: Blood Ties: A Hidden Object Game with a Bite
Blackguards: Definitive Edition
summary: Blackguards is a role-playing game which focuses on tactical combat. It leaves the high-fantasy parts of Aventuria which is usually found in The Dark Eye games and is set in the wild south (Mengbilla, Loch Harodrôl and The Green Hell). The player character has memory loss and is accused of murdering a princess. The next course of action is breaking out of prison, picking up some other criminals as party members and finding out what happened. Parts of the story are told in flashbacks.

name: Blackhawk Striker 2
summary: In Blackhawk Striker 2, you're a pilot for the 365 Assault Helicopter Co. Your job is to fly your bird with turbine power, 10 grunts, and a ton of grit. As the last pilot on this mission after a brutal night of heavy attacks, you'll need to fuel up and make a quick stop at the arming pits for some linked 7.62 for the M-60's. Colonel Jackson, a former West Point Officer, has hand-picked you to be his ace gunner along with a top-level flight crew. He clenches your shoulder and passes you a mission log from a well-known pilot, Jim "Ironhawk" Jones. "Good luck," says Colonel Jackson, "make us proud."

name: Blasterball Wild
summary: Blasterball Wild is a Breakout clone developed and published by WildTangent.

name: Blast Miner!
summary: Mix Constructive Thinking with Destructive Explosions! There's gold in them thar hills! Problem is, the gold lies deep in the cavernous puzzle rooms underneath them thar hills. Can you maneuver the gold out of the obstacle-laced mines? Strategically position a variety of different explosives, charges and other tools throughout each mine–try to come up with the correct mix and timing to blow gold pieces out through the mine shafts. Rack your brain, try numerous different explosive combinations! Each puzzle has multiple different solutions! Challenge yourself, create your own puzzles with the puzzle editor!

name: Block Tower Online
summary: Want to have a quick game with friends to pass the time. Let's play with Block Tower Online in such a case! Because it's online, you don't have to be in the same place to play against each other. And the rules are simple! No difficult controls!

name: Block Meister
summary: Block grinding pixel art puzzle. Blow up the blocks and make them look like the example.

name: Blue's Clues: Meet Blue's Baby Brother
Blanc
summary: Blanc is an artistic cooperative adventure that follows the journey of a wolf cub and a fawn stranded in a vast, snowy wilderness. They must come together in an unlikely partnership to find their families.

name: Black Spire
summary: "Black Spire" is a side-scrolling action-adventure game. You will control a brave warrior, experience difficult soul-like battles, and explore the secrets hidden in the depths of the Black Spire.

name: Black Coal
summary: Put the coal into the boiler.

name: Block Buster Billy
summary: Baba is Number. Push blocks with digits around to create numbers and equations and solve puzzles.

name: Block Blitz
summary: The classic BBC Micro game ported to Playdate

name: Blocks!
summary: A puzzle game

name: Blade of Ten
summary: Blade of Ten is a Fighting Adventure game set in a Fantasy World filled with Mystery. You will encounter a variety of Creatures and Characters, explore Vast Areas and maneuver around the highest of ledges with your Helicopter Jump. Vanquish the forces of evil, or Race against them in Go Kart mode!

name: Blade Assault
summary: Blade Assault is a 2D action rogue-lite platformer with beautiful pixel art set in a desolate sci-fi world. Fight against the corrupt military of Esperanza as part of the resistance force of the Undercity. Bring the corrupt to justice by becoming stronger and fighting alongside your trusty comrades.

name: Bloodstage: Possessed by a Tsundere Demon
summary: An unknown life form controls the crowds of mutated employees of the space station. Impress the demon girl by destroying thousands of possessed with dozens of weapons.

name: Blocked!
summary: Couch multiplayer is back - Blocked! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 people that is all about being easy to pick up and start playing. Outsmart your friends in various classic and unique minigames.

name: Blazted VR
summary: A Virtual Reality Wave Base Zombie Drinking Game

name: Bloodline: Last Royal Vampire
summary: Bloodline is an anime-styled mobile role-playing card game with an emphasis on deep character leveling and customization, allowing for a roster of heroes that is distinctly unique to each player. The story follows the Last Royal Vampire Lilo and her companion Ron in their quest to save their loved ones from a militaristic order called the Holy Land.

name: Blade of God X: Orisols
summary: "Blade of God 2" is a 3D hard-core action game. In this game, players will be one of the painful, sadness, ordinary, but great heroes; to adventure among the huge and mysterious Nordic kingdoms, to fight with the “sacrificers” who once lost their "destiny", and launch a self-salvation travel.

name: Blockhead 2D
summary: Blockhead 2D is a mostly multiplayer, retro-style platformer. It comes with a cast of characters, game mechanics that resemble the classic 8-bit brawlers and sound design that keeps the action going!

name: BloodPit: Skelton II
summary: Find travelers and fight mutants through the violent waves and endless levels of the blood pits.

name: Blocks
summary: Slide the orange block off the board by sliding the other blocks out of its way. The horizontal blocks only move left and right, while the vertical blocks slide up and down. Solving the puzzles can be very tricky, but don't worry, the first ones are easy and will get you going quickly.

name: Blobble Wars 2
summary: Mouse-based physics strategy game. Take the other team's towers before they can take yours! Features 50 unique levels and four difficulty modes.

name: Black Market of Bulletphilia: 100th Black Market
summary: This time, Marisa Kirisame goes out alone to investigate (and collect). It is a game in which Marisa is the main character. Collect new cards and repeatedly challenge stages while conquering stages that develop at high speed and at random. Each play is short, and you play repeatedly to solve the anomalies.

name: Blunderbubb!
summary: You must take control of the Blunderbubb, the latest innovation in bubble-based defense technology, to shoot down the incoming deluge of colorful bubbles before you are completely overrun. Just hold down to aim, and release to launch. Connect three or more bubbles with matching colors to pop them and remove them from the field.

name: Blockbuster World Video Game Championship II
summary: Blockbuster World Video Game Championship II is a special cartridge used for, as the name suggests, the second Blockbuster World Video Game Championships, held in branches of Blockbuster. It was built by Acclaim Entertainment for North American Sega Mega Drive units, and contains watered down versions of NBA Jam Tournament Edition and Judge Dredd.

name: Blitz GT
summary: Blitz GT is a vehicular battle game. Battle 4v4 with unique characters and abilities to score points, take down opponents and secure the win.

name: Blood Hospital
summary: "Blood Hospital" is a FPS Horror adventure game A young man with frequent headache woke up in an abandoned hospital.Here let him have a strange and familiar feeling, locked doors, drugs, dark corridors, the voice in the shadow... A Strange voices always appeared and guided him to do something..

name: BlackHill
summary: A narrative-driven, single-player adventure like mom used to make, with a charming cast of characters and a touching story of self-discovery

name: Blastonier
summary: A 2D physics-based puzzle game inspired by old flash games and arcade tasking you with shooting a ball into a cube.

name: Bloodwatch
summary: Bloodwatch is a short horror game about surviving at all cost on the island when the maniacs are trying to find and kill you. Explore, finding weapons, items, find the leader and kill him.

name: Blight
summary: Five strangers from different backgrounds must work together to save the world in a squad based tactical action game dripping with '80s horror charm.

name: B.L.A.C.K. 1
summary: You are drifting in space... Your Oxygen is running out... And suddenly bandits start to take interest in your tiny, experimental space Capsule.

name: Blast Cats
summary: Blast Cats is a love letter to classic 3D platformers! Bomb your enemies to smithereens and smash them flat with your mighty hammer! Find precious gems as you run and jump through secret worlds. Fight powerful foes and show them who’s boss! Adventure explodes unto the world, hang in there baby!

name: Bleed of Fear
summary: Welcome to Bleed of Fear, a terrifying theme park filled with traps and horrors.

name: Blight: Survival
summary: Blight: Survival is an upcoming medieval, co-operative, action horror game set in an alternate 14th century powered by Unreal Engine 5.

name: Bloody Efforts
summary: Play as a brave Warrior keen in his swordsmanship, a wise Sage spellcasting powerful Magic or an adventurous Bard healing wounded allies. Is that not your take? Then create your own Heroes! Set their Weapons, Skills, Passives and join the battle to prove your own hierarchy through Bloody Efforts.

name: Blood Scheme
summary: A blood test company raised more than US$700 million from venture capitalists and private investors, resulting in a $10 billion valuation at its peak. You are the only journalist who found out this is a scam. Publish your article before the company is listed!

name: Blood Flowers
summary: is an AVG single-player game with storyline and puzzle solving as its core gameplay. Yinchen Zhang, a meteorite hunter, beginning with a meteorite that contains the qualities of revitalisation, the story gradually unravels the mystery of memories from 20 years ago.

name: BlazBlue: Central Fiction - Limited Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Blazblue Central Fiction
- Nendoroido Puchi Figure
- Blazblue Memorial Book
- BlazBlue Song Interlude III

name: Bluey Shortcut Running Game
summary: Bluey shortcut race 3D Race against opponents. This is race to collect cube stacker surfer to make huge stack colors tower and make your own Bluey shortcut way to run over water. Collect as much as you can of floorboards and go Bluey shortcut run in your way and challenge all runners. In this Bluey shortcut race game keep on the bridge race with your fat body run and pick up more and more cube surfers with shoe race in tower stack colors run and cube surfer Bluey game. Perform stack rider challenges in Bluey shortcut race 3D games and bounce big to collect high heel stacks to induce Bluey shortcut path with hair challenge 3D runner.

name: Black Death: A Tragic Dirge
summary: Nothing is as it seems in the Medieval world of Black Death. Find sanctuary in this eerie town that does not exist on any of the maps you have seen before. The Black Death is horrible plague that drives its victims insane and causes extreme paranoia. It has infected most of this town’s residents and seeks to claim your sanity too.

name: Blue Fish Yokohama
summary: Blue Fish Yokohama is a relaxing tile-based puzzle game. You are a fish that eats miso ramen, cheese ramen and tantanmen by jumping, bumping, bouncing and splashing through a Japanese restaurant. Solve 50 handcrafted levels with unique game mechanics.

name: Blade Fantasy
summary: Blade Fantasy is an MMORPG mobile game with traditional oriental culture. The game is covered with amazing stories and play mods. Join in now and write down your unique warrior story

name: Black Diamond
summary: Black Diamond is a built in game in TempleOS.

name: Blob Quest
summary: Guide your Blob through several levels in this adventure full of dangers, treasures and monstrous enemies. You'll have to solve many puzzles and prove your skills to succeed.

name: Bluebird of Happiness
summary: Bluebird of Happiness is a weird and spooky adventure puzzle game you can complete within an hour.

name: Bloody Hell
summary: Bloody Hell is a Bullet-Hell Metroidvania about using the blood of demons to your advantage. Fight Epic Bosses, and take revenge on the terrorising demons.

name: Blinnk and the Vacuum of Space
summary: Welcome to deep space station Norpopolis – where a batch of escaped critters are causing chaos! Grab your Vacuumizer 5000 and go undercover with BLINNK the robot to catch them all. An autism-friendly VR adventure!

name: Blinded by Fear
summary: Blinded by Fear is a survival horror experience with a twist. You can't see anything! Navigate a 3D world with a novel lidar based sight mechanic. Solve puzzles, uncover a twisted mystery and confront unseeable horrors dwelling in the darkness. Can you survive when you are Blinded by Fear?

name: Bloody Hell Hotel
summary: In Bloody Hell Hotel, you embody a vampire. You wake up from a coma that has lasted for centuries, only to find your once-grand estate is now in ruins. It's time to turn it into a prosperous hotel! It's no easy task, though, as times are tough and resources are scarce. There are shortages of food, supplies, and workforce. Being a blood-thirsty monster doesn't help with customer satisfaction either. Luckily, underneath the estate lies a crypt and a system of caves. By foraging, farming, crafting, and fighting your way through the monster-infested dungeons, you'll find the resources you need to restore greatness to your mansion and turn it into a thriving hotel business.

name: Block Game: Mine, Craft and Drive
Black Hole Pool
summary: Black Hole Pool is the most popular 8&9-pool simulator game with realistic physics and outstanding graphics.

name: Blue Blood
summary: An action platformer about a fox that protects their cubs. Jump, dash and fight through the mountain, collecting food and unveiling the mysteries it hides.

name: Blacksmith Weapon Merchant
summary: Welcome new warriors looking for their dream weapon, collect the needed resources, craft and sell them their desired weapon. Upgrade your garden so you can collect exotic resources and complete more lucrative recipes.

name: Bloom: Roots of Renewal
summary: Bloom: Roots of Renewal is a first person shooter inspired by Hexen and Quake. Use your skills of magic and maneuverability to quell the overgrowth and free the forest and lost village of these creatures.

name: Blaze in Space: Beat a-Maze
summary: Fast-paced, brain teasing arcade game with competitive focus. Find an optimal route and speed through a blazing maze where you pilot ever-accelerating ship.

name: Bloodsaw
summary:
A physics-based action game with multiple game modes, and an advanced damage system.

You can play in multiple game modes, like the Arena, Factory, with more being added almost every update.

You can earn skill points in every game mode, and spend them on character upgrades like impact resistance, more damage, higher lung capacity, etc, and powers, like the Dash, Slow-motion, etc.

With the damage system, every limb can be separately damaged, can bleed, can feel pain, and can even break. You can also get concussions, drown, get melted in lava, get cut by sawblades, stomped on by a hammerhead, and more. Oh, and the same applies for all enemies.

name: Blossom's Bloom Boutique
summary: Open your flower store and create a beautiful garden landscape that everyone would love to visit!

name: Blumen Kranz
summary: Blumen Kranz is a otome game for PC.

name: Black Stigma
summary: Black Stigma is a PvP game that requires a combination of shooting and unique character skills.

name: BlackStar: Theater Starless
summary: A story about men who aim to become top stars on an underground stage.

name: BLR80
summary: A sci-fi action VR game where you play a fugitive who has taken it upon himself to stop the OJI corporation from turning humans into mindless drones. BLR80 combines sights and sounds of Bangalore along with free flow action combat to root the player in an alternate version of the city.

name: Blood and Sorcery
summary: Journey through the mysterious land of Notor and find the corruption within! Fight bosses, learn abilities and become the most talented mage alive!

name: Blankiball: Der Trinksportsimulator
summary: Finally, a fun drinking sports simulator. In Blankiball you bring the German trendy sport beer ball or flunkyball into your living room. Play online or locally against your friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Blade Jumper
summary: In 2045, a super-large building was built in the middle of Yeouido, Seoul. The name of the building is Kukuru Tower. You have to enter Kukuru Tower, whose height is unknown, to overthrow the dictatorship that dominates the city. Even if you fall, jump again and go up!

name: BlackBox
summary: A plane has crashed in the Indian Ocean, search the database and listen to the Cockpit voice recordings to uncover what happened. Blackbox is a 'Her story' inspired detective game, where you investigate an aeroplane crash. The devil is in the details.

name: Blöck
summary: Blöck is a hardcore and challenging 2D Platformer. The goal is easy: Get to the level end as fast as possible and try not to die. But let's be realistic. You will die. A lot.

name: Blood Rivals: Survival Battleground Shooting Games
Bloodline: Heroes of Lithas
summary:
The World of Lithas is waiting for you. Become the next High Guardian, leader of the City of Light, and embark on an epic journey through the realm of Lithas. A fantasy world with diverse cultures and races; meet clans of lycans, demons, demi-gods, elves, orcs, and dozens more. Unite them together on your campaign, bringing them to your side as powerful champions on the battlefield. But that’s not all, forge deeper relationships, courting them as Companions, to unite your bloodlines and raise new and more powerful Champions, a new generation of heirs to fight alongside you.
The seeds of chaos have spread throughout the land, shattering and dividing the clans apart, and it will be the work of many generations of Champions to restore peace and order. You possess the Bloodline of the Ancient High Guardians, and you alone, with courage and strength, will be able to command these forces, both present and future to victory.

The world of Lithas is filled with fantasy races of every kind. How you relate to them will ultimately determine the future of the world. Explore their territories and cultures, find their stories, interact with them, and even engage in Romance. The choice is yours!

Through careful cultivation of their Bloodlines, you will determine the unique strengths, traits, and skills of the next generation of heroes. Decisions of both nature and nurture will determine their future and your success. Each of your Champions and Companions will bring their own distinct characteristics to pass down to the next generation. Through your efforts, you will forge new Bloodlines of immense power and skill!

Take on the mantle of High Guardian, and lead Luxis, the ancient City of Light, back to greatness. As you expand and rebuild, you’ll unlock more and more features of your city and new avenues of commerce and growth. Allocate your resources and handle the political affairs of your city wisely, and your city will thrive. As you grow, your Champions and heirs will assist you in growing your city, bringing their own unique skills to bear in managing your city. Only by working together will you bring prosperity back to the City of Light!

You will accomplish great deeds in your journeys through Lithas, and your Clan showroom will mark the achievements you’ve made in your progress! The annals of your Clan will record how you’ve built the strongest combat teams, developed a thriving city, found love with many different Companions, and passed down your bloodline to a legion of new heirs. Each of your deeds will bring honor and glory to your Clan!

From the long shadows of an ancient war, the threat of the Darkness has returned to the world just as the strength of the Goddess of Light has weakened. You must engage in thrilling Raids to fight back the tide of darkness and evil with your chosen champions! In your expeditions, you and your companions will soon discover ancient secrets, long hidden, that threaten to shake the very foundations of the world.

name: Blaster Master: Pimp your Ride
summary:
Blaster Master: Pimp your Ride, is an assembly hack for the NES platformer Blaster Master. Changes to most of the areas are minor save for areas 1 and 2 tank section, which are re-done. The changes are made to utilize the full effect of the ASM hack, and premise of this hack which is the 8 new additional upgrades the tank can get.

Yes, 8 new upgrades. That means the game has a total of 15 upgrades in all, and almost all of them are going to be needed to finish the game. Along with that are some other ASM changes, one that would need explaining is the gun powerup system. Instead of one gun unit equaling one level, you must collect many gun units to raise you gun power. The upside is that you do not lose your gun level if you get hit or die. This means that any powerup you find will not be wasteful.

name: Blue Sphere Plus
summary:
Blue Sphere Plus is a Sonic & Knuckles hack. It is based on the Blue Sphere Standalone ROM, with new features, such as:

- Pressing B or C now cycles between Sonic + Tails (blue + orange bumpers), Sonic alone (both blue), Tails (both orange), Knuckles + Tails (red + orange bumpers), and Knuckles (both red).
- SRAM support to remember the character you last selected, and the last level completed.
- If holding A while pressing Start to start a stage, the player starts all stages from then on at top speed (not saved between sessions).
- You can now press Start at the first screen to reach the menu, instead of holding A + B + C.
- Select "SONIC 3K" on the first menu, and you will play through all 16 of Sonic 3 & Knuckles' Special Stages in order, including the 2 "secret" ones. Saving and code entry are disabled while this mode is active, and the game will reset upon completion of the last stage.
- Can Lock-On to other ROMs, including the Sonic games that would normally enable special modes when locked-on to Sonic & Knuckles.
- Users can lock-on a file containing custom levels to play.

name: Blue Print
summary: play a sandbox with infinite possibilities.

name: Black Dog Bar
summary: Black Dog Bar is a dialog-based bartender simulator. Each client has its own story. Communicate, mix cocktails, and... manipulate. It is only you who decides where the complicated story of each hero will turn and what will happen to them when they leave the bar.

name: Blue Wednesday
summary: Blue Wednesday is a story about jazz and love, and about failure. The boring days pass for failed jazz pianist Morris. One day is the same as the next until Morris meets jazz saxophonist Angela.

name: Blades of Heroes: Samurai Rising
summary: An Action Adventure 3rd person hack and slash game set in Mythological Japan. Travel as a trio of Samurai Heroes and switch between them as you fight enemies with the help of an Ally system. Perform special combo attacks as you travel across Japan, hell-bent on destroying the forces of evil.

name: Bloodpire
summary: Bloodpire is a medieval fantasy roguelike top-down action game. The empire has been invaded by a group of vampires and other undead, they are capturing innocent civilians and using them as food. Will you be the hero of the empire or will you make a different choice?

name: Blocks of Nature
summary: Combine cubes of the same color in a lapland-inspired scene with bright visuals and relaxing music for casual gameplay

name: Blind
summary: 「Sometimes what the eye can't tell, the heart can.」 《Blind》 is a light fantasy game for girls set in a modern city. After a childhood accident that left me with a strange face blindness, I was introduced to a profession called "watchman" and since then, the world has taken on a whole new dimension.

name: Bloodz
summary: Bloodz is an indie action game set in a world dominated by zombies.

name: Black Sheep Town
summary: The setting of this work is "District Y". It is a cosmopolitan downtown area where immigrants from all over the world live, and it is full of energy with visitors who enjoy its unique atmosphere, but the other side of the city is a dangerous area where gangs rule and the police have no power.

name: Blackstead
summary: You explore a small town called Blackstead and discover secrets about it's strange inhabitants.

name: Blood of the Covenant
summary: You meet someone in a chilly alleyway at night.

name: Blooded Fields
summary:
There's been a murder in Beckenshire, and you've been called in to solve it.

Hunt down clues, interrogate witnesses and suspects, and form a theory as to who is the murderer, in this point and click adventure with a gameboy-themed palette.

name: Block-Quake
summary: Block-Quake is a total conversion mod that replaces all of Quake's vanilla models with familiar looking "blocky" monsters, weapons, items and bosses! Included is a Block-Quake update that adds new plastic replacements for the Copper mod (you'll need the regular Copper mod for Block-Quake's version to work correctly)

name: Blaloon Blalympia 2
summary: The next chapter of our crazy party game fun for families and friends: Slip into the role of a blathlete and win the second part of the blatastic Blalympic Games on Blanet Blaloonia!

name: Blueprints
summary:
Blueprints is a 3D third-person parkour platformer game where the more levels you beat, the prettier they get.
Experience beautiful natural (and not natural) landscapes in this short casual adventure you are very likely to forget.
Play all sorts of parkour challenges (and a random 2 minutes of holding [W]) in this adventure of a lifetime.

name: Block Steady
summary: Chunky jumpy platformer sprinkled with puzzle!

name: Blades of Steel
summary: The LCD Handheld port of Blades of Steel.

name: Blue Portals
summary: Blue Portals is a unique Portal mod that has players traverse through new test chambers using only the single portal device and many new test elements.

name: Blackjack at Carrot
summary: Modern 2D Blackjack game with customizable table rules. For up to 4 local players.

name: Blade-Shift Rage
summary: Blade-Shift Rage is a lightning-paced, combo-chasing 2D action platformer, with brutal one hit kills and deaths. Teleport to dodge attacks, slash and shoot anyone who stands in your way and dash to complete tough platforming challenges, chasing S-Rank scores.

name: Blessed Work
summary: A new work appears, but for some reason the lack of security is everywhere, place objects, activate buttons, move things and do everything in your power to prevent your workers from dying trying to finish the construction in this lemmings-style game!

name: Blockpop Heroes
summary: A parodic minimalist runner focused on jumps.

name: Blue Intervention
summary: Blue Intervention is a tactical FPS game. You cooperate with your police partners in various situations and environments. Neutralize criminals, rescue civilians!

name: Blobufo
summary: Blobufo Platformer Game with Diffrent Mechanic on Space! Our character moves with the power splash from his weapon. Complete the levels in this space without hitting the enemies and Thorns! Don't look easy! Seriously hard!

name: Blocks
summary: A fun little puzzle game for Playdate

name: Blue's Room: Coloring With Blue
summary: Blue's Room: Coloring With Blue aka Blue's Clues is a Plug It In & Play TV Kids controller based off the Nick Jr. TV series Blue's Room developed by ImagineEngine and made by Flying Colors (a.k.a Jakks Pacific) In 2004. The controller features four activities with 90 pages to color, complete and assemble.

name: Blaster
summary: Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called Blaster

name: Black Widow: Looking for Love
summary: It's impossible not to be eclipsed by a mysterious woman and, although she may not be trustworthy, her charms have piqued your interest and you want her to give you a chance. She wants to be sure that you are the right person for her.

name: Black Mesa: Azure Sheep
summary:
A remake of the Half-Life 1 mod Azure Sheep.
