This is the story of Justin Barnes, Black Mesa security guard who goes to rescue his colleague after an Incident.

name: BlackberryNova: Sports Club
summary: To get closer to Izumi, Kotori decides to join a sports club with her.

name: Blackout
summary: Blackout is a Danish psychological horror adventure game, created and produced by Michael Valeur and Deadline Games and released in 1997. The game uses stop-motion FMV sequences with puppets to deliver a story about an amnesiac protagonist in the backstreets of Copenhagen, Denmark. Walking the streets of Copenhagen, the protagonist runs into many shady characters, some of whom seem to have additional information on who the character is. The game features a mystery based on multiple personalities being uncovered by a psychologist, assassinations, prostitution, and the production of snuff porn. The game came with a companion novel, written by Michael Valeur.

name: Black Snow
summary: Welcome to Amaluuk research station, we hope your stay is a productive and pleasant one.

name: Black Ops
summary: You are a black ops male agent, sent to eliminate DR. Gallagher, former member of the Black mesa science team, who is hiding in the Dead end night club. You aren't able to find him, but in the warehouse, you hear a .357 Magnum being fired. It was DR. Gallagher, that commited suicide. You pick up the bomb (As seen in the case in Opposing Force, with 2 Black ops activating the bomb), Let yourself captured by the grunts, in the jail, go to a dirty rotten cell. you make your way out, get to Black mesa. When you set the bomb, you are shot by Adrian Shepard, but NOT killed. You see the G-man re-arming the bomb, you wake up, but you must get out of there.

name: Blue Moon
summary: Visual novel by Whomor. Available in the Story Me app.

name: Blue Orchid: Interactive Story
summary: Blue Orchid is a narrative thriller/sci-fi mobile game, featuring chat messaging with NPCs, puzzles and investigation phases.

name: Blue Bird Land Ep 2.
summary: Blue Bird Land is an AVG with horror and puzzle elements. In each chapter, the form of the game is unique and different from others. Let’s follow the alluring characters, addicted to the dangerous amusement park!

name: Blackmoon Prophecy II
summary: Blackmoon Prophecy II is a Final Fantasy fangame made in RPG Maker

name: BlackForge VR
summary: Forge and form a wide variety of medieval weaponry in this creative-based weaponsmithing simulator! Support the local heroes with tools to ensure their success in combat. Embrace the power of the aesir and thunder away at the forge to make your imagination a reality!

name: Black Emperor
summary: "Black Emperor" is a gorgeous action, independent fighting game with Chinese characteristics and culture! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience unlimited fun and pleasure from it! It's definitely worth it! Otherwise you will regret for life!

name: Blokshot Halloween
summary: A hauntingly familiar game to those who've played Blokshot Evolution. This Halloween inspired EVILution will have your pulse racing as you rapidly take out mummys, ghouls, monsters and more! Blokshot EVILution is a chance to play the original game with a little Holiday spirt.

name: Blue Fire: Void of Sorrows
summary:
The Void of Sorrow DLC is an end-game content expansion for Blue Fire that includes:

2 new Areas: the Void Gate, a secret wing of the Fire Keep; and the Sealed Land, a forgotten place hidden away for ages.
16 new mind-blowing Voids which will have you prove your limit
1 new epic boss fight where you'll uncover an unbelievable truth
Several hours of new gameplay
Exclusive tunics, swords and a new NPC
Lore expansion & cutscenes

name: Black Clover: Quartet Knights - Royal Magic Knight Set: Wizard King
summary: DLC2 includes the Wizard King, Julius, as a playable character, as well as the new "Sea Goddess" outfit for Noelle.

name: Black Clover: Quartet Knights - Royal Magic Knight Set: Blue
summary: Add-on installment #1 includes the new playable character Charlotte and a new Japanese-style outfit for Yami.

name: Block Hopper
summary:
Help the spunky and optimistic robot, Bit, avoid certain doom by placing Blocks in this exciting 2D puzzle/platformer! Place them wisely as you run, hop, and think your way to the Goal of Block Hopper!
Inspired by the great platformers of yesteryear, Block Hopper has Bit, and he will have to use moving platforms, conveyor belts, springboards, disappearing blocks, and switches that activate different kinds of gates.

name: Blocks Tracks Trains
summary: A relaxing sandbox train set diorama. Build your world, create buildings, set up your track network, and watch your trains go.

name: Bloody Downsizing
summary: Survive the onslaught in "Bloody Downsizing," a rogue-lite arena shooter set in a cutthroat corporate world. Play as John Varga, a financial analyst, thrust into a chaotic battle for survival. Customize your profile, power up, and harness the epic slow-motion feature to deliver jaw-dropping kills.

name: Blockman 1988
summary:
Blockman 1988 is a retro-inspired twin-stick platformer-shooter that's a sequel to a Flash game from 2007, but it's really a prequel.

Join John Q. Blockman is on a quest to rescue hostages from and around the Valleyvale Shopping Mall. Use some of your cunning - no, all of your cunning - to thwart the evil, maybe-French, maybe-Canadian, maybe-Iranian terrorists cell's plot.

name: Blockchain Brawlers
summary: Welcome to the Brawlerverse. Blockchain Brawlers is a PvP Web3 fighting game designed by Magic: The Gathering mastermind Richard Garfield and developed by Tyranno Studios. In this battle of strategy and suplexes, legions of glory-eyed grapplers go at it to prove who is Brawl mighty

name: Bloody Roar Extreme
summary: Bloody Roar Extreme is the Xbox version of Bloody Roar Primal Fury first released on the Nintendo GameCube. This version includes a new character, CGI cutscenes and hidden game modes.

name: Blockpost Mobile
summary: Blockpost Mobile is a new tactical shooter from the cubic game universe by Skullcap Studios. Keeping the hurricane character of the classic online FPS, the game sets a new level of gameplay, at the junction of the most popular and relevant genres.

name: Blobek
summary: Speed ACTION! Excellent soundtrack! Fast JUMP! Disaster! RAMPAGE! ENERGY!

name: Blood Exile
summary: Blood Exile is an arcade top down shooter with elements of procedural generation. Immerse yourself in the ancient world of magic, protecting it from the invasion of the undead.

name: Black Cycle
summary: Consumers have power. A short walking simulator game that makes you think a little about how we normally consume.

name: Blacklight: Retribution - Evacuation Pack
summary: Dominate the opposition with some of the best items released in the Evacuation update. Scope and drop 'em with the one-shot Anti-Materiel Rifle, or set off your own fireworks with the Breach Loaded Pistol flare gun.

name: Blazing Sails: Barbary Corsair Pack
summary: This exotic looking set of cosmetics is inspired on the Barbary pirates of old! The DLC contains 6 unique variations of the epic set and includes 2 different turban designs.

name: Blazing Sails: Conquistador Pack
summary: Fit yourself out as a Conquistador through this “Age of Discovery” inspired armor set!

name: Blazing Sails: Crab Lord Pack
summary: Embrace your true calling as “Lord of the Crabs” via this epic crab-inspired costume set!

name: Blazing Sails: Privateer Pack
summary: Want to look like a well-equipped pirate hunting Captain? Then this is the pack for you! This DLC grants you the full exclusive privateer outfit and ship customization in 4 different colour variations.

name: Bleak Dystopia
summary: Bleak Dystopia is a first-person episodic, cinematic adventure, where you witness a dystopian society and explore the tragic life story of such society’s denizens.

name: Blazing Beaks + Badland: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Stay sharp as danger lurks around every corner in these two colorful but twisted worlds.

name: Blasphemous: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: A foul curse has fallen upon the land of Cvstodia and all its inhabitants - it is simply known as The Miracle. Do you wish to cleanse the land and help the people of Cvstodia? Then the Blasphemous Digital Deluxe Edition is what you seek.

name: Black Squad Royal Road
summary: Black Squad Royal Road is Newest version of Black Squad Classic, first-person-shooter game.

name: Blood Samurai: Night of Slaughter
summary: Bloody Samurai is a dark style fighting platform and trap adventure game. The game requires strategic thinking and memory with special attention to avoiding traps. In the game, you will be in the role of a samurai. The evil demon hurt your family. In order to avenge you need to challenge many levels and finally fight the demon boss.

name: Bluff: Fun Family Card Game
summary:
Bluff is another very popular card game which all love to play as it is funny as well as sharpen your guessing skills.
The objective of Bluff card game is to get rid of all your cards as fast as you can, and before all the other players.

name: Black Relic
summary: Black Relic is a dark, atmospheric third-person shooter about a monk who must hunt down the pagan cultists who have stolen the holy relic of his order, which he is sworn to protect. It was created as part of Dread X Collection: The Hunt, which is a collection of 7 spooky shooters by some of the best indie horror developers out there.

name: Blood Island
summary:
Become the Final Girl or Guy (or anything in between) of your dreams on Blood Island.

You're a new contestant on the hit reality dating show Passion in Paradise, where you can be who you want and date who you want. There's only one problem. Shortly after the season starts, you discover there's an uninvited guest on the island: a killer who stalks you and the others in a plastic Barbie mask. Who will live and who will die? That's up to you and the choices you make. Will you play the role of traditional Final "Girl" or show us something new entirely?

name: Bleach vs Naruto
summary: A high-flying brawler with fast paced, high power combat with chibby character designs based on animes

name: Blinest
summary: Blinest is a free multiplayer music quiz site. Challenge other players in the many categories: General, French Song, 2010s, Disney, Rap, etc. Join a team to share points and make the counters explode.

name: Blood Wizard Odyssey
summary: An absurd comedy turn-based RPG about wizards in a blood world.

name: BlackMUD
summary:
The world of Entia is again at war. The forces of chaos once again seek to destroy the world itself. It is a time of fear and darkness. It is a time for those with courage, to step forward and defend their beliefs, and their very existence.

BlackMUD is a Diku/Silly based MUD, although it has become something far more than either. The world of Entia is a wonderous and challenging place. It boasts over 90 original areas, made up of 35000 crafted rooms (and growing), all designed around a comprehensive world theme and history.

Good role-playing is encouraged and rewarded, although not required. With a wide array of races, cities, classes and sub-classes, BlackMUD offers the player a wide world of adventure and excitement.

name: Blue's Birthday
summary: Blue's Birthday is a PC game released on September 8, 1998 by Humongous Entertainment.

name: Black Eyes
summary:
Black Eyes is a atmospheric VHS aesthetic styled horror title inspired by the urban legend of black eyed kids and inspired by the title Among The Sleep.

A short horror game for the Halloween season made in a few days!

One late evening you awake from a nightmare about a girl with black eyes, suddenly reality shifts and contorts and you feel something sinister trying to get in your room. You must now prevent whatever it is from trying to get in, while also finding a way out of your room and help get to your sisters room before it's too late.

name: Blut Club
summary: On that cold and early morning of 2003, you stumble upon a lost mobile phone... Piece together elements of that tragic night in this short horror experience.

name: Black/Matrix II
summary:
Rage was one of the four Great Generals of the Demon Army, but he was slain in a battle against the Angels. He has recently been revived, but has lost all memories of his previous life. With the war between Demons and Angels still continuing with no end in sight, he must restore his power and build his forces back up to strike back against the Angel Army.

Black/Matrix II is a turn-based tactical strategy game similar in structure to Final Fantasy Tactics, and the sequel to Black/Matrix. Characters level up and learn abilities individually, and it is possible to recruit a variety of characters, though only 6 at a time can be deployed into a battle. There are also several different romantic interests to pursue, with multiple endings for each depending on the player's choices throughout the game.

name: Black Cat: Kikai Shikake no Tenshi
summary: Black Cat: Kikai Shikake no Tenshi is a Action RPG video game published by Capcom released on March 30th, 2006 for the PlayStation 2.

name: Black Mesa: Xen
summary: Black Mesa: Xen is an update to the game Black Mesa that completely reimagined and refined the Xen levels in the single player campaign.

name: Blasphemous: Strife & Ruin
summary: Join forces with Miriam from Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night as you seek to solve the mystery of her summoning to the nightmarish lands of Cvstodia.

name: Block Champ
summary: Block Champ is a puzzle game where players must clear lines in a 10x10 grid, while making sure there's enough space to put in the next batch of pieces. Clearing multiple lines in a row increases the score multiplier permanently.

name: Black Mesa: Definitive Edition
summary: Black Mesa: Definitive Edition includes performance improvements with a higher frame rate in some levels and visual upgrades, as well as all new and expanded Xen levels.

name: Blue Lock Project: World Champion
summary:
Blue Lock Project: World Champion, based on the TV soccer anime "Blue Lock".
Players can enjoy their amazing storyline while raising the striker, form the strongest team, engage in fierce battles with rivals!
Players cab also relive the original story of the anime and fully enjoy the worldview of Blue Lock.

name: Blob Beats
summary: Classical music, arcade style.

name: Black Room
summary: "Black Room," is a browser-based, narrative game about falling asleep while on your computer, on the internet. You play as an insomniac on the verge of sleep, moving through shifting states of consciousness. Hallucinatory, pixelated visions of landscapes filled with sprites ripped directly from the arcade/NES/SNES video games of your childhood appear and disappear as you click through fragile internet spaces. Point-n-click mini games are scattered throughout the narrative.

name: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever - Reveal the Power
summary: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever - Reveal the Power is mobile exclusive browser game by McDonald's made to promote the movie Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.

name: Bluey Wackadoo Watch
summary: Let’s play with Bluey, Bingo and the Wackadoo Watch! This wristwatch for kids featuring Bluey includes eight digital clock faces, time tools and four games. Hear the voices of Bluey and Bingo guide you through games that include characters from the show.

name: Black Sheep
summary: The gameplay is very simple, the player has to press the direction button in which a single sheep is facing.

name: Blackbox
summary: A factory-building real-time strategy game.

name: Block Jumper
summary: Jump, shoot, and duck your way through various assortments of blocks, spikes, and coins.

name: Bloons Bomb Gem 3 Match
summary: In a certain mysterious corner, there are rich gems of all kinds. A group of alchemists lived in the elf tribe. Suddenly one day, elves from another clans broke into them, competing for their gems.

name: Blacksmith Forger
summary: Blacksmith Forger, We are a forge, We can craft Gold ingots and Iron ingots as well as Weapons and Shields. Our customers order weapons and shields. You have to catch up with them! If they wait too long, they get bored.

name: Blue Sky
summary: Blue Sky is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Blood Bowl 3: Black Orcs Edition
summary: Fashion is not exactly a priority for Black Orcs… but intimidation, on the other hand, now we're talking! Demand respect with the Black Orcs Edition. It includes customization Items for a Goblin, Troll and Black Orc.

name: Blast Royale
summary:
Welcome to Blast Royale!

Blast Royale is the next evolution of Battle Royale games, putting players and our community first. This is your game, your battle, and your way to play!

Players are pitted against each other in a last person standing Battle Royale survival match. A player’s inventory influences the quality of items found on the battlefield, allowing players to create custom builds to suit their own playstyle. Plan, strategise and execute to dominate the battlefield.

Uniquely, players can also fully own their own items where they can buy, sell and trade them on the Blast Royale marketplace.

name: Black White Bear
summary: An interacting story about the life journey of a strange colored bear.

name: Black Evil 2
summary: Black Evil 2 is an horror puzzle action game in FPS. The game takes place in an obscure and realistic environment that will test the survival skills of the player. Look around yourself and use the objects wisely. Fear and stress will not leave you...

name: Blackjack Thunder
summary:
Blackjack thunder is the coolest blackjack game with real time fun and experience. Grab this offine casino games to have Blackjack multiplayer fun.This casino game blackjack for your device to get gambling and casino betting fun on your hands.
Are you ready to play in High Roller Tables ? If So, try our new tables wherein minimum bet to enter is high and there is no limit for maximum bet! Play the most realistic blackjack Simulation of casino card game with options to surrender, split or Double the deal.

name: Blogick
summary:
Blogick is a block puzzle game for all players who love logic puzzles.
Follow the blocks, remove obstructive blocks, find hidden routes and lead the yellow character
(mouse, dog or some kind of monster) to the goal.

name: Block Puzzle: Gem Legend
summary: Block Puzzle: Gem Legend is one of the tetra puzzle games, but it's harder. With the given block, you can arrange it anywhere into the grid. However, you will see 3 blocks in the same time and think to build much full lines as possible. Because the more blocks are shattered the more the score higher.

name: Block by Block: Sliding Blocks
summary:
During the game you forget about time.
If you enjoy the kind of games with lots of jewels, gems or bubbles you will definitely love Block by Block.
Sense of this game is to remove all blocks from the board.
To do this, click on the blocks with an arrow outside the playing field. The block will begin to move in the indicated direction.
If three or more of the same color blocks form a group, they will disappear.
When the playing field will be cleared of the blocks, level will be passed.
A good game to relax and unwind.

name: Blood Magic
summary: Blood Magic is a magic-based mod for Minecraft created by WayofTime and maintained by TehNut. It adds an expansive life-based magic system that spans rituals, sacrifices, summoning, alchemy, and spell creation.

name: Blocky 6
summary:
Blocky 6 is a challenging puzzle game that you won't be able to put down.
Warning: Each "blocky" only lasts for few turns before turning into rock!
How long can you prevent the rock from filling the board.

name: Blocky Warriors: Amazing Race
summary: Welcome to Blocky Warriors! This is a real-time running game with characters of Blocky style. Try to outrun 3 other players in real-time battle and become the best player in the world! If someone blocks your way, just use your skills to smash the enemy!

name: Blowup!!
summary: Time to gear up!!! Blowup!! is an iOS puzzle game where you try to connect eight or more of the same colored blocks to blow them up. Developed by Cravemob, the application works on the iPhone, iPod Touch and the iPad. Try to connect as many of the same colored blocks to transform them into robots which in turn will blow up. The music in this game changes depending on how far you can last. One song can have a variety of mixes which adds an addictive quality to the game just to hear them all.

name: Black Eye
summary:
Play puzzle game to earn points and collect "Eyes" for the game "Capture The Flag".
Play multiplayer stratygy game "Capture The Flag" to beat your friends or other people playing this game and conquer more "Eyes".
Both games have animated Tutorials.
More Games:

name: Black Eye Spin
summary:
Black Eye Spin continues series of puzzle-multiplayer games.
Playing this game you have to spin the wheel and catch colored balls. 3 or more adjacent one color balls explode and create X balls. X balls create higher value X balls. Highest is black ball. We call it Black Eye. Wheel has only 16 slots. So it will be good exercise for your brain trying not to fill all the slots otherwise the game will end.
All created X balls will be collected and can be used in multiplayer game Black Eye World – another same series game.

name: Blocki!
summary:
Blocki! is a unique game you haven't seen before. Guide a bird on the board to collect all the scattered pieces and create the displayed shape. Evaluate your logical thinking ability, reflexes, accuracy and creativity. If you're up for a brand new brain teaser you found the right place.
Test your intuition and explore beautifully hand crafted puzzle levels!

name: Blocks Hurt!
summary:
Play with blocks in a way you never imagined!
Freaky creatures are coming for you… Stop them! Unchain your deadly blocks, match them, stack them or hurl them against this parade of bizarre monsters!
Are you ready for the most unconventional matching block experience!?

name: Bloody Lonely Cold
summary: Bloody Lonely Cold is a survival horror game from a first-person perspective. In a future large Japanese hospital. There is a brave beautiful girl who bravely faced monsters in order to survive. When you are with her, don't panic, don't be afraid.

name: Bloodborne Kart
summary:
Bloodborne Kart was an unofficial fan game made by the community. Race through the streets of Yharnam and beyond with a wide array of vehicles, ranging from traditional karts to motorcycles to wheelchairs!

Days before its intended release on January 26th, 2024, Sony requested the removal of copyrighted content from the game. The game was delayed and was reworked into Nightmare Kart.

name: Blade of Darkness
summary: A portal from the abyss appeared in the town. In order to protect the town, the protagonist of the warrior decided to enter the portal to prevent the invasion of the abyss.

name: Blocky.Go!
summary: Fun platformer to play when bored

name: Blue Funk
summary: This is a tower defense type of casual game, suitable for you to pass the time when bored. In the game, enemies stream out of the portal, and you can destroy them by building defense towers. For each enemy killed, you get a certain amount of gold. Since enemies get stronger as the game progresses, you'll need to build new towers with the gold you earn. When the total number of enemies exceeds a certain number, the game is over. Of course, you can also buy items in the store, and with the items you buy in the store, you can kill a certain number of enemies in an instant.

name: Blocky
summary: The Smilies are feeling blocked in and sad! Help them escape - and make them giggle - by clicking and dragging a rectangle with four like-colored corners.

name: Block Dizzy
summary:
This game was created by a reader of Your Sinclair, Arno van der Hulst, and sent in to them for inclusion on their Cover Tape.

It appeared with Issue 81, dated September 1992, as part of their Magnificent 7 series of cover mounted cassettes.

The idea of the game is to plonk together three or more blocks of one colour, causing them to disappear from the play area. You can't alter the orientation of the blocks, but by pressing fire you can rotate the colours. Once you've connected enough blocks to reduce the number at the right hand side of the screen to zero, you move on to the next level.

The instructions in the magazine state that choosing the 'Kempston Joystick' option in the menu won't work.

name: Bleak Sword DX
summary: Discover and destroy increasingly horrifying creatures across an oppressive lofi world, wielding fierce weaponry and powerful magic in this pocket-sized action adventure.

name: Blast Beats
summary: Blast Beats is an Insane 1-Tap Rhythm Game with a Power Packed Soundtrack & Retro Pixel Art Aesthetic.

name: Blade of Destiny: Enter the Phoenix
summary: A story-rich episodic JRPG with a classic 1990’s feel. Experience a huge fantasy game world to explore, character customization, NON-random turn-based combat, and just the right amount of puzzle solving.

name: Block Corsair
summary: Block Corsair is a game in which you play as an air pirate in a world where airships come and go, engage in battles and loot, strengthen your own airship, and loot some more.

name: Blightseeker
summary: Jump and dash through unknown, labyrinthine worlds in this VR adventure. Fight back against maddened creatures, or cure them of the blight that fuels their rage. Collect treasures, tools, and powers as you search for the source of this ancient ill, and decide whether to quell or unleash it.

name: Blockappend
summary: A 3D puzzle game where you append blocks to each other by flipping them around.

name: Blind Sound
summary: Blind Sound is a Game about, Exploration and Puzzle-solving. This is a Linear Story Based horror game which sets in a massive science facility in 2015. You will discover tons of thing and find out about the Creepy history of this facility with Full of Subjects That extremely Dangerous.

name: Blocktiful
summary: A relaxing puzzle game where you combine resources and create your own amazing world.

name: BlueTricks
summary: All five members of our team are majoring in game science and like to make games. Our team will grow into a company that can compete with 3N within 10 years, and we are working together to create games to create the new world of contents.

name: Blacklight
summary: A combo-oriented fighting game with a simple system. Players who are familiar with fighting games will be able to play right away thanks to its responsiveness and ease of understanding! Fly, run, solidify, and collapse!

name: Blood Red
summary: Blood Red is a co-op survival horror game that can be played with 1-4 players. Hunt down demons by forming rituals, find out the demon type and banish the demon forever!

name: Blooper's Revenge
summary: Blooper's Revenge is a platformer starring a Blooper created by Pyro. It is Pyro's first game, and consists of five worlds and a bonus world. Its events take place when Toads supposedly take over and pollute Blooper's homeland, and it must get it back.

name: Blue Reflection: Second Light - Ultimate Edition
Blaster Master Zero: Ex Character - Ekoro
summary:
Ekoro joins the underground adventure as a playable character in EX Character Mode!
Take control of her angelic weaponry and give those mutants a taste of your love!

name: Blaster Master Zero: Ex Character - Gunvolt
summary:
Gunvolt joins the underground adventure as a playable character in EX Character Mode!
Take control of his "Flashfield" and "Prevasion" abilities and give those mutants the shock of a lifetime!

name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Additional Character Pack Vol.1 to Vol.7
Blue Oddities: The Final Chapter
summary:
Blue Oddities is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, a point and click horror game in the Oddities series, and is a sequel to Green Oddities.
It is created by the Radiance Team and was mentioned to be the final chapter of the game.

name: Black Lily's Tale
summary: Maybe it was the curse of the black lilies that bloomed early in the winter - A girl falls in love with a girl before graduation. Her pure feelings are torn apart by a "tragic loop". You will weave her feelings by interrupting choices and typing letters.

name: Blood Rite
summary: A gruesome human resources game. Mine gems to spawn new minions. Sacrifice these minions to keep ahead of the fire. Then use their blood for special powers like shields, power-ups, and daggers to defeat incoming foes. Towers will turn minions into archers, electrocutioners or human crossbow bolts.

name: Blackout Hospital
summary: When the power goes out while working night shift in the hospital, the emergency lights come on with an eerie glow...

name: Blood Rot: 1918
summary: Blood Rot: 1918 has players fighting against hordes of the undead in the midst of The Great War. Survive solo, or with friends in this first-person zombie shooter.

name: Blightlands Blacksmith
summary: Blightlands Blacksmith is a medieval fantasy blacksmithing simulator with exploration and combat elements. Mine, smelt, forge, assemble, grind, and rune-craft weapons to supply a legion cohort, and defend yourself as you delve into the mine for new materials. The cohort's success depends on you.

name: Blood Bottom
summary: Blood Bottom is a Survival Horror sandbox, Lovecraftian themed and an industrial ambience on the shores of a secluded coastal town, in the bowels of a mysterious factory where the protagonist will have to escape from a living nightmare that is linked to his own existence and why he is there.

name: BlackJack Math Cross Numbers
summary: Tease your brain in this ambient logic game where you have to make the math match 21 as a result horizontal and vertically (because we're talking about blackjack, right?) Swap the cards, make the math, repeat. That's all you'll need in order to complete this game!

name: Blockd Blast
summary: Blockd Blast is a drag and drop block puzzle for players of any age! Join users from all around the world in this block puzzle mania and be a part of the infinite craze. Pop the blocks to last as long as possible before the game board fills up and get the highest score!

name: Blocky Roads Winterland
summary:
Jump into your car and discover the snowy mountains of Winterland!
Oh no, your animals wandered away from your farm. Hurry find them before they freeze outside!

name: Blue Wednesday: Prologue
summary: An experience filled with stories and music See the world through the eyes of jazz pianist, Morris. takes you through a dream-like adventure through jazz and love, and failure.

name: Blocky Balloons
summary: Blocky Balloons is a block-pushing "sokoban-like" puzzle game. Push, slide, and undo your way through 40+ puzzles to get those balloons!

name: Blood Bowl 3: Imperial Nobility Edition
summary: The Emperor obviously expects his players to look very distinguished. Stand out from the rabble with the Imperial Nobility Edition. It includes customization Items for a Blitzer, Ogre and Thrower.

name: Block Breaker 3 Unlimited
summary:
An arcade game by Gameloft.
Break on through to the next generation of Block Breaker! Experience deeper, more intricate levels that take you beyond a single screen full of blocks. Grab power-ups, trigger switches and blast through gateways to reach new areas as you push your way towards the top. Try to keep up with multiple balls on the same screen, or even multiple pads! The thrill never stops thanks to the level generator. Enemies and epic boss battles await you each step of the way, so stay focused and have a blast!

name: Bloody Horror Plant
summary: Bloody Horror Plant – probably the bloodiest casual point and click adventure game ever! Help Horror Plant solve interesting and funny point and click puzzles, kill evil dwarfs, save the forest and its creatures!

name: Blood 'N Bullets
summary: Blood 'N Bullets is a top down roguelike shooter where your ammo, health and currency are one and the same. You play as a vampire stuck in a prison and have to shoot your way out while your "friend" helps you with upgrades.

name: Blood & Ash
summary: Blood and Ash is an exciting Action RPG game set in a dark fantasy world with an isometric perspective

name: Blood Pact
summary: Blood Pact is a queer erotica Twine series about a trans girl named Alexa who accidentally unleashes Felanya, a domineering trans succubus. The story follows their exploits as Alexa enters into a D/s relationship with Felanya and embraces their sapphic occult Blood Pact.

name: Blood Pact: Premium Edition
summary: Blood Pact Premium Edition includes Nikatine's new narration from the December 2019 free update, three new illustrations, and all artwork colored by Callie. Enjoy Blood Pact the way it was envisioned. Downloads also include bonus high resolution images for all in-game art from both the premium and free Blood Pact releases.

name: Block Brain
summary:
Tackle one of the toughest puzzle games available!
Block Brain challenges you to figure things out for yourself. Unlock a dozen different gadgets and use them to solve increasingly difficult puzzles. Only the brave and persistent will reach the end.

name: Blood Strike
summary: Charge into fast paced combat in modes such as Battle Royale, Squad Fight or Hot Zone alone or with friends. Blood Strike offers a wide range of playable Strikers, each with a unique active and passive ability letting you deploy drones, shield walls and everything in between. Customize your weapons to your liking and get ready to prove that you have what it takes to come out on top!

name: Bloom Barrage
summary: Join Skip, the energetic mouse lemur, as he progresses to become the Bloom Barrage festival champion. Compete in various fun objectives to learn planting, skill-shots, and power-ups with Serena, the helpful panda. Overcome challenges posed by Thoreau, the grumpy iguana and Connie, the sly lynx. Level up and unlock seed equipment to increase seed projectile speed, plant growth rate, and player movement speed.

name: Blacksmith Master
summary: Manage your own medieval smithy in Blacksmith Master and supervise the entire process from mining ores and gems to designing and selling finished products. Forge everything from weapons and armor to tools and cooking utensils to fund your craft and become the Blacksmith Master.

name: Bloodshell: Conviction
summary: A dark psychological Visual Novel. Follow Iris a young girl in her quest to take back her life!

name: Block Bros.
summary: Looking for Mario Maker on iPhone/Android? Block Bros. is a challenging online action game with features more of everything you love! Jump, climb, kick and dash through the ever-expanding selection of levels! Stages can be created by YOU or your fellow players to showcase a tremendous variety in design and difficulty!

name: Block Puzzle Pop!!
summary:
Great fun and easy to play! Anyone can pick up and play Block Puzzle Pop!
Find and tap 2 or more blocks of the same color.
Blocks are cleared when their colors match.
Try tapping more than 2 block to get a high score.
Block Puzzle POP features colorful rules and methods that anyone can pick up and learn quickly.

name: Black Reliquary
summary: Black Reliquary is a total conversion mod for Darkest Dungeon, one which makes sweeping overhauls to gameplay, adds a new story, a new setting, new narration, new music, new enemies, and so very much more. Embark into the distant east and uncover the ancient secrets of the Black Reliquary!

name: Blight Night: You Are Not Safe
summary:
Video may have killed the radio star, but a supposed flu outbreak may have killed humanity leaving one man to survive the horrors of the aftermath.
West Texas, 1986. Sonny Barstow relished small-town life. The ever looming mystery of why he awoke seemingly untouched by the ravages of the bizarre outbreak.
Part 1980s horror flick, part puzzle-solving adventure, Blight Night shoots for exceptional exploration and discovery — without sacrificing the splatterfest.

name: Blades Away
summary:
Physics based, 2D blade throwing simulation game with lots of unique blades to collect and master.
Knife throwing has never been this easy to pick up and this challenging to fully master. Throw axes, knives, swords, ninja stars and other blades from all across the world. Huge rewards for skill and perception.

name: Blitzkrieg: Toubu Sensen 1941-45
summary: World War II strategy game, based upon the Operation Barbarossa.

name: Blue Knight
summary: Explore an alien planet in a mission to clear it of enemy threats, ready for a new human colony. Pixel rich game with cool twists.

name: Blondes
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Blind and Schizophrenic
summary: Fornicate with hookers, smoke weed, or just sit at home collecting welfare, how will you spend your life as a blind old man with schizophrenia? Can you survive even one day as this poor, decrepit wretch? Or will you show the world that it should pay attention to irate old farts with nothing to lose?

name: Blueprint 3D
summary: Each level begins with a mysterious clutter of seemingly chaotic dots and lines. Underneath all the chaos, however, lies a beautiful blueprint image waiting to be uncovered. It’s right there in front of you: Just drag your finger across the screen to rotate the figure, and all of a sudden you’ll notice that the lines start to make sense! Solve the puzzle by rotating the figure in all directions and on all planes until you hit the sweet spot. Once you’re there, the secret picture will reveal itself. Wait till you see this in action!

name: Blazing Ace
summary: “I want to be stronger…” Summer bootcamp has begun!!! Let's make your dream come true!Beast Fella Foundation (BFF), an organization which monitors martial arts competitions among beastmen, has sent you an invitation letter. An unforgettable summer memory ensues.

name: Block Breaker Deluxe
summary: New version of Block Breaker Deluxe (2004), with modernized visuals.

name: Black Cat-astrophe
summary: Black Cat-astrophe is a plug-and-play TV game released by Jakks Pacific in 2005 as part of its Marvel game line. It features Spider-Man in an adventure centered on his encounters with Black Cat. The game connects directly to a television without requiring a separate console. Gameplay focuses on side-scrolling action and platforming accessible to a broad audience.

name: Block & Balls
summary: A 2D arcade-ish physics based game in which you can play fun, creative, challenging and extremely difficult levels, create your own levels or compete against your friends and players around the globe or try some experimental gamemodes in the arcade! Block & Balls has all this and more!

name: Bloodcrave
summary: In Bloodcrave, immerse yourself in a thrilling vampire-themed visual novel with six love interests, animated scenes, and decision-driven storytelling. Will you lead your companions down the path of virtue or succumb to the lure of darkness? The choice is yours.

name: Blade Prince Academy
summary: Blade Prince Academy is a modern take on the tactical RPG genre! It features an anime-inspired art style with dynamic and deep tactical real-time combat with emphasis on timing and combos. Experience the unique city of Abjectalia while becoming a true master of enhanced real-time-with-pause gameplay

name: Bleeding Deities
summary: Bleeding Deities is a hand-drawn action-adventure 2D platformer inspired in the ancient tribes. A Ruthless World with Dark Secrets and Evil Deities Go in search of the Legendary Baktun Stone and bring the peace back to your people ​ ​

name: BloodDome99
summary: 80s/90s arcade cabinet meets modern horde-survival roguelike. Create unique builds, master 20+ weapons, and kill ever-growing hordes of contestants in the retro-futuristic gladiator gameshow BloodDome99.

name: Blood Sunset
summary: Blood Sunset is an open-world, post-apocalyptic, survival RPG. You happen to find yourself on old deserted islands... full of zombies. You'll have to survive, kill, run away, get food, and resources.

name: Bloxs
summary: Bloxs is a 3rd person 3D platformer game where your goal is to collect as many coins as possible to win a house.

name: Blow Away
summary: Blow Away is a casual action game with unique elements of "manual attack," "knockdown" and "blow away "in addition to the Rogue-lite elements. You can also defeat enemies, develop characters, and learn powerful auto-activated skills. Use them to defeat the enemy's large army and powerful boss.

name: Blade of the Netherworld
summary: You, who has signed a contract with the Netherworld, will find and kill these dangerous monsters. As the Blade of the Netherworld, you will experience a series of thrilling battles and challenges to keep the balance between the living and the dead.

name: BlockRunner: The BlockSide
summary: Get through levels and fight some crazy bosses or just try to beat your high score in endless mode in this bullet hell type of a game! Stuff may happen or change when its least expected!

name: Blender Express HD
summary: Choose from gorgeous retina display themes, where you’ll have to catch falling fruit with your specialized blender to create the perfect smoothie. Watch out for the rotten/poisoned fruit! Blender express offers hours of addictive gameplay through 100 different levels ( and more coming soon ! ) to keep the whole family fully entertained and satisfied. Catch the right fruit, earn 3 stars and bring the fun into your home kitchen with a real life recipe at your fingertips.

name: Blue Flow
summary:
2005 real-time mecha strategy game by Kogado Studio's Iruka Team. Released for Windows PCs. Prequel to the 2006 title Blue Blaster.

Created as an attempt to make a more beginner-friendly version of Power Dolls, however the gameplay resembles something akin to Rasetsu, also developed by Iruka Team.

The story is told through Visual Novel sections along with events during combat sections.

name: Blade Abyss
summary: "Blade Abyss: Death Raid" is a skill-driven hardcore action game, blending precise parry, dynamic movement, and tactical axe throws. Face demonic bosses and zombie hordes in fast-paced combat—no gear, no grind, only pure mastery of mechanics. Your reflexes are the ultimate weapon.

name: Blood Strike
summary: Blood Strike is a free FPS game which has more than 300 million faithful players in China. Now the battle is on, there are various modes and weapons for you to explore! Call your friends and join us,get into the battle field now!

name: Bloons But You're the Bloon
summary: Bloons is a popular online game where players use a monkey character to pop balloons bloons using various weapons and tools. In this version of the game, "Bloons but you're the bloon," the player takes on the role of a bloon and must evade being popped by the monkey characters. As the bloon, the player will navigate through different levels, each with their unique challenges and obstacles. The player must avoid the monkey's attacks, such as darts, bombs, and boomerangs, and find ways to get past the monkey's defenses. To do this, the bloon has a range of abilities and upgrades that can be earned throughout the game. The player can customize their bloon by choosing different types of bloons, each with unique abilities and weaknesses. As the player progresses through the game, the monkey characters become more challenging, and the levels become more difficult. The ultimate goal of the game is to make it through all the levels without getting popped by the monkeys.

name: BlockPath
summary: BlockPath is a minimalist puzzle game where players must draw a continuous path to fill the entire grid. The challenge lies in navigating through increasingly complex levels without retracing steps or leaving tiles untouched.

name: Blue
summary: The player controls a frog and must collect items across the bubbles.

name: Block!
summary: “Block!” is an exciting block fitting game. Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages. Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids. From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!

name: Blooby Block
summary: Help Block rescue his friends from the terrible bluebies. This cube pushing puzle Game is an evolution of the clasic sokoban/box pushing type games in a multilevel 3D. Enemies, spells and traps add another level of complexity. The difficulty grows fast, and the puzles become unforgiving very soon.

name: Bloons Supermonkey 2
summary: Level-based vertical shooter based on the Bloons franchise of games. Customise your Supermonkey with various weapons and use limited powerups to find the right combination to beat each of the 100 levels with a perfect score.

name: Block Force
summary: Block Force is a port of Quarth originally developed by Konami. It was made by Hwang Jiun-Ming, a relative of Hwang Shinwei and released in 1990. The game was often included in multicarts released by RCM Group between 1990 and 1991.

name: Bleach: Zanpakutou Senshi
summary: The mod features a technical hack 'n' slash combat style, where you can fight in a team deathmatch as Ichigo or Grimmjow.

name: Blood Pivot
summary: Get ready for a heart-stopping experience with Blood Pivot, an electrifying pixel top-down indie game. Fight against demons and cultists in this horror game while trying to know the background of it all. Enter the world of Blood Pivot if you dare. But do you even have a choice?

name: Blue Maiden
summary: A slow-burning, psychological horror walking sim set in a haunted Japanese neighborhood.

name: Blade Crafter
summary:
Are you bored? Craft the Legendary Blade right now!
Your weapon will move around and fight on its own, as if it's alive.

name: Blocky Granny Mod chapter One
summary: This fun simulator game is an escape horror granny game, you have been chased and captured by awful blocky granny and locked you on this horror house in order not let you escape, granny hides keys in her treasure chests, so after finding them and collect all the keys and object escape the horror house.

name: Block Craft Racing
summary:
Block Craft Racing is an exciting new rally game with a fantastic mine and craft style that people have come to love. Simplistic and exciting it really brings a new thing to the racing genre. With 12 fun races plus new ones added for free.
Select your vehicle and camera affect to have a unique race, changing every time and adding something a little special. Watch for obstructions that are on the track, they will slow you down.
Every time you finish a race you'll win a prize based on your position. Win enough dollars and you can craft your block ride to really leave the competition in the dirt.

name: Blobi Sprint
summary: One button fast tapping game for 2-4 players. Tap the button as fast as you can to stay on screen and win!

name: Block Puzzle
summary: Drop the blocks to create vertically or horizontally lines of blocks without gaps. When such a line is created, it gets destroyed. Keep your board clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this simple but addictive puzzle game!

name: Blood Gazm
summary: Bloodgazm - action game where players fight against waves of aliens to save their planet. There are three arenas, powerful weapons, and retro-style graphics with breakcore music. The game has mixed reviews and is recommended for fans of challenging action games with retro aesthetics.

name: Bleeding Canvas
summary:
Your college crush, Mikey, seems to be the perfect boy for you: He’s artsy, yet extroverted; sometimes a bit stupid and socially inept. But that’s why you love him. You didn’t think you had a chance with him, as you only ever talked to him in passing conversations, but when you try to follow him home you discover something about him that definitely proves his undying love for you…

There are four endings. Two bad endings, a good ending, and a not-so-secret secret ending.

name: Blindsight: War of the Wardens
summary: Blindsight: War of the Wardens, a story-driven action-adventure game where you play as Iggy, a martial arts master with echolocation abilities, as he retrieves a stolen family heirloom that may bring unintended consequences to the universe.

name: Blast Attack
summary: A short top-down game about dodging bullets and shooting a variety of enemies. Your arsenal evolves as you collect power-ups. Use a charged blast attack to destroy magenta shields and dashes to destroy cyan shields while fighting 6 different enemy types that can make use of shields and dashes.

name: Blaster Arcade
summary: Wanna Arcade?

name: Blaster Panic
summary: Blaster Panic is a 2D space shooter where you defend your home base against an onslaught of enemies. Fight through ongoing boss battles. Last as long as you can to dominate the leaderboard.

name: BlockMill
summary:
Get ready to own buildings, streets or even neighborhoods in BlockMill, the exciting new social game and platform where real estate meets the virtual world! Blurring the lines of reality and the metaverse, in BlockMill you can buy any building you love from the real world around you, with everyone playing on the same map.

BlockMill is packed with fun missions and challenges that reward you with upgrades, alternatively, skip ahead and buy items that enable you to customize your buildings in ways you never thought possible.. Want to make your home higher than a skyscraper or add a picture of your beloved pet to the roof, or how about snagging a rival sports stadium for your own personal use? The sky really is the limit! If you want to switch up, you can trade buildings with other players, or even gift buildings to friends and family.

And the best part? BlockMill is super accessible and can be played on any device, anywhere in the world, without any downloads! So whether you're on your computer, phone, or tablet, you can start building your global real estate empire today!

name: Bloompunk
summary: Set in a lush world of living plants, in Bloompunk you must use steampunk technology, harness the power of the sun, grow your living arsenal of weapons and abilities, and fight back against an invasive ravenous force to reset the world's natural balance. Enhance your body with deadly weaponry that's a merge of plant and machine in this fast-paced, chaotic frenzy of bullets and thorns.

name: Bloobo
summary: Get ready for hours of physics and fun with Bloobo! Design and test mind-bending physics puzzles in your quest to restore creativity worldwide.

name: BlindJump
summary: Blind Jump is a simple action/adventure game, featuring procedurally generated level maps, collectible items, fluid animation, and meticulously designed color palettes. Evan Bowman started the project in late 2015 while in college, and resumed work on the code after a several year long hiatus, during which he was teaching himself oil painting. Originally developed for macOS, the game was rebuilt from scratch during the 2020 pandemic, with a new custom engine. Blind Jump now compiles for various other platforms, including Linux, Windows, Nintendo Gameboy Advance, and Sony PlayStation Portable.

name: BlackJack Waifu Tour
summary: Feel like in Las Vegas, gamble without spending money at our real blackjack!

name: Black Friday
summary: A text based simulator of Wall Street.

name: Blue Epic
summary: Blue Epic is an ocean survival game where players can play marine creatures to survive; Complete control system included in the game

name: Bloody Doctor
summary: Bloody Doctor is an Action RPG. Control a Doctor facing an epidemic by extracting organs. Fight ennemies and operate on corpses at your lab. Explore an old Steampunk Paris during a strange period.

name: Blackheart
summary: Blackheart is a 2D single-player dark fantasy action RPG centred around the royal Blackheart family and the internal conflicts that are consuming them from the inside out.

name: Blood Lily Ghoststories
summary: A horror game about a needy female ghost. A trio of close-knit occult club girls gather late at night to enjoy telling ghost stories. Little do they know that Miss Choker, a ghost that targets girls, is just dying to appear...

name: Blither
summary: A digital implementation of the board game.

name: Block Breakerz
summary:
Block Breakerz is a fast paced, 4 player, arcade game that blends Breakout and Hungry Hungry Hippos into a party game you just can't stop playing.
Compete solo or against up to three of your friends in 4 different game modes that will have you playing ‘just one more round’ for hours on end.
Block Breakerz is a frantic and fun game for the whole family that you can play anytime and anywhere on your iPad!.

name: Blackpink: The Game
summary:
A whole new journey with Blackpink! Become Blackpink's producer and manage your own agency, solve puzzles to clear schedules for Blackpink.
Customize your members with stunning outfits and play mini-games with your friends in the Blackpink world.

name: Blow Away Survivors
summary: "Blow Away Survivors" is a thrilling casual roguelite action game where you unleash attacks, sending countless enemies flying. Face massive enemy hordes and powerful bosses, level up and grow stronger. Enjoy diverse skills and actions powered by a physics engine, all in short, exciting sessions.

name: Blind Bullet
summary: Shoot towards darkness.Blind Bullet is a top-down 2D shooting game.You're blind in this game.You can see around by echolocation with your footstep sound.This game is under development.You can play by the end of Chapter 1 with demo version.Full version will also be available for free.

name: Block Tower TD
summary: Block Tower TD is a roguelike tower defense strategy game with interesting innovations. Build a world out of blocks, choose random upgrades to make every run unique.

name: Black Finger Jet
summary: "Black Finger JET" is a Run&Gun game. This is a completely new game from a team that has released many action shooting games.

name: BlueSkies
summary: BlueSkies is an RPG game made with RPG maker 2003 featuring an emotionally driven classical RPG atmosphere and an immersive world and plot that you can enjoy!! Follow the tale of Skye and his friends putting an end to a destructive force that threatens the world of "Vyen". As the battle between the humans and celestial beings are far from over.

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 1
summary:
This season includes:
- A new faction
- A new blood pass
- Brand new customisation
- New Competitive Season
And much more!

name: Blockade
summary: Blockade is a desktop puzzle game that takes a different approach towards the match-3 strategic puzzle solving genre.

name: Black, White and Grey
summary: Paige, a girl currently attending university in her hometown, discovers that someone has been following her. Strange noises come from around the house at night, and it seems that danger is near. Everyone's trying to keep their secrets, but circumstances force them to reveal more and more. Who will prevail in the end? It's all up to you.

name: Block Racer
summary: Can you beat all your friends and show them who is the retro arcade hero.

name: Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future
summary: Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future Remaster is a high-definition remaster of the fantasy strategy RPG first released for PSP in May 2010. In addition high-definition visuals, the updated release offers improved operability and tempo, useful features like rewind and auto-save, and various other adjustments that make gameplay more pleasant.

name: Bloba's Adventure
summary: The game will immerse you in an incredibly exciting story, the main character of which is a very good-natured character named Bloba. One day, walking with his pet Kaklya, Bloba made a decision, the consequences of which turned out to be completely unpredictable, based on this, our adventure begins.

name: Blind Fishes
summary: The friendly blind fishes are in danger! Solve the puzzles and save them.

name: Bloom Defender
summary: The Mother Tree, a sacred being capable of producing spiritual energy, is under attack! Defend her by planting and watering trees in this top-down tower-defense game.

name: Blue Nebula
summary: Blue Nebula is a fork of Red Eclipse 1. While the Red Eclipse team have moved their game on to another engine for their latest release, 2.0, this also meant a total conversion of the gameplay. Therefore, a group of eager community members have started to fork off Red Eclipse from the last 1.x series release, setting up the necessary infrastructure to (re-)establish a community around Red Eclipse 1.5+.

name: BlueSuburbia
summary: BlueSuburbia is a haunted world where you explore poems through immersive environments. Seek out dark secrets, confront your demons, and delve deeper into a dream that dances between beautiful and terrible. Explore forgotten dreamscapes and open worlds on your quest to find hope.

name: Bloody Woman
summary: A young man accepts a job in a laundry in the late hours. But he discovers that something terrible has happened there and his life is in danger.

name: Blumen & Muster Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
summary: Solve puzzles of flowers and patterns in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Bloomtown: A Different Story
summary: Bloomtown: A Different Story is a narrative JRPG mixing turn-based combat, monster taming and social RPG set in a seemingly pleasant 1960s Americana world. Join Emily and her group of friends to save their cozy town from the demonic creatures that live in the hearts of its residents!

name: Block x3
summary:
Block x3 is a simple, fun and relaxing puzzle game.
The basics are easy. Solve the puzzles by getting 3 blocks of the same color in a row or column.
Things get challenging however when multiple colors, moving blocks and various puzzle elements are introduced.
If it gets too hard our dynamic hint system will help you by solving only some or all of the puzzle for you.

name: Blade and Burden
summary: Blade and Burden is a rogue lite dungeon crawler where different adventurers slash, roll, and solve their way through a trick filled tower in order to reach their own goals, whether that be to save a kidnapped royal, complete a contracted hit, or just to cure their boredom.

name: Blackout Memphis
summary: Blackout Memphis is a fast topdown shooter, characterized by bloody melees and action-packed gunfights. The demanding gameplay is backed by electronic music that adds a special atmosphere to the gritty and violent action.

name: Blind Frontiers
summary: Embark on an RPG-survival road trip adventure with Niuma, a unique and singular character on a quest to uncover The Eldorado. Navigate through a post-war world marked by limited resources. Explore cities, interact with locals, and manage resources while confronting your stigmas to survive.

name: Blinding Oversight
summary: You play as Emma, who wakes up in an abandoned house without any prior memory of how she ended up there. Investigate your surroundings, uncover the mysteries of the house and connect memories from your past in this first person atmospheric horror game.

name: BlueCloud Summit
summary: BlueCloud Summit is a RPG roguelite deck builder game. The goal is simply to become strong enough to participate in and win a tournament of strength against the strongest people in the world. First you will need to become strong by exploring a diverse world to collect cards, weapons and relics.

name: Blur 2
summary: Blur 2 was a planned sequel to Blur. The game was cancelled due to Bizarre Creations' closure in February 2011. Three prototypes have been dumped, dated August 31, November 9, and November 10, 2010.

name: BloodDome Classic
summary: The Bullet Heaven arcade classic that started it all! Create unique builds, kill ever-growing hordes of contestants and beat your friends' high scores in the retro-futuristic gladiator arena BloodDome.

name: Block and Save
summary:
In this game, your goal is simple : Drag and move your polygons/circles, protect the targets from being knocked out by computer!
You need to win to unlock next stage. Besides winning, you may also target to get more scores : increase the time elapsed at the game, let computer's polygons/circles rush out of arena, or keep your polygons/circles on arena safely!

name: Blood River Base
summary: Welcome to the scenic mountain area known as Blood River Base! This WAD was made in under 64KB and will work in vanilla DOOM II. Traverse large canyons and destroy Hell's legions as the dangerous Blood River flows beneath.

name: Blazing 8s
summary: Blazing 8s is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord. It is our Crazy Eights-inspired card game that you can play with your friends! The rules are simple — on your turn, discard a card from your hand with the same suit or number as the previous card. Playing special cards allows you to skip other players, reverse the direction of play, and even swap hands with other players. The first person to discard all their cards wins!

name: Bladesong
summary: Crafting/management game Bladesong is set on taking swordmaking mechanics to a new level, featuring unparalleled customization of the sword's every detail and deep analysis of the sword's physical properties. Take the role of a swordsmith in the city of Eren Keep, one of mankind’s last standing cities after the gods have banished themselves in an act of desperation. Run your forge, fulfill customer commissions and perfect your craft and tools. Find your way in a city governed by an idolized ruler with an iron grip and build a loyal team of those you deem trustworthy.

name: Bloomyth
summary: Go on this journey, solve the puzzles and overcome the obstacles to discover the secret of the Bloomyth and save a life.

name: Blocks Racing
summary:
Blocks Racing is classic kart racing game madness. Speed your way through 55 unique tracks equipped with shortcuts for advantage. Unlock new racers with varying stats based on the vehicle design.
Collect power-ups to use weapons like missiles or shield boost for competitive advantage against other rival racers. Blocks will fall off the race karts when damaged and eventually break apart. Can you survive and race to the finish line?

name: Blitz Football 2023
summary: An American Football management sim that allows the user to build their own American Football dynasty. Build and manage a team ready for the big games, with a mix of newly drafted youth and league super legends! Apply your Playbook tactics and you'll be ready to take your franchise to the top!

name: Blade Runner 2033: Labyrinth
summary: Set between the original film and 2049, Blade Runner 2033 takes place after the events of the Black Out and asks: what does a Blade Runner do when there are no Replicants left to hunt?

name: Blocky Fills
summary:
Great, fulfilling time waster: Fill the board with the same colour before you run out of moves.
Gameplay: tap one of the color buttons at the bottom of the screen to fill all neighbours with the same color. Once you do that with the whole board, you win.

name: Blitz Racer
summary: Blitz Racer 2.0 has the same sleek isometric design, unique controls, and challenging gameplay that you love, but with tons of new tracks and tunes to experience. This version features a retooled difficulty arc and the ability to collect lives to resume your game, prolonging the Blitz Racer experience.

name: Block Gun
summary: Block Gun is a fast paced 3D Platformer speedrun oriented in which you have to infiltrate a computer system. But don't worry you have a block gun ! Use blocks to create platform to make a path to the end of each level and finish each level as quick as possible !

name: BloodRush: Undying Wish
summary:
BloodRush: Undying Wish is a top-down hack n' slash game with a dark fantasy aesthetic.

In this game, the player is encouraged to aggressively use their combat abilities to evade, control and destroy their opponents, moving around in a deadly dance of carnage.

Focused on movement abilities, split-second decision-making, and stylish strings of attacks, the game is heavily inspired by titles such as Devil May Cry, Akane, Hyper Light Drifter, Hades, and Ultrakill.

name: Bloodline
summary:
A megawad for Doom II in development for 3000 hours.

Tonight is your last shift.

You take another sip of your warm drink (most probably a "Mud Slapper", which is an extremely hot beverage, brewed from demon fudge and Arch Vile blood.

Suddenly you notice a "RED ALERT" warning on your screen.

You leave your cabin and head out back to the U.A.C. Headquarters to investigate...

name: Bleed: Arcade Arena Shooter
summary: Dynamic top down arena shooter will drag you into the universe of eternal battle for the title of Grand Arena Champion!

name: Blood on the Clocktower
summary:
Blood on the Clocktower is a game of murder and mystery, lies and logic, deduction and deception for five-to-twenty courageous players and one devious storyteller.

A social game played in person or online, seated in a circle, each player receives either a ‘good’ or ‘evil’ token with their unique character on it. Good players share information to solve the mystery whilst evil players lie about who they are and what they know. The good team wins if they can piece together their knowledge, trust each other, and execute the demon. The evil team wins if the demon can sow distrust, evade detection, and wipe out the village.

name: Bloodecay
summary: In the Land of Elworth, a plague called erosion emerged. It corrupts all life, brings pain and destruction ---- Becoming the knight idonia, who accepts the bloodthirsty brand, annihilat the plague claws, and destroy the ancient evil.

name: BlazingAngel Mistletear
summary: Become a transforming heroine and use various attacks and sweet combos to defeat enemies and monsters, and save your younger sister in this side-scrolling action game!

name: Bloody Steel
summary: 10 level's wad for boom.The action takes place in the modern world of alternative

name: Blood Samurai
summary: After hundreds of years of civil war, the Blood Samurais of the Kanagi clan had secured victory at hand and the unification of the Eastern Empire was only a matter of time.

name: Blade Fury
summary: The player is equiped with advanced movement mechanics in order to clear levels by avoiding obstacles, killing enemies and eventually obtaining a key which will be used to access the next level.

name: Blood Moon
summary: You’re a werewolf. You’re in a city, infested with witches, hunters, ghosts, and vampires. That’s how this story starts. You decide how it ends.

name: Bloodstain
summary:
Bloodstain is a full 32-map megawad for Doom2 made by Pavel Tvrzník, Czech Doom mapper known in the Doom community as Pipicz.

Bloodstain's map format is limit-removing Doom2. Recommend playing
with complevel 2, although it can certainly be played on other comp-
levels too.

name: Bloodspeed
summary: This project started on Doom Power as a compilation of maps from speedmapping and gradually turned into something more. Some maps were seriously reworked, others were created from scratch and went a long way of development, or were transferred from other projects. The overall style of the project is very heterogeneous, and is a mixture of highly detailed and lengthy work, adjacent to the short and minimalist, practically unchanged speed mapping. The maps are divided into three thematic episodes describing the beginning of the invasion on earth, the journey into the realm of demons, and return to the our world that is already covered with ice.

name: Bluey: The Videogame
summary:
Join the fun with Bluey and her family in Bluey: The Videogame! Play a brand-new story set across 4 interactive adventures. For the first time ever, explore iconic locations such as the Heeler House, Playgrounds, Creek and a bonus beach location. Play your favourite games from the TV show, including Keepy Uppy, Chattermax Chase, and more!

The fun doesn't stop there! This game won't be trifficult, just a lot of fun. Experience the joy and wonder of Bluey's world, with local multiplayer you can play with friends and family in story mode and free play! Explore and collect items for your sticker book, unlock outfits and uncover the many secrets and hidden references throughout each location. Recreate iconic scenes or create your very own Bluey inspired adventures and games in Bluey: The Videogame.

name: Blazing Snake
summary: Blazing Snake is a fun, fast paced, video game inspired by classic arcade style games.

name: BloodyXmas 2010
summary:
BloodyXmas is a superb survival game for your iPhone and iPod Touch! Here comes the funniest, funnest Christmas ever!
This festive season, in such a joyous family time, even the kindest grandpa in the world has to start his chainsaw!
Creatures are rushing into Santa's workshop and they want to steal and destroy all the presents!
What can poor Santa do? How can he stop these evil minions?
Yeah, guess what - he kicks their asses and teaches them a lesson!
Here comes the funniest, funnest Christmas ever!
Check out Santa's arsenal: cleaver, saber, sledgehammer, chainsaw, and one massive secret super weapon. No one's gonna steal the children's presents! Come and get some!

name: Blights Wrath
summary:
Hack and Slash RPG in the world of Zeontis.

Level up and improve your combat finesse with magic, melee arts and ranged skills.
Improve your armory with thousands of items and fight your way through the hordes of demons and undead to save Zeontis.

name: Blind Hope
summary: A first-person survival horror with a cosmic twist, where you must blindly navigate a decayed historic manor swarming with warped children with only your vague memories and peripheral senses to guide you. Will your sanity hold? Or will blind hope turn to blind despair?

name: Bl0w-Up
summary: Boomer shooter about a robot obliterating aliens.

name: Bloom Runner
summary: In a world fueled by passion, your speed spells seduction. Perform gravity-defying stunts in fast-paced runs to win over beautiful maidens in Bloom Runner. Breathless rewards await you!

name: Blood Midnight Blossom
summary: A visual novel with a breathtaking story about two very different girls who unexpectedly find themselves connected to each other.

name: Bloody Hills
summary: Bloody Hills is an intense and heart-pounding survival horror game set in the depths of a secluded forest camp. As night falls, you find yourself trapped in a twisted game of cat and mouse with a relentless killer known as The Hiker. Armed with only your wits and limited resources, you must fight to survive until dawn while evading the sadistic clutches of this merciless predator.

name: Black Box Lss: The Shining Immortal
summary: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends thrilling crime, romantic comedy, and the pursuit of love. This game depicts the story of a new employee pursuing his female boss. If you're a fan of love, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.

name: Blazing Dragon
summary: Welcome to Blazing Dragon! An action roguelite where you'll face devastating hordes of enemies while upgrading your character, making your character more and more powerful. Choose your character and enjoy the journey through this magical and dangerous world!

name: Blade of Tsunami
summary: Your father is dead, his life cut-short by a ruthless corporation. Take up the blade and enact vengeance in a visceral, fast-paced, isometric slasher that blends cyberpunk with a visual style heavily influenced by traditional Japanese aesthetics.

name: Blackfall
summary: Blackfall is a roguelite movement shooter game with combat and loot elements where the main objective is to deactivate all digging stations, exit the dream loop and rescue your friends.

name: Black Dragon Mage
summary: In Black Dragon Mage, an action-roguelite, you stand as a lone mage pitted against a legion of demons. Carefully choose perks and abilities, aim and trigger attacks yourself in this retro-fantasy bullet heaven. Shred through the sinister onslaught using devastating elemental magic and your very own dragon!

name: Bleak Frontier
summary: Bleak Frontier is a strategy / city builder game set in a frozen wasteland in the far future, 4087 AD. As the chosen leader of the first permanent settlement in almost a century, you must guide the last survivors of the human race towards an uncertain future. Welcome to the Bleak Frontier.

name: Bleak Winter
summary: The world is against you in this brutal third-person survival experience, and your only goal is survival at any cost. Loot, build, scavenge and craft your way to survive against the world and everything within.

name: Blamed
summary: Blamed is an adult detective game in the visual novel genre. Walk the path of Detective David Fox and unravel a series of mysterious murders happening in the city. Make choices and influence the course of the investigation, conquer girls, and catch criminals.

name: Bloc-Age: Path of the Oracle
summary: A story driven fast paced action FPS with a retro twist.

name: Black Silk Girl
summary: This is a casual masturbation girl game. You're flying a plane in space looking down on Earth when a bunch of alien spaceships fire at you. You have to survive. As a reward, survive to the end, and you will see the Black Silk Girl. Head out into space!

name: Blasphemous II: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Penitent One awakens as Blasphemous 2 joins him once again in an endless struggle against The Miracle. Dive into a perilous new world filled with mysteries and secrets to discover.
Includes a Digital Soundtrack and a Digital Artbook.

name: Black Box LSS: The Merciful Savior
summary: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends love, crime, and romantic comedy. A story of a young man forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love. If you're a fan of love story, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.

name: Bl00d.exe
summary: The year is 2099 and Daydream, New Jersey is under corporate rule. Corporate Killers determine the fate of who lives and who dies. Become Sam Boone, Harmoney's star Corporate Killer, and go on a path of vengeance and violence in this retro inspired, cyberpunk boomer shooter.

name: Blackout: Zero Point
summary: Blackout is a hardcore co-op shooter for up to 4 players. Become a near-future special forces operative and eliminate infected creatures and monsters fused with machines. Complete missions through intense combat and teamwork, and escape the hellish battlefield.

name: Blocxlide
summary: Blocxlide is an arcade puzzle game where players must quickly and strategically slide blocks to create miniature art. Including a puzzle editor and "shuffle" mode, endless brain-scratching challenges await, where only the most efficient will triumph with top grades.

name: Block Room
summary: In Block Room, you need to escape the dangers and collect the apples that serve as a shot to unlock the path to the next level.

name: Bloku!
summary: Bloku! is a unique interpretation of the classic block puzzles. Draw and erase blocks from the board. Try to clear as many lines as possible without letting the blocks surpass the top. Get ready to the newest addicting block puzzle!

name: Blendoku
summary:
A puzzle game that will challenge your ability to distinguish and arrange colors. The game is based on color principles and exercises taught in art schools around the world.

Try and beat the world average, beat your personal best, or go for a perfect score for those perfectionists out there!

name: Blood Hunting
summary: Blood Hunting is a first-person survival horror game by Holcomb Entertainment LLC. A true survival horror experience that sets the stage on how dangerous revenge can be... if you can survive it.

name: Blue Dragon: Shuffle Dungeon
summary: Shuffle Dungeon has arrived! This new content features a mysterious dungeon that changes every time you enter. Along with more than 30 new items, powerful monsters, and more than 10 new hard-to-beat bosses, there are certainly some challenges in store for you! Are you up for it? (Recommended Starting Level: 50 or higher. Supports Hard and Impossible game modes.) Note that you will need to be near the end of the game, and have saved that game, in order to enter a Warp Cube to Shuffle Dungeon.…

name: Block Party
summary: Meet your most favorite Nickelodeon characters in this wonderful game! You must help them to perform different actions and go through big playing fields throwing dices and solving different puzzles. Good luck!

name: Blooming
summary: Blooming, is a 2D platformer action game. Use your bow, which can be turn into dual blades, to defeat your foes and explorer different areas in any order you want. Defeat bosses in order to absorb their power and get new abilities.

name: Block City Cop: Vice Town
summary:
Block City Cop: Vice Town is an open world police simulator with shooter and racing elements. You play as a brave cop the purpose of which is to save the city from crime. You have to fight with armed gangsters, using all kinds of weapons and transport (police car, taxi, bus etc.).
In this game, you can freely navigate around the city, help residents, complete missions getting rid of bandits and get coins for it.

name: Blight Bubbles
summary: Embark on an singleplayer first person physics puzzle adventure in Blight Bubbles. Shoot bubbles, explore, defeat enemies and bosses and solve puzzles to restore the blighted world. Upgrade your bubble gun with new abilities like the ice ray to freeze bubbles into platforms.

name: Bloodthief
summary: Bloodthief is an ultra-fast melee dungeon-runner where you use momentum to parkour through hazardous dungeons and brutally slash through enemies. Speed-run through medieval dungeons and castles and learn what dark secrets lie beneath the surface.

name: Blobbers
summary: A community of blobfish have been displaced from their homes by a storm. Collect your friends and bring them home!

name: Black Powder Desolation
summary: Fight your way past the law with up to 3 of your friends in a coop campaign containing a variety of distinct locations and gameplay rewarding teamplay and cooperation, or master a variety of weapon classes against other players in thrilling battles featuring up to 24 players.

name: Blockdude
summary: Blokdude is a remake of the well known TI Caluculator game from Brandon Sterner as well as the blockman game from Soleau Software. This version of the game is based on the GP2X port of blockdude.

name: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect
summary: Embrace the enthralling explorations and challenges with your characters, each uniquely customized through roguelite gameplay. Discover the truth of the world during the adventure, and alter the course of human destiny through your choices.

name: Bloody Heck
summary: An 8 map WAD with level design inspired by mouldy's Going Down

name: Black Journey to the West
summary: Black Journey to the West "is a vampire like survivor game that integrates Roguelike elements. Choose a character from a scripture gathering team, build character treasures and skills, challenge the blackened All Sky God Buddha, and shatter the darkness that envelops the Divine World.

name: Blessed Burden
summary: The most-aesthetically charged action horror first-person platformer. You play as the last priest who goes unarmed into the devil's abode to save the world.

name: Black Otaku 2: Taekwondo is in my Blood
