summary: Join Sahara B. Shabazz as she honours that Korean man's sacrifice by winning this martial arts tournament with the Taekwondo that flows in her veins.

name: Bloons
summary: Bloons for iPhone is here! 150 brand new original levels specially made for iPhone. Now you can play your favourite game any time!

name: Blosics
summary: Blosics is a Flash-based puzzle-physics game where the player must shoot balls at green blocks to knock them off the screen. Doing this will award points and the player must meet a certain point threshold to move onto the next level. It cost points to shoot a ball, and the larger the ball, the more points it'll use up. The player must also refrain from knocking red blocks off the screen, as they subtract points from the score.

name: Bloomverse
summary: Bloomverse is a Smart game where players can own characters and items and earn Bloomie tokens on the Solana network. The game features virtual lobbies, malls, and arenas where players can partake in different events and socialize. The game is available on browsers and mobile platforms.

name: Blue Boy Adventure
summary: Blue Boy Adventure is a short, old-school 2D action RPG. You are Blue Boy, an aspiring adventurer who comes to an island to find a legendary treasure.

name: Bloodicide
summary: Bloodicide is a 5 level mapset for GZDoom (4.0.0). This latest build now features @Tango's Supercharge (v1.3) gameplay mod. The mapset and mod are packaged as a single pk3, so you don't need to load the mod separately to play.

name: Blood and Bones: A Skeleton Scorned
summary:
You were but broken bones and brawny blood. Yet your tomb stirs, and here you stand!

This was a map created for the Vinesauce Mapping Contest 2016. It has a standalone release now. It's mostly unchanged from the one submitted to the contest, the only difference is it has a titlepic this time around.

name: Black Magnetic
summary:
Black Magnetic is one new level for DooM II with new monsters, textures and weapons.
You may find the gameplay different from the typical Doom one. Monsters are mainly hitscanner with high health so you will have to get cover very often. Explore the installation for better weapons.
It was built for the Doomja-Vu contest started by Tormentor667 on the Realm 667 forum.

name: Blue Sky Aces
summary: A retro inspired, stylized world war 1 flight simulator that puts you in control of some of the worlds first war planes. Zoom above the trenches as you engage the enemy in fierce close range dogfights, where any moment could be your last.

name: Blood Moon Horror
summary: Blood Moon Horror is a 1-8 player co-op survival horror game. Survive the nightmare under the alien-infested moon, navigate the abandoned lunar base, evade extraterrestrial predators, and uncover the dark secrets lurking in the shadows.

name: Blocklords
summary: Blocklords is a player-driven grand strategy game by MetaKing Studios. Rule, conquer, and grow with your medieval Hero.

name: Blobby's Quest
summary: A simple, singleplayer 2D Platformer

name: Blood Orange
summary:
Searching the Amazon for the elusive razorback dolphin, Nora discovers more than she bargained for.

Created in one month for Thalassophobia game jam.

name: Blood Flows Where My Shotgun Blows
summary: 6 relatively short maps for Final Doom: The Plutonia Experiment

name: Bloom
summary:
Bloom is a new free casual puzzle about chain reactions and a puppy with a bizarre love for berries. Follow Arya and her dog Bo in an adventure set in vibrant locations and a cute story with witty characters across hundreds of mind bending logic puzzles.
Done saving the world?

Enjoy an endless catalog of free levels created by players like you or try the ultra simple level maker to create your own level and share it with your friends! Show off your creativity and become the best creator in the world!

name: Blue Sango
summary: A 1997 Japan-exclusive point-and-click adventure for PC and Macintosh utilizing QuickTime VR. Originally thought lost media, it was fully archived in 2023.

name: Bloody Finger Jump
summary:
Brace yourselves, Bloody Fingers are coming! Win, survive and be the best!
Your fingers will stand to a fight you can't even imagine!
Bloody Finger Jump will take you to a surreal world, where you will battle to death using your own finger.

name: Block & Shot
summary: Block & Shot will immerse you in the captivating world of logical puzzles, where you will have to control various weapons to overcome obstacles in your path and reach the main goal - the golden cartridge

name: Bloody Heaven
summary: In Bloody Heaven, players will challenge to use various of weapons with different features to beat enemy waves.

name: Blood Rush
summary: Blood Rush is a fast paced roguelite skill based fps, upgrade yourself, get new abilities, get new guns, upgrade them and find synergies to destroy anyone or anything standing on your way to escape a Dante inspired Hell!

name: Blood Golf
summary: Blood Golf is a PVP or PVE golf-em-up where your target is the other player. Use powerups, map knowledge, and, most importantly, elegant combat-golf technique to turn your enemies into a fine mist or send them past the stratosphere. Has local multiplayer, or you can fight against the CPU.

name: Bleak
summary: An atmospheric mini wad with the vibes of atmospheric horror, fear of the unknown, Lovecraft inspired.

name: Blasé Ace
summary:
Anime clichés just don't hit the same when you're sex-averse. Maybe you're not bawling over how this guy slipped face-first into your crotch. You might not even be disturbed, just...like...confused?

Join NB student Beverly Nicks on a short, funny, positive, be-yourselfy kind of a journey.

name: Block Puzzle Kool
summary: Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids. From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!

name: Blue Cradle: Signifie
summary: A novel game with a fully voiced story about everyday or extraordinary stories.

name: BlooDooMoon Survivor
summary: Welcome to this survival sandbox game! Your plane made a forced landing during the Bermuda storm. You will need to establish your own survival base from scratch, collect materials, make tools, build towns, manufacture weapons, explore unknown fields. Will you conquer the challenges?

name: Blue Ridge Hunting
summary: Blue Ridge Hunting is a co-op horror game where you and your friends investigate, document, and hunt cryptids in the Appalachian Mountains.

name: Blood, Fuel, Ammo & Speed
summary: Blood, Fuel, Ammo & Speed is a Fast Paced Rogue-lite Action Fps Game. Pour Out Fuel and Ammo and Dance In Blood With Speed. KILL THE DEMONS.

name: BloodFlood
summary: BloodFlood is a 2D Action-Platformer where you battle your way through a deadly infestation. Explore to uncover hidden secrets and grow to become the perfect killing machine.

name: Block_Up
summary: An action-packed two-player local-coop 2D puzzle platformer with a focus on teamwork. Use one player's ability to place blocks and the other's ability to break them to create a path to your goal while escaping the rising lava from below!

name: Blitz Runner
summary: In Blitz Runner, you'll dash through colorful landscapes, collecting dazzling gems that not only increase your score but also your speed! The more gems you collect, the faster you run, making every game a unique and exhilarating journey.

name: Black Jackal
summary: Pilot your way through the deadly remains of derelict spacecraft, solve their mysteries, and get out with everything that isn't nailed down.

name: Blob Command
summary: Match blobs together, create chain reactions and don't run out of time!

name: Blob Command: New Attack
summary: Experience more blob action with power-ups and two player co-op!

name: Black Smith 4
summary: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

name: Blitz & Blaze
summary: Unleash the power of Blitz the rat and Blaze the firefly in this mesmerizing platformer. Explore diverse dimensions, solve puzzles, and discover the magic of cooperation!

name: Blackjack Simulator 2024
summary: Blackjack Simulator 2024 is a simple, fun, and realistic simulation of blackjack. Battle against the dealer every single round as you try to use the right strategy to win big!

name: Bluey: Let's Play!
summary: Explore, imagine, create & play in Bluey's house. There's so much to do! Wackadoo! Come join Bluey, her friends & family!

name: Blood Knuckle: Rooftop of The Impossible Skyscraper
summary: Use your giant fist to punch, puzzle and scale your way to the top of a tyrannical skyscraper run by an evil sorcerer to rescue your brother!

name: Blank Blood
summary: Exploratory platform game of ryona style.

name: Black Runes
summary: Black Runes is a horror game with first-person puzzle elements, in which you have to play as a person caught in a hopeless situation, shrouded in magic.

name: BloodSworn
summary: Bloodsworn is a fast-paced, FPS roguelite game set in a blood-soaked, dark dimension. As a fugitive member of a cruel and twisted cult, you must take revenge on them alone or with the help of your friends. Whether you choose blood magic, guns or melee weapons, your path will be lined with blood.

name: Blitz Guard
summary: Embark on an indie souls-like game! Master the unique Parry Gauge system, where successful parries fill the meter, but beware: a failed parry or taking damage will deplete it. Show your skill and strategy to unleash powerful abilities in epic battles!

name: BloodMoon
summary: Survive the BloodMoon's horrors! Multiplayer horror game where teamwork is crucial. Run, hide, and escape to outwit relentless evil.

name: Bloxtacle Course
summary: Bloxtacle Course is a block breaker game where you are given nearly full control over the ball itself.

name: Bloktris
summary:
A Tetris clone for 8-bit computers and consoles.

Based on the original DOS version, play the classic block matching game now with the classic background images.

name: Blanka in Shura no Kuni
summary: Street fighter fangame.

name: Blastar
summary:
Blastar was a game written by Elon Musk in 1984 (at the age of 12). The source code was published in a magazine and he received $500 for it. Ashlee Vance's Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX and the Quest for a Fantastic Future includes a reproduction of the page from the publication where it appeared. This version is based on that listing.
Elon has since moved beyond 8-bit spaceships.

"[It was] a trivial game... but better than Flappy Bird."
--Elon Musk

name: Black Touch '96
summary:
Black Touch 96 is a 2D urban themed beat 'em-up game that puts players in the shoes of a muscled guy. The plot involves in what appears to be a kidnapping of a young woman by a gang of criminals. The player is off to save her.

Gameplay includes 2.5D sidescrolling and beating up enemies with various kick and punch attacks. Along the way items can be found that replenish health among other things. Enemies include various weird street scum and bosses. The game can be played solo or with a friend. The second player takes control of a mysterious guy wearing a robe and straw hat.

name: Black Heaven: A Necromantic Dating Sim
summary: A dark fantasy dating sim where you collect the ghosts of your former classmates! Make your choices carefully--every time you try to undo the past, you risk slipping into madness.

name: Bloodkill
summary: Brutal First Person Shooter focused on action, speed, gore and blood-pumping metal music.

name: Blue Ribbon Bake Off
summary: Blue Ribbon Bake Off is a new, original playing card game. Players work to gather ingredients to complete a recipe and win a blue ribbon at the county fair. Competitors use every trick in the cookbook to stop them. Who will be named the County's Best Baker?

name: Blood, Fire, Death
summary: You Akroxs, the archimagus of fire and ice. Long time ago you have called great demons, masters of fire for yourself in a service, in exchange for the soul. But when payment time has come, you have not wished to give the most valuable that is at you. And you have gone to their house to win them and not to be more dependent on them. Whether you will to win them? Or you will for ever doom the soul to a fiery torment?

name: Blasphemous Experiments
summary: Blasphemous experiments is a complete first episode replacement for Heretic, using the Blasphemer texture pack.

name: Black Devilfish
summary:
Are you looking for adventures? Become a pirate employed by the pirate brotherhood and a disaster for the Caribbean! Complete all the unique missions and help the pirates!
Command your submarine as you take out pirate ships and fortified islands with their cannons.

name: Blaze
summary: Sonic mock-up Amiga game.

name: Blackhole on the Road
summary: Blackhole on the Road is a thrilling game that puts you in control of a powerful black hole as you compete against others to become the largest and most powerful in the city.

name: Blade Dancer: Lineage of Light
summary: Experience Blade Dancer: Lineage of Light originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Blofeld X
summary: It is a 'realistic' scenario only human-like monsters (see story) in-, outsideareas, lava-style, some machines

name: Blowup
summary: Tech, industrial, metal, brick - sort of mixed theme; it is a big map, so you should save from time to time; some places are dark with zdoom, brighter with prboom; five/six monsters are in a secret room;

name: Blobber
summary: Master the gelatinous properties and capabilities of the blob. Solve climbing puzzles and hunt down prey, all while avoiding lethal hazards or becoming the prey itself. Manipulate your corporeal state to slink up walls, hang from ceilings, and leap from surface to surface to achieve your goals.

name: Block Blast!
summary: "Block Blast!" is a free and popular block puzzle game that is your best choice when you want to pass the casual time and challenge your brain. The goal of this block puzzle game is easy yet fun: match and clear as many colored blocks as possible on the board. Mastering the skill of filling rows or columns will make the block puzzle game easier. "Block Blast!" not only provides a relaxing and cozy puzzle gaming experience but also enhances your logical abilities and trains your brain.

name: Blocks and Bones
summary: Blocks and Bones is a zombie wave shooter with endless hordes of the undead in custom maps built by players. Build mode is the sandbox side of the game where you build levels from blocks and publish them online in-game so other players can survive the apocalypse inside your chilling creations.

name: Black Sails
summary: Three great naval countries have been fighting each other to gain control over the Caribbean’s for many years. With none of the sides being able to settle the score, the battle has brought nothing but chaos and disarray to the region. It is up to you to take part in this epic battle and bring the opposing countries finally to their knees.

name: Blob Life
summary: This Cute Sidescroller RPG is all about taking care of little aliens called blobs! Give them unique names, check their vitals, build colorful houses, play and feed them with a variety of sweets when you have all the time in the world.

name: Blast Radius
summary: Blast Radius is a fan add-on for the Apogee/3D Realms classic 1996 FPS Duke Nukem 3D by ck3d. Features a brand new episode of 15 maps as well as 40+ new types of alien scum.

name: Bloomers 2000
summary:
Divine bloomers were found on the Moon. An evil group BB group "Big Bloomer Group" seeks a way to make the whole world into a bloomer, and the international MIB "Men in Bloomer" organization monitors the subtle bloomer balance in the world. Their conflict becomes inevitable.
Tokiwa Ai is an ordinary girl who becomes chosen as a goddess of bloomers, and from now on she's a bloomers justice warrior!

name: Block Buster
summary:
Block Buster is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20.

While exploring an alien planet in your multi-terrain vehicle, you have fallen into a labyrinth of ice rocks. As these rocks melt, ice monsters hatch from them and track you down. Your only defense is to push a block of ice rock, sending it crashing into the monsters. The monsters can also push and break through ice rocks, and ice rocks can be destroyed by hitting them against another rock or against the side of the labyrinth.

The vehicle has limited fuel, and a buzzer will ring when the machine is low. The truck can be refueled by crushing a diamond ore rock. The player has a total of 3 lives, and there are always 2 enemies per stage. There are 8 levels of difficulty.

name: Bloody Moon
summary: This is a single-player third-person shooter about the zombie virus outbreak in the future world, as the last survivor and the last resistance of the zombies!

name: Bloody Slipgates
summary: E1M1rmx with a twist: a certain amount of red keys scattered throughout the map have to be collected in order to proceed, making the gameplay largely non-linear.

name: Blastris: Blastris A
summary: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Blastris: Blastris B
summary: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Blastris: Mole Patrol
summary: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Blood Colored Rust
summary: Medium-sized dark, orange industrial/military base map using modified idbase textures. Comes with a custom skybox. The map source is included.

name: Blue-Sky-Blue(s): Sora o Mau Tsubasa
summary:
The protagonist's mom passed away 10 years ago and the father-son relationship is a strained one. When poppy's work as a weatherman and new marriage sends them to Hokkaido, the player enters a new school and joins up with a group of student's whose passion is the sky - with the belief that people come from the sky and will eventually return to the sky...

Six girls are available for the romancing including honor student Kasumi Itimatsu, school director's granddaughter Fuuka Mitsuba and assistant teacher Tomomi Shinose.

name: Blagmoz
summary: Dash, cast, and buff your way to the top of Blagmoz Tower in this lightning-fast PVP precision platformer. Power up by drinking potions, getting kills, and sacrificing your friends at the Altar. Become the ultimate glass cannon in this one-hit-kill battle of sorceries!

name: Blackish House
summary:
Those with individuality, good looks which help to bring this out, as well as talent — however, despite having all these things, none of them think about the other people around them, and are all ‘blackish’ personalities.

The agency they work for, SeiGetsu Production, notices this; gathering all these talents, they present them with a single condition.

Which is... for all of them to live together, cooperate with one another, and successfully produce a musical performance within half a year. If they fail, the agency will end all of their contracts, and make sure they can never be a part of the showbiz again.

Where they are forced to live is a run-down mansion that hardly suits these talented stars. The amount of time given to them is half a year. Gathered are all different kinds people — a mix of actors, dancers, seiyuu, singers, models. Furthermore, all of them possess rather ‘extreme’ quirks in their personalities.

Forced into the midst of this mess is the heroine, an actress who does not possess a ‘self.’ After half a year, what is it that the heroine and these other members, will see?

name: Blood & Chaos
summary: Blood & Chaos is a roguelike tribute to the golden era of '80s RPG gaming. Create a fellowship of 6 heroes and embark on an epic journey. Explore a thriving world with quests to accomplish, cities to discover and dungeons to explore where your mastering of turn-based combats will keep you alive.

name: Block Strategy
summary: Block Strategy is an RTS game where the world is made up of blocks that can be placed or destroyed to change the terrain. Gather materials by exploring or destroying enemies, and use them to expand your base and defend against an onslaught of enemies.

name: Black
summary: Small episode with three Wizard and one Base level as well as a start map. Also has a few new textures and different endings depending on skill level.

name: Bloody Checkers
summary: Enter the medieval world of Knotted Hand Hall, and take on 20 dead NPC’s who will try and stop you at all costs. Enjoy 30 hours of leveling, exploring, and hiding as you take everything you have learned online. Gorgeous graphics and 3D gameplay almost go unnoticed as the action overtakes you and you become immersed in volleys of spells, arrow barrages, and cannon attacks from your opponents.

name: Blink of an Eye
summary: A continuation to my previous map - Border Town. As usual - theme of the map is set in the city. This time it's set at evening/night.

name: Black Sheep
summary: You are the royal Shepherd ! Your mission is to bring the Black Sheep to the rival kingdom as a gift to stop the wat ! Go on an adventure to complete your quest but think wisely, the Black Sheep must arrive alive !

name: Black Mountain Kings
summary: You were thrown in a strange world. You are alone, and you got nothing. What to do next? You decide it! Explore, defeat monsters, get riches, learn new abilities, discover secrets, and learn the truth.

name: Block The Monster
summary: The way I make it becomes the way! A round at the square block! Square Block 3D Tower Defense with various routes and strategies! Turn the tide of battle by deploying powerful heroes. How many waves can you hold on until the defense collapses and breaks down?

name: Blacksite Theta
summary: A 3D puzzle platformer developed as a project for the 2023 UW-Whitewater Capstone Course. Harness your newfound mutant arm powers to conquer challenging terrain, ultimately unlocking your path to freedom by solving puzzles and navigating treacherous obstacles to escape the facility.

name: Blyx
summary: Blyx is a story-driven action-adventure game, where you can discover new worlds and fight with complex bosses. Solve interesting puzzles, jump between platforms, and battle enemies – all to help Blyx find his purpose among the realms.

name: Blood Orange: Definitive Edition
summary: Underwater psychological horror with a shocking, character-driven narrative. Explore ruins beneath the amazon river basin, and converse with their dolphin inhabitants. Skillfully capture and develop photographs with your underwater camera.

name: Black Beacon Hill
summary: Follow the story of the [Phantoms] as forces beyond their control drag them back into a vendetta in the streets, the Ulstanian-Kostakovian war they left behind rages on in the distance, and an existential threat looms over all. A visual novel with a unique design minimalistic top-down shooter game.

name: Block Games:Avoid
summary: This is a minimalist block type game that tests reaction and perseverance. In order to achieve extreme minimalism, after trying many elements, I chose to use blocks as the main element. Go manipulate the blocks to avoid more blocks! Go challenge your limits!

name: BlockJump
summary: BlockJump is a difficult platformer game with the idea that you replay sections of the game to try and beat it faster with each attempt. There are various ways to beat almost every level and some routes require you to master the mechanics of the game to beat them in quick succession.

name: Block'D
summary: Block'D takes block-clearing puzzle fun to new levels. This compelling and exciting casual game is easy to pick-up-and-play but hard to put down! Clear same-coloured blocks to score points and win big. Wildcards, bombs, and lightning blocks keep the grid unpredictable and increase your chances to clear blocks quickly. Enjoy progressively challenging levels and two distinct play modes - clear the entire grid in Marathon, blasting blocks at your own pace, or race the clock in Speed mode.

name: Blood in Baldur's Gate
summary:
Blood in Baldur's Gate is a community-driven free-to-play narrative browser game developed and published by Larian Studios. It served as a narrative teaser for Baldur's Gate III.

Set 15 years before the events of Baldur's Gate III, players are tasked with investigating a murder in the streets of Baldur's Gate. From June 19 to July 6 in 2023, the community could vote on which locations would be unlocked next. While the polls have ended, players are still able to follow in the voters' original footsteps.

name: Bloodrust
summary: 11 Maps for Doom 2, all 'oldschool' in style and detail, and fairly short

name: Blamcon Shooting Gallery
summary: This game is only properly experienced when using an Infrared Light Gun. Each consecutive hit gives you bonus points. You can reload as many times as you like but keep an eye on that ammo, 6 shots doesn't last!

name: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker
summary: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker is a puzzle game where you reveal a beautiful image hidden behind the stack of blocks using block breaking logic.

name: Blood Running
summary: Blood Running is a stylish extraction shooter where you'll enter the cyber-wasteland, collect blood for your clients, loot valuable gear, and venture into the remnants of a world in ruins. Are you willing to bleed to survive, Blood Runner?

name: Bloody Harry
summary:
Shoot and smash your way through hordes of vegetable zombies!

Join vegan cook "Bloody Harry" on his hunt for vegetable zombie creatures!

Each level is a new challenge with an increasing amount of enemies. Survive and reach the exit! Unlock and upgrade 15 different zombie bursting weapons and plow your way through an endless amount of levels offering new surprises and dangers around each corner.

While you fight your way through the hordes of foul creatures, you'll eventually climb the career ladder in the global highscore list.

You'll also run into giant boss-zombies which may eat all your ammo before they finally make a return as harmless dessert. Sounds tasty you say? It is!

name: Blub
summary: Blub is a cute but radioactive platforming adventure with detailed levels and challenging gameplay.

name: Blasphemous + Blasphemous 2 Bundle
summary: The Miracle summons you Sinner! This bundle includes both of the indie smash hits Blasphemous 1 and 2. So enter the world of Blasphemous and get to smiting.

name: Bloodbaths Terrible Vacation
summary: Bloodbath's Terrible Vacation is about my bad experience on a doomed vacation. This wad consists of four small island maps with lots of action. The chaingun, rocket launcher, and plasma gun have all received an upgrade for the adventure. MAP01 is a thrill-seeking adventure to a tropical island, with lots of unsightly guests to contend with. MAP02 is a bit more chill, but still has enough heat so your chaingun does not freeze over. MAP03 is a romp through one of the hottest vacation spots imaginable. MAP04 is a look into how this adventure was booked in the first place.

name: Block Catching
summary: An online game of block catching with a twist. The catcher is not your friend.

name: Blastar
summary:
A homebrew port of Blastar, developed by Elon Musk (at the age of 12) for the Spectravision in 1984.

In this game you have to destroy an alien space freighter, which is carrying deadly Hydrogen Bombs and Status Beam Machines. This game make good use of sprites and animation, and in this sense makes the listing worth checking out.

name: BLT Blast
summary: You are a magical flying stick of bacon! Press FIRE to launch an all organic torpedo. Move using the joystick. Game speed will increase with time. Colliding with the ant, fly or lettuce will deduct a life. When all 6 lives are gone the game is over. Below is a description of each object you can interact with.

name: Black Diamond
summary: Black Diamond is a set of 5 boom-compatible maps set in the cavernous void of the sea. Uncover a forgotten civilization on your quest for the Black Diamond, a mystical artifact said to let its bearer see beyond death.

name: Blue Bird's Song
summary: Blue Bird's Song is an interactive fiction game. Explore this dark fairy tale in a fantasy universe and help Birdie discover the whole story. But don't forget, you have to help her escape the darkness. Are you ready?

name: Blacksmith: Song of Two Kings
summary: In this 2D fantasy game you play a role of a blacksmith who literally handcrafts weapons, shields, armor, magic staffs and many other marvellous items.

name: Blue Ninja: Superhero Game
summary: Ultra superhero parody game.

name: Block Buster
summary: is a fast-paced block-placing puzzle game that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking. Get ready to dive into a frantic grid-based challenge where every second counts!

name: Blood Lily Loop
summary: Your bestie seems to be hiding something. There's something about your world that seems odd as well, like it has...secrets. Dive into the time loop of this horror game and witness a "friendship" that rewrites the world.

name: Bleed Runner
summary: Bleed Runner is a 2.5D cyberpunk beat-em-up in which a lone knight fights an encroaching plague! Suddenly stricken with the disease, seek the cure on the mysterious spaceship and survive by grabbing, throwing, and pummeling enemies for blood.

name: Blood Chronicles Volume 1
summary:
Yet another huge collection of blood maps.

Episode One: Underworld "tells the tale of Caleb's search for the Cabal's newest horror, The Grand Illusion Carnival, with plans to shut it down before it entraps any victims. The rumour is that there is a forgotten teleport back in one of the old Cabal mines that will put Caleb right at its front door."

name: Blood Chronicles Volume 2
summary: Blood Chronicles aims to be the best blood map collection. Only the very best of Blood Community!

name: Blazing Sails: Limbs of Lore Pack
summary: A true pirate knows that appearance is just as important as skill. So, don't just engage in our epic pirate battles; compete in style too. Keep an eye out for those fresh pirate patches, trade a leg for an anchor, and your hand for a hook, unless you'd rather resemble an octopus.

name: Blade Chimera
summary: In this exploration-heavy 2D action game, use your demon sword to interfere with the past, create platforms, and shield yourself from danger to explore a dystopian cyberpunk world depicted in gorgeously animated pixel art.

name: Block-ed
summary: Craft, challenge, and conquer beautiful 3D puzzles in an arcade showdown, where creativity meets competition.

name: Bloki
summary: BLOKI is an educational game in which you'll transform into a designer of residential building facades from the Soviet era. Using the available set of tools and guidance from the moderator, you'll design facades and develop the nearby area.

name: Blue Mushrooms
summary:
Blue Mushrooms is a SMB1 Rom Hack that modifies some stuff of the original game.

Plot: Now that Bowser was defeated, there’s one more thing Mario (and Luigi maybe) must do: save the last Toad… So our heroes will need to explore the new areas beyond the unknown, where the Sun’s illumination doesn’t show. . .

Features:
- New 33 levels
- Some sprites and color palette have been modified
- Mario, Goombas, Koopas… Almost everyone are a bit faster!
- Red mushroom it’s a bit more powerful; you can throw (slow) fireballs!
- Goombas now can revive if you crush them
- Coins value are now 2 instead of 1
- And more stuff!

name: Blush Blush: Kitsune Bundle
summary: Three ancient fox-spirits. Three men forever linked by their rivalry… and by the curse they share. Three chances to experience falling in love like never before. This content requires the base game Blush Blush on Steam in order to play.

name: Blood Radiant
summary: Blood Radiant is a lovecraftian soulslike action-RPG. Explore a mythical island at the intersection of many space-times while you find weapons, battle eldritch abominations, uncover secrets, and talk to NPCs in a dark quest to achieve ultimate power.

name: Blades and Bullets
summary: In 1939 Grand Emperor Hil’Tar a high elf who has set his sights for Poland which would spark the start of the Second World war. Hundreds of miles away across the ocean, you a young American working out of his parent's farm, learns of the fatal news that war in the Kingdom of Europe has broken out.

name: Bloodshots
summary: Immerse yourself in a terrifying survival horror experience set in a laboratory where horrific experiments have been conducted. Take on the role of Joseph Alexander Blackwell, who has to rescue his daughter. To succeed, you will be forced to use your own blood in unusual and twisted ways.

name: Block Mind
summary: A dream-like map that spans multiple environments. The premise is to transport yourself out of a hub area to different locations, solve the puzzles, return to the hub, and open up a forcefield.

name: Black Hole Interior Explorer
summary:
Here's your chance to cross the event horizon and see what the inside of a black hole looks like.

Use WASD to control your magical laws-of-physics defying space-time vehicle. Move the mouse to look around.

name: Block 'Em
summary: Block'Em! is an action-filled block-building party game for 2 to 4 players! The controls are simple but the road to victory is complex: be the first to reach the goal or be the last Blocky standing!

name: Black silk girl
summary: It's a casual whack-a-mole like game with lots of pictures of girls, and when the block turns red, click on it. You can remove it, remove all the squares, you can see the girl's face.

name: Block Control
summary: Pink and Blue are running towards the Flag again today. Use 7 blocks with various gimics to reach the flag. There are puzzle maps that test your creativity, and control maps that need to reach the flag in time. Don't give up until you clear all the maps!

name: Blouncy
summary: Be a block! Do the bounce! Don't Die!

name: Blocked In
summary: Blocked In brings the nostalgia of the classic pen and paper game "Dots and Boxes" into the digital era, offering lively gameplay for players of all ages. The objective remains simple – players take turns adding lines between adjacent dots to create boxes, earning points with each completed square.

name: Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing
summary: The Sweet Science Meets The STREETS!

name: Blast Arena
summary: Blast Arena is a short arena shooter for SEGA Master System.

name: Blackthorn Winter
summary: You were chosen to break the icy chains that shackle the land! Feel the pulse of Slavic folklore beating in tandem with the thrill of arcade games and the depth of RPG character development. Alone or in pairs, craft skill trees to overcome an ever-changing world where no two adventures are alike.

name: Bloodsong
summary: She's just a teenage siren. Let her rock... Play as Mari, a punk rock siren princess, who’s hell-bent on headlining her concert no matter the cost. Use your ear and “bloodsong” to match musical pitch, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles along the way. The stage is set–are you ready to rock?!

name: Black Prophecy
summary: Among all game types, audio games are also a category that can bring joy to players, as players can enjoy the joy brought by music.

name: Block Game
summary: A remaster of Quarth (Game Boy).

name: Blitz Arena
summary:
Competitive Party Game in FPS ! Compete against your friends and players !

Solo, duo or team (4v4), prepare to fight in fast and tactical gamemodes. (Versus, Gungame, Battle royal, Zone control, Runner ...)

name: Bloxd.io
summary: It is a multiplayer sandbox game where you can build, explore, and compete in voxel worlds. Play with Friends in mini-games such as bedwars, skywars and more or unleash your creativity by designing your worlds.

name: Bloody Ink
summary: Bloody Ink brings your nightmares to life. Constant terror at home, mysteries to solve, and vocal interaction. Collect items, uncover Luca's past, and face your fears.

name: Bleedthrough
summary: A vanilla-compatible three-episode megaWAD by Jayextee; including some fixes and minor balance tweaks to the maps included from The Becoming.

name: Blue Terror
summary: A single vanilla map for Doom II that is blue. Nothing more, nothing less.

name: Blackjack & Poker
summary: Black Jack & Poker is a card game

name: Blade Sight
summary:
Blade Sight is a single-player fighting game like adventure game. It is a Work-In-Progress title. Take control of Suu and utilize a fast and explosive moveset to combo enemies.

Suu (the player character) has access to a technique, Blade Sight, which allows her to see through an enemy's defense. When her heart gets close to someone, she's able to see through them, allowing her to see a specific move drawn on a card that reveals a move they can not defend against.

name: Blasphemous 2: Limited Collector's Edition
summary: This Physical Edition includes a Steelbook case with exclusive artwork, a printed instruction manual created by the developers along with a thank you letter from the Game Kitchen team, a Marca del Martitio metal coin, three art cards with new illustrations, two CD’s of music composed by Carlos Viola along with a collector’s CD cover with code to download the digital soundtrack, a printed game guide with over 60 pages of Blasphemous lore a beautiful album of illustrations and a certificate of authenticity all housed in a specially created premium finish collector’s box.

name: Blues Brothers 2023
summary: Blues Brothers 2023 exists because @msx2plus made a bunch of awesome skull from google images edits as titlepics and they expire after this year. Bullets have been replaced by Plasma, and the Plasma Rifle is now a default weapon in Slot 2

name: Blood to Bone
summary:
An adventure interactive text based story game of royalty and romance!
You can romance up to 4 characters while the story progresses.

name: Blade X: Odyssey of Heroes
summary:
Blade X, the sequel to the Blade series which was the first action RPG to surpass 5 million downloads, is known for its spectacular action and smooth controls. Known for its console-like storytelling and high-quality graphics despite being a mobile game, the Blade series previously achieved top rankings on both the App Store and Google Play Store, ranking 1st and 2nd.

Blade X continues the unique world and story of the previous Blade series, offering various content for character growth. Players can engage in story-based Scenario Mode, protect the NPC while fending off monsters in the Guardian Mode, defeat over 30 boss monsters and obtain rewards in the Sealed Relic Tower, and participate in the ranking competition based on character growth progress in the Dimension Gate.

name: Black Survival: Return to Lumia
summary: Black Survival is a Real-Time Survival Game, where you must survive by any means out of 10 competitors in a deserted island. Make split-second decisions with a single click! Immerse yourself in the fierce battle for survival; you do not have a second to spare! Search, Craft, Attack, and Run!

name: Black Belt
summary: This unreleased, unfinished Atari 5200 game is similar to Broderbund's famous game, Karateka. Select your black belt level (difficulty level) and fight your way through eight rooms. The keypad is used to execute a variety of karate moves, although the game has no collision detection so you can't really fight your enemies. While the game looks promising, you cannot progress beyond eight rooms because you can't defeat your enemies.

name: Blinky 3
summary: Blinky 3 is a platformer for MS-DOS, developed by Jeremy Lamar. It's (obviously) the sequel to Blinky 2, though it plays differently. It was released on December 9, 1995. The shareware version of the game was available in the "Kids Only" section of AOL's "Shareware Games".

name: Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles
summary:
Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles is the ultimate bundle for fans of retro-style action games. This Japanese version of the game includes both Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon and its sequel, Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon 2, in one package. Experience classic side-scrolling gameplay with modern technology that harkens back to the days of 8-bit and 16-bit games.

With retro-style gameplay, stunning visuals, and intense action, Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles is the ultimate gaming experience for fans of classic side-scrolling action games. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the series, this game will provide hours of exciting and challenging gameplay.

name: Blazing Food
summary: A short text adventure about food, ahoges and alcohol.

name: Blaster
summary: Blaster developed by Vid Kidz for Williams was released for the arcades and is quite obscure. What is interesting however is that the Atari 5200 version that was not released was actually made before the arcade game. An unofficial sequel to Robotron 2084 (As it takes place in 2085) Blaster is a 3d style shooter with impressive graphics for the time. In it the player takes the view from a spaceship cockpit so moving in the different directions shifts the entire screen. There are four levels you will play through avoiding obstacles, saving humans, and defeating alien enemies. Upon beating the four levels the game loops but will be more difficult.

name: Black Stone
summary: The game will center around two investigators who uncover a profound terror while delving into consecutive disappearances. A man with a dual-layered memory, a fragmented reality, an endless rainy night... What in the world is the Black Stone? Could it possibly mark the genesis of everything?

name: Block Shop
summary: Block shop is an automation puzzle game in which basic blocks are transformed and combined to create increasingly complex blocks.

name: Block Hopper
summary:
Block Hopper is a 2D platforming game made with low poly 3D assets. The game comes with Four game modes and more bonus levels and content to come in the future and each differs in small ways and large ways.
Block Hopper is a game you can enjoy at your own pace or if you want a bit of a challenge you can play Hardcore Mode which restarts you if you aren't fast enough.

name: Black Mesa: Classic
summary:
This is a GoldSource project aimed to recreate Black Mesa: Source feel within Half-LIfe 1 and its assets.

Our main goals for this project is to give a new feel, look to the original Half-Life, with adding more features, improved level design that many people love from Black Mesa remake but with additional things, to make it a bit more unique. Black Mesa: Classic aims to be capabile on any PC without high requiremnts, with better visuals and effects to make your Half-Life 1 campaign experience the best!

name: Black stone
summary: This is a very fun strategy game that tests players' strategies.

name: Black Abyss
summary: This is a super fun puzzle game where a white balloon bounces rhythmically up and down.

name: Blackout
summary: A single-player zombies experience. Players are armed with diverse weapons, unique abilities, bullet types, and more to face relentless hordes of cunning enemies. Navigate the in-depth DnD-style progression system, in this riveting journey through an ever-increasing wave of undead threats.

name: Blade's Burden
summary: Blade's Burden is a unique HD2D RPG where you're not the boring old hero. You're a Soulblade – a sentient, cursed sword that absorbs the souls of those who dare to grip your hilt. Explore the vast Germanic Folklore setting, take control of different factions, and use them to rebuild your empire!

name: Blaster Multiplayer
summary: Thrust into the fray of Blaster Multiplayer, a tactical third-person shooter where strategy meets intense combat.

name: Blast Hopper
summary: Help Hop survive his inner demons on his journey to the deepest depths of Subterranea to restore the severed link with the surface. Dive into an exhilarating Metroidvania-style 2D platformer adventure that blends classic platforming mechanics with the thrilling intensity of twin-stick shooting.

name: Blood On The Streets
summary: Stepping into this open city, you will find a game world full of challenges and opportunities waiting for you to explore. In this free and open realm, engage in fierce gang wars with gangsters and mafia, challenging your strategy and leadership. Get ready to start a new life

name: Blood Engine
summary: Blood Engine: Immerse yourself in an action-packed third-person open-world experience. Race against time to thwart the relentless Red Swarm. Will you emerge victorious, or succumb to the biomechanical onslaught? The fate of humanity rests in your hands.

name: Blocks for Babies
summary: Blocks for Babies is the puzzle-shooter mashup of your dreams. Clear falling blocks by forming complete lines, or go in guns blazing to clean up the board the messy way. Hard and soft drops aren't your only tools anymore—now you have a shotgun.

name: Blossom
summary: Embark on a quest of growth and exploration in a beautifully handcrafted open world. Explore the lands and discover their forgotten history. Are you ready to automate and expand your beautiful flora against the vile Corruption?

name: Blood Sins
summary: Embark on a heroic quest in Harda, a kingdom threatened by dark forces from Wick. Unravel the mystery of Amrak's invasion, aided by allies like Jahnarr, Maugh, and Gonel. Your choices shape the fate of the realm. Can you restore peace to Harda?

name: Blood Vessel
summary: First-person-slasher/shooter game. Bludgeon a cult of thirsting vampires to escape your apartment building.

name: Bloody Good Friends
summary: Explore Mirian's world in the Bloody Good Friends visual novel! Spend time at school with her friends, learn about characters, interests, future plans and dreams! Just beware of the demons of the past that won't stop chasing you!

name: Bloody Shrine
summary: Complete the ritual and defend the shrine in this top-down arena shooter roguelite. Unlock new demons, discover new weapons and choose the right spells and items. Create hell-breaking synergies that will unleash pain and suffering on all ghoulies, elites and bosses.

name: Blast Them All
summary: Reload your weapon, the show's about to start! Blast Them All is a wave-based twin stick shooter where you face endless hordes of hungry zombies. Use your agility, pick up weapons and activate traps to defend yourself, build up your strength, collect points and reach the top of the leaderboard!

name: Blinding Light
summary: A cooperative action tower defense and third-person shooter where vision is mutually exclusive. Place towers to shine light on the endless horde of bugs, or use augmented vision to fight alongside defenses. Equip powerful modules that unleash your strategy's true potential!

name: Block Connector
summary: You are the block and now you have to connect the colourful blocks to defeat your enemy, the polyhedron.

name: Block Defend
summary: BlockDefend is a rougeLite tower defense game. You need to allocate the resources and build up as many advanced units as possible, to defend your town against waves of increasingly powerful monsters!

name: Block Hunter
summary: Block Hunter is a music rhythm game that combines party game, online and local competitions, and maybe rogue-lite genes.hope you guys enjoy it !

name: Blue Straggler
summary: A highly detailed blue-themed map

name: Block Blast!
summary:
Block Blast! A perfect mix of block and jigsaw puzzle games, combining creativity with the classics! The simple control, wonderful sound effects, and a great rhythm! Block Blast will leave you wanting more!

Aside from the classical block puzzle games, you will also experience a whole new original COMBO gameplay. Drag and drop block puzzles onto the board to fill a row or column to complete elimination and clearing multiple rows or columns at once will produce a cool elimination animation as well as extra points. The more COMBOs you perform, the more points you get in a block puzzle game. It is up to your logical skills and layout strategy if you want to score high points. Test your IQ and exercise your brain in a block puzzle game!

name: Black Castle
summary: An unofficial port of Black Castle for the Mega Duck.

name: Blaze! Love To The Top
summary:
A boys love mobile game.
In the game you join a popular idol group called Blaze

name: Bladerite: Retribution
summary: Bladerite offers action game enthusiasts a unique opportunity to polishing gaming skills like never before on cross-platform. Not only can you earn rewards based on defeating opponents in each match, but you can also acquire upgradeable patterns that enhance your game experience. Immerse yourself in a world where the in-game economy is supported by cryptocurrency.

name: Black Gunner Wukong
summary:
Black Gunner Wukong is a Rougelike type shooting game.
In the game, the player takes on the role of Wukong , who enters a U.S. military base to rescue his master who has been captured by Diden.
In the game, all creatures are identified as armed helicopters and supermarket shopping bags, not as female and male!

name: Black Hole
summary: Shoot down asteroids while not getting sucked into the black hole by its gravitational pull.

name: Blink Blonk
summary: A puzzly meowtroidvania

name: Blackjack vs. Bunny Girls
summary: Blackjack emerge as a serious opponent Matsuda Makoto role of popular personality. Dealer Type 5 (CPU) configuration and set up a gambling venue, equipped with various modes such as play mode, all parties. Popular TV and Matsuda Makoto, with docking and Mitsu Suzuki's graphic comic artist, you can enjoy a dating simulation.

name: Block Kuzushi: Deden no Gyakushuu
summary: Classic puzzle "Breakout" appeared in PS. Simple rule to go break it hit a ball into a set of blocks on the screen control a paddle at the bottom of the screen is intact, items of more than 20 kinds will liven up the game. In addition to the story mode character of five an outstanding performance, it is equipped with a large number of mode to save the princess.

name: Block Kuzushi Kowashite Help!
summary: Block Kuzushi Kowashite Help! is a wacky & fun breakout game in which 1 or 2 players can play (in cooperative mode) to advance through the game levels.

name: Blind Date 3D
summary: Roam Liam and Olivia’s apartment for an evening and accompany your ravishing date, Maya while trying to seduce her… or ditch her for a passionate tryst with your host’s wife.

name: Black Fire
summary: Furious third-person shooter with the participation of the people, zombies, robots and mutants.

name: Blood+
summary: Play as Saya Otonashi a sword wielding high school senior on a quest to recover her memory. Game contains depictions of violence and blood. Ages 12+.

name: Blablaland
summary: Blablaland is a 2D multiplayer chat game where you play a customizable avatar evolving in a colorful universe and an interactive environment that changes depending on the time of day and weather while offering a few mini-games.

name: Blue Rabbits Climate Chaos
summary: Blue Rabbit and friends return in a lovingly crafted adventure into the third dimension! Set on a cluster of tropical islands, your holiday is suddenly interrupted by freak weather. It's up to you to discover the source of the problem and restore order. Then catch some sun!

name: Blindsighted
summary: Navigate a platformer using only feeling and memory, each death meaning progress. With your memory illuminating your path, you'll "see" a little more of the level each time you attempt it.

name: Blopper
summary: Embark on a gravity-defying adventure in "Blopper" a vibrant dropper game that challenges your reflexes and strategic skills! Take control of the hero, a lively green slime with a penchant for bouncing, as it navigates through mesmerizing realms where gravity is but a whimsical plaything.

name: Blasted Lands
summary: A mod for Half-Life 2: Episode 2 about the story of Thomas, a man who owns data about the VAULT project. He will have to contact the Resistance and transmit data before it's too late...

name: Blisterball! & Mad Bomber!
summary:
Blisterball! & Mad Bomber! are a series of two 1 or 2-player arcade games for the Apple II.

Both games allow for single-player, as well as 2-player cooperative gameplay. Also allows for 2-player competitive play, where 2 players compete for a high score. The player controls a small ship or cannon on the bottom of the screen, which can move horizontally left and right using the Apple game paddles. The ship fires vertically upwards.

In Blisterball!, the goal is to shoot down bouncing balls as they bounce out of the chamber above the player. If the player is hit by a ball, they are damaged, and they fall into the drain below if they are struck 3 times. There is also a series of blister balls, which can be shot for bonus points.

In Mad Bomber!, the player must shoot bombs as they descend from slots above. If a bomb strikes the bottom of the screen, the player loses a point. 10 points lost, and it's game over. The player must regularly refill their ammo by bringing their ship to the edge of the screen, and if the player is caught in the explosion of a bomb, they lose 10 ammo.

name: Blythe
summary: A RPG Maker adventure at the end of the world. Starring psychic terror, secretive facilities and a girl doing her homework. Throughout the process of Blythe, you will become the backbone of a new society ruled by man's mind and heart.

name: Blind Ranking Game
summary: Rank the current item without knowing what the next one is! A web based game for streamers and youtubers to play alongside their audiences. Bring tons of fun and engagement

name: Blaze & Blade: Eternal Quest
summary: Blaze & Blade: Eternal Quest, also known as simply Blaze & Blade, is a multiplayer action role-playing game developed by T&E Soft for the PlayStation and Microsoft Windows. It is the first in the series (the other being Blaze & Blade Busters, which uses the same engine), and the only one released outside Japan.

name: Block Pong-Pong
summary: A pong-like game with block-breaking mechanics.

name: BlinDead
summary: Step into the darkness of "blindDead," a first-person horror game where you play as a blind person trapped in a haunted mansion filled with malevolent plush dolls. Use sound to navigate and survive, uncovering the mystery behind the dolls while evading death at every turn.

name: Black Sails
summary: As a daring space buccaneer, assemble your crew, navigate treacherous cosmos, engage in epic battles, and uncover hidden treasures on mysterious planets. Forge your legend as the most notorious captain in the galaxy!

name: Black Zork
summary: A super fun map treasure hunt game

name: Blue Rain
summary: This is a casual game with a beautiful appearance in the game background.

name: Bloody Hallowfest
summary: What starts as the preparation for a special Halloween night event at a summer camp turns into a nightmare when someone with a bloodied axe ends the lives of all your friends. Will you manage to escape and save yourself?

name: Black Smith
summary: ■Work every day and if you save enough money, you can go and meet your girl.■BlackSmith lower his hammer. Click at the exact moment that the hammer lands. The better your timing is, the more experience points you'll get.■The higher your experience points, the more expensive you can sell your products.

name: Blobby's Adventure
summary: It's your virtual pet Blobby's adventure! Guide him through the virtual world until he reaches the castle in the sky. Defeat the castle boss to win the game. Collect hearts to refill your health.

name: Block Magic Puzzle
summary: Block Magic Puzzle is a classic game with a 10x10 play style.

name: Blossom
summary: Early spring, 1999, Taoyuan Village. In just several days, a series of drowning incidents occurred in the same quaint village. Then, on the night of the fifteenth day, numerous villagers witnessed a woman in red who bore an uncanny resemblance to a lady who had previously met an unjust demise...

name: Blood of the Elves
summary: This is a story of a high Elven prince fall from grace. He is thrown out of Solaris for his unclean blood. Finding himself exiled to the land of the lower he has to form unlikely alliances and train his vampire powers to obtain vengeance for his crown, his family and most importantly his honor.

name: Bladeborne
summary: Delve into Bladeborne's medieval fantasy world, a CO-OP RPG adventure with battles, quests, and more! Join on this epic journey alone or with friends!

name: Blister Blight
summary: A robot assassin fuses with a noble mechanic. Take the role of Blister Blight as you confront your fellow rulers of Ridgescar. Repair or destroy? Wreck or Reform? The Blights await their fate!

name: Black Ocean
summary: "Let's play with me, horses of the gods, I'm ready, come to my sea."This is a deck building card game where the journey to prevent the 'black sea' that warps the world.Be a reasoner and work with your colleagues through a twisted, dreamy puppet show.

name: Blood Bar Tycoon
summary: Blood Bar Tycoon is a vampire bar management game. Build bars and blood factories, lure humans to harvest their blood, process it, and serve your customers: other vampires. Research quirky machines and deal with hunters! Expand through Crimson City to become a mighty Elder!

name: Blood Crossroad
summary: Blood Crossroad is a first-person psychological tale about William, a man who must deal with his alcoholism and his deepest shame as he is chased by a mysterious presence from Japanese folklore.

name: Blukaty
summary: Discover the story about a made up war that happened in soviet territory in the early '90s. Explore old abandoned cities and many more locations around the exclusion zone. Scavenge for loot and stay safe from the hostiles, they could be human, or not. You can also compete in multiplayer game-modes.

name: Blow Fly2: Overlimit
summary: "BlowFly2: Overlimit" is a superhero-style platform action game. Use the protagonist's unique abilities to explore and collect pink POOBABYs in the map. This time, you will go deep into the enemy's lair and challenge more powerful levels and enemies! Blowfly! flight! Dash!

name: BlueSkies 3
summary: BlueSkies 3 is a 2D fantasy turn-based JRPG featuring a magical world full of wonders. Journey with the young oracle named Candace Aethelmey and her friends, as they venture forth to join the Arcane Mastery Tournament. Along the way, they find new friends and unravel magical mysteries.

name: Black Hole Void
summary: In Black Hole Void, you can expect the unique experience of mastering the power of a black hole by devouring cities and challenging yourself in various game modes while competing for the top spot on the leaderboard.

name: Black plane
summary: This is a maze adventure game.

name: Bloody Heaven 2
summary: Inspired By the well-known rogue-like game Hades, slash out of the God Field all the way down to the Demon Domain and defy The Overlord Thanatos in the Deep Frost Hell in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Bleak Remastered
summary: Immerse yourself in the dystopian world of Pinnacle with BLEAK Remastered. Experience stunning new artwork and enhanced gameplay in this dark adventure. Can you navigate the relentless hostile world and save your sister, Asha?

name: Blood Servants
summary: Go it alone or bring your friends as you slash, burn, and loot your way through dungeons in a near-endless quest for power!

name: Blank Relish
summary: A struggle for survival and finding purpose amidst the isolation of an unknown planet.

name: Blocksy
summary: A little combo puzzle game for Playdate.

name: BlitzBot
summary: BlitzBot is a minimalist and modern arcade game that expands the air hockey genre. Take control of a robot and dive into dynamic and thrilling battles, where the objective is to score more goals than your opponent. Utilize the unique abilities at your disposal to destabilize and take the lead.

name: Bloom Thrice
summary: Embark on a journey through the gamified "Beautiful World", play (fight) with residents until you are satisfied, and explore to the end of the world. "Bloom Thrice" is a 2D action adventure game where you join the world full of brightness and kindness.

name: Blood & Dungeon
summary: Blood & Dungeon is an action game that revolves around the struggle of a captured soldier to survive and escape from a dark and blood-scented dungeon

name: Blockits
summary: You appeared in this world, in an empty hub connecting four distinct areas. You don't know who or what you are, and there's just a lot of different levels that can become really interesting and challenging to go through.

name: BlokhedJelli
summary: BlokhedJelli is a 2D platforming collect-a-thon that takes you on an adventure to different worlds; each with its unique theme and strange inhabitants.

name: Black Wolfberry: WuJing
summary: This is a third-person action shooter where you need to break through a maze

name: Black Blade
summary: This is a very classic puzzle game

name: Blacklist Mafia
summary: Blacklist Mafia - is not only a struggle for power and money, but also a dangerous game of survival. Who will be blacklisted, and who will become the new boss? Find out with us!

name: Black Werewolf
summary: Black Werewolf: Werewolves from neighboring lands invaded your lands and began to destroy all your property. The village elder had no choice but to send you to deal with the enemies and find out what was going on.

name: Blazing Trail
summary: Escape failed! All we have left is our will to survive, the endless hordes of enemies, and enough bullets to rip them all to shreds. Blazing trail. Vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.

name: BlockBawks
summary: Learn Python, a real world programming language, by controlling your character with code and solving 100+ challenges in story mode - or test your skills in PvP against friends. If you're stuck, ask someone to join your game and help out.

name: Block;Shift
summary: 3D platformer puzzle game with light horror elements, lonely and surreal atmosphere

name: Blood And Fear: Part 1
summary: Experience a thrilling third-person shooter game with action, adventure, and romance. Fight zombies and soldiers, complete missions, and unlock new areas. Meet characters who will help you on your journey and have fun with both story and arena modes.

name: Blood On The Thames
summary: A murder mystery puzzle game with visual novel elements in a Gothic, Lovecraftian world. Collect clues, solve puzzles, interrogate suspects, and uncover the mystery surrounding the death of Mini’s husband.

name: Blood Peace
summary: Blood Peace, a hyper-violent FPS, immerses players in intense cybernetic warfare. Unravel a cryptic story or dive into chaotic action. Hunt Easter eggs, survive diverse environments, and master unique skills. Join the ultimate killing machine in this fast-paced adventure!

name: Blood Running: Prologue
summary: Blood Running: Prologue is a stylish extraction shooter where you'll enter the cyber-wasteland, fight off creatures and bandits, loot valuable gear, and venture into the remnants of a world in ruins. Are you willing to bleed to survive, Blood Runner?

name: Black Hole Escape
summary: You take on the role of a lost astronaut who must return to the spaceship in zero-gravity space. Refill oxygen, avoid obstacles, and head towards the destination. Discover endless possibilities in this unique space adventure!

name: Blood Poker
summary: The Rules are Simple. Bet with your Blood. Enjoy the Show.

name: Blackout: Uma Aventura Energética
summary:
In Blackout, you have to help energy beings, Bivolt and Risoluminosa, who are in trouble. They have noticed a threatening drop in the level of positive energy on Planet Earth, one of the driving forces of the realm of energetic beings who live in symbiosis with the realm of material beings and who, if they become unbalanced, will suffer the negative effects through excesses or shortages of energy in our world.

When they ask for your help, they will tell you that, many years ago in our human time, they installed "positive energy" channels in various monuments throughout Planet Earth.
Surprisingly, when they came to inspect their positive energy sources, they realized that they were deteriorating much faster than expected. They were being covered by a layer of negative energy, unbalancing their realm and threatening our existence.

Join Bivolt and Risoluminosa and discover what's going wrong with the world's monuments.

name: Black Constellation
summary: Black Constellation is an exciting arcade game that will take you to a unique space world. Pixel graphics create an atmosphere of mystery and danger, and a variety of enemies and traps provide constant tension and opportunity for technical skill.

name: Blob Wars
summary: A turn based strategy game of blobs fighting for territory. Much like Othello, the board game, but blobbier.

name: Blue Ocean
summary: Friend, this game may seem very simple, but in reality it is very challenging.

name: Blu Caligo
summary: Step into the shoes of a nameless exile left to die on a Mediterranean island in this first-person horror adventure. Explore an open world of haunting beauty, craft your weapons, and confront threats emerging from the depths of the island at dusk.

name: Black & White Lite
summary: "Black & White•plot exclusive version" is a dystopian visual novel game: black and white, sensibility and reason, freedom and order: follow your beliefs and join your camp.

name: Blind Quest: The Ivy Queen
summary: Blind Quest - The Ivy Queen is a stand-alone adventure adventure with 86 new maps in 5 different scenarios to explore and interact with! Escape from the Tyrannical Ivy Queen prisons. An adventure audiogame for real adventurers! Explore and fight in the magical world of Blind Quest 3!

name: Blocks!
summary: BLOCKS! is a virtual sandbox that lets you create anything you can imagine - in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds. There aren't any predefined aims or goals.

name: Block Man Adventures
summary: This is a game that you are meant to rage at and try your best at with ten unique levels personally designed by me to tort... Make sure the payer has the most enjoyable time possible. I wish all changers luck and have fun.

name: Blue Eyes
summary: This game is easy and fun,

name: Blast in the Past
summary: Blast through 28 levels in this FPS inspired by classic retro games. Levels span across 3 game modes ending with unique epic boss battles to test your skills. Find hidden medals, discover hidden objectives, and level up your character all while trying to survive an onslaught of nostalgic foes.

name: Bloodroot
summary:
A war between the mages and regular humans ended with the regular humans acquiring the power of magic. Despite overcoming this hurdle, they possessed no army capable of beating the mages.
Luckily, the half-blooded witches were able to take down the lord of the mages, allowing the world to reset in peace.

The half-blooded witches of the church used their magic and miracles to dispel the crazed magic that warps the regular humans.
The heroine was one such witch.
One day, she receives information from an old church friend named Yuris regarding a certain underground city, and sets off to explore it.

name: Blood Quest
summary: Parody on the adventure genre

name: BlockArena
summary: BlockArena is a rogue-lite action game where the player must survive the enemies and defeat them by parrying their attacks. Player can unlock new shields with unique traits and skills. Pick a shield and create your own unique build each run and conquer the BlockArena!

name: Blood On The Dusty Trail
summary: In this thrilling audio book, we follow the story of Caleb, a young outlaw who finds himself on the run after a robbery. As he navigates the dangers of the Wild West, his gang of outlaws plan their get away.

name: Blue Thunder
summary: Horizontal shooter which was a tie-in with the TV series based on the eponymous movie.

name: Blockade Runner
summary: Horizontal space shooter

name: Blood4Blood
summary: You are a lesbian. A butch lesbian. You are also a vampire. And it's time for you to find something to eat. (This is a game about lesbian sex.)

name: Block in the Lock
summary: Block in the Lock is a 2D puzzle game where you move different blocks simultaneously like a hive mind. These blocks can be shifted and shaped to create certain patterns. All blocks move at the same time in the same direction and interact with their environment. A puzzle is solved when the movable blocks fill out the required shape with a certain pattern.

name: Black Out.
summary: Race your ship across a metallic landscape and absorb power fragments to replenish your constantly depleting energy supply. Accomplish different missions and unlock new ships and materials. Compete on the global scale for the highest scores. New missions are regularly added.

name: Bloodwood Dungeon
summary: Detailed, gritty text-based fantasy RPG centered on dungeon crawling with traps, puzzles, fights and loot. Recreates the gameplay of the old gamebooks. Simple battle system and hassle-free inventory management.

name: Bloody Feet
summary: The girl is sold to an island as a slave by a gang because of her beauty. She seized the opportunity to escape from the prison. She fought the enemy with her legs. With these beautiful feet she would strike down the enemies who had insulted her.

name: Blood Purge: Releaseburg
summary: Survive relentless zombie hordes in this rogue-like shooter. Brace yourself for intense gore and blood in the post-apocalyptic city, where every encounter demands precision and strategy.

name: Blood Reaver
summary: A Dark-fantasy, Round-based FPS. Become the Blood Reaver in solo or 4-player co-op. Harness forbidden magic and weaponry to shoot, blast and slice your way through endless hordes of demons. Upgrade your arsenal and survive long enough to discover the ancient secrets of the gods of hell.

name: Blue
summary: "Blue" is a hardcore platformer game with pixel art style. Players need to complete collection objectives in different levels while avoiding various monsters and obstacles.

name: Blood Within
summary: With the fall of the mighty Bloodstar, the universe plunged into chaos. Unleash your inner power alongside Captain Thorne, vanquish demons, and restore the order of light.

name: Blood Typers
summary: TYPE TO KILL in this survival horror adventure. Alone or with friends, explore a sprawling cursed film studio as its horror movies bleed into reality. Choose from a roster of characters then plan your escape from this bloody homage to old school horror. But remember... death is just a typo away.

name: Blank Relish: Remastered
summary:
Embark on a journey alongside Private Marian, who lost everything during his crash on an unknown planet, devoid of companionship and lacking his equipment... Will he survive the challenge and come back home?

Experience Marian's struggle for survival and finding purpose amidst the isolation of the unknown planet.

name: Bloodworth Academy Occult Club
summary: After rebelling one too many times, your parents have enrolled you in a prestigious, secluded boarding school, hoping to set you straight. However, you quickly discover that your new campus is a playground for the supernatural. As if that wasn't surprising enough, you're forced by the school's rigorous rules to join a club or risk expulsion. Thankfully, the newly-established occult club offers you a spot, conditional on proving your worth.

name: Bloodlust Rebellion
summary: In a vampire-ruled post-apocalyptic world, join the rebellion to overthrow the iron-fisted Vampire King Xavier and his corrupt reign. Guided by the charismatic Gideon, navigate a perilous landscape filled with supernatural creatures and ancient artifacts, including the mind-controlling device, The Nexus. With your loyal childhood friend and battle-hardened partner, Thorne, face the challenges of the rebellion and ignite a forbidden connection with the enigmatic vampire, Elric, that tests your beliefs and fuels your desire for revolution.

name: Blood Moon Calling
summary: Your comfortable life is shattered by the disappearance of your father and the spread of a mysterious scourge. While searching for a cure, a dangerous vampire lord steals you away for some unknown purpose and introduces you to a world of night. Mesmerized by Gothic castles, secret passages, and endless opulence, you fall further into the darkness.

name: Blue Dungeon
summary:
It's a defense game that purifies hearts with tears.
Summon tears to create fairies.
Merging the same number of the same fairies makes it stronger.
Collect fairies and build powerful decks to heal your hearts!

name: Blue Moon Princess
summary: You are a nurse living with your grandfather. On the night of a blue moon on your way home from work, a group of strangers wearing strange costumes attack you. You try to run away, and fall into a lake.

name: Black Raven: New Missions
summary: New missions for Black Raven. In total 32 missions for each side, new music tracks and loading screens.

name: Block Buster
summary: Block Buster was the original launch title for the Microvision, the first ever cartridge based handheld game console, and came packaged in the same box with the Microvision system.

name: Blue Moon
summary: Arcade space shooter

name: Blessed Agony
summary: Blood opens the way...

name: Blast Monkeys
summary: Blast Monkeys is a physics based puzzle game where the player must reach a floating bunch of bananas marked 'GOAL' to finish each level. The monkey is blasted out a cannon at a direction based on the players choosing. The game was developed by American studio Yobonja and was released for iOS in January 2011 and Android in February 2011.

name: Bloodrails
summary: Bloodrails is a fast paced Instagib capture-the-flag mod for Quake which features unique movement mechanics such as axe-dashing, skiing and grappling hooks.

name: Blissful Acres
summary: Blissful Acres: Immersive Farming RPG! Slay monsters in a vibrant world with quests & secrets. Cultivate crops, automate tasks. Invest riches to expand farm & upgrade gear. Wield powerful weapons against foes. Unique blend of farming & action-packed adventures for epic odyssey!

name: Blood Lines: Magicians' Chase 2
summary:
Enter the enchanted Mysterious Castle inhabited by zombies, maids, and vampire!
Witness legacy unfold in 2D PIXEL ACTION ADVENTURE!

name: Black Magic
summary: A game based on the manga Black Magic. The battle system is a hybrid of turn based and real time strategy where characters go on cooldowns after performing an action.

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Japanesque Cosmetic Pack
summary:
The Japanesque cosmetic pack changes Miriam’s default appearance so she can fight demons in style!

This cosmetic includes six unique items that can be equipped as a set or individually. When the entire set is worn, the character HUD will change to a unique appearance made just for this cosmetic.

Each item has its own stats and can be upgraded with crafting.

Individual items include:

- Japanesque Umbrella (WEAPON)

- Japanesque Wig (HEAD)

- Japanesque Robe (BODY)

- Sarashi (ACCESSORY)

- Usagi Mask (ACCESSORY)

- Sakura Storm (SHARD)

summary:
The Magical Girl cosmetic pack changes Miriam’s default appearance so she can fight demons in style!

This cosmetic includes six unique items that can be equipped as a set or individually. When the entire set is worn, the character HUD will change to a unique appearance made just for this cosmetic.

Each item has its own stats and can be upgraded with crafting.

Individual items include:

summary:
Miriam’s Complete Cosmetic Bundle contains all three premium DLC cosmetic packs designed to give Miriam unique looks in the game. Fight demons in style with these stylish new looks!

The bundle includes the Succubus, Magical Girl and Japanesque cosmetic packs.

Each cosmetic set includes multiple unique items that can be equipped as a set or individually. When all of the items for a set are equipped, the character’s HUD updates with a unique appearance.

The individual pieces each have their own stats and can be upgraded by crafting.
