- Japanesque Wig (HEAD)
- Japanesque Robe (BODY)
- Sarashi (ACCESSORY)
- Usagi Mask (ACCESSORY)
- Sakura Storm (SHARD)

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Succubus Cosmetic Pack
summary: The Succubus cosmetic pack changes Miriam's appearance so she can fight demons in style! This cosmetic bundle contains six upgradeable items. When all are equipped, a special HUD will appear.

name: Blazing Crow
summary: Blazing Crow is a SLG-based puzzle game(PUZ). The goal is to destroy all the electric towers! 4 action points can be allocated each round to move, use branches and attack towers. Dodge the spreading flames, they will kill anything; dodge the human shots, the bullets will destroy everything.

name: Blood Beat Club
summary:
Welcome to "Blood Beat Club"! Step into the shoes of Clayd, the ultimate vampire slayer, as he ventures into the heart of the night.

Navigate through neon-lit dance floors, each pulsating with energy and danger, as you match your moves to the rhythm of the music.

name: Block Pieces
summary: Block Pieces is a 3D jigsaw puzzle, minimalist and relaxing experience. Exercise your skill in reassembling 3D models back to their original form, while listening to a relaxing soundtrack.

name: Blinding Lite
summary: Blinding Lite is an action-adventure platformer that focuses on tight acrobatic platforming. Venture forth and save the Elementals from their capture! Experience a flowing move set, a world brimming with character, and a world painted in NES colors!

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 2
summary: Underworld teams, big consumers of warpstone infusions and mushrooms from the remotest parts, welcome Goblins, Skaven, Trolls, Rat Ogres and Snotlings. These outcasts take their revenge on life by humiliating the richest teams.

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 3
summary: Representing the traditionalist class of necromancy, these teams pick their players from the cream of the beyond, especially a thousand year-old Mummies, whitened Skeletons and starving Ghouls. And yet, they do not scorn a freshly risen Zombie, if he is stolen from the opposing team!

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 4
summary: Wood Elf teams are incredibly popular, as they’re known to put on an impressive show – they’re just as likely to (literally) dance circles around their rivals as they are to get smashed in (literally) spectacular fashion. They play the game better than just about anyone else, and they look stunning while they’re at it.

name: Blue Land
summary: Craft, fight, explore, and play with your friends! In this Open-World, 2D, CO-OP experience, you can do that all! The choice is yours...

name: Blunted in The Malen
summary: Join the individual story of Sharp, a revolutionary living in the corrupt city of Malen. Solve various puzzles with 2.5D visuals, uncover the mysteries of the locations, and untangle the knots in the story.

name: Bloodgrounds
summary: Delve into roguelike arena combat and city management where core gameplay features strategic battles, town development, and character growth. Command Gladiator units and navigate various mechanics for a comprehensive gaming experience.

name: Bloobs Adventure Idle
summary: Inspired by RuneScape, Bloobs Adventure Idle is a skill-based idle RPG with 24 skills, prestige progression, over 100 pets, and a unique banked-time system. Train, craft, and conquer at your own pace.

name: Bloxolotl
summary: Bloxolotl is a cozy puzzle game all about cute block-shaped Axolotls and connecting them together.

name: Blue Hunter
summary: Welcome to hell! Forge your own path as a Blue Hunter and turn into a god! Create your own army of undead monsters and beat all the monarchs that stand in your way. How far can you go?

name: Blunder The Sea
summary: Use movement and your spear gun to take down underwater baddies. The goal? Treasure of course!

name: Blumgi Soccer
summary: Blumgi Soccer offers a refreshing take on soccer. With big kicks and a dynamic physics system, every level invites you to strategize, kick, and score in ways you've never imagined. Get ready for a soccer experience like no other!

name: Bluff with Ash
summary: A story of retracing memories. In your recollections, defeat the oncoming saboteurs and get the truth. Even if it is a tragedy.

name: Blank Page
summary: Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where your choices influence the hero's story and decide the ultimate fate of the characters. A story where love and carnal passion intertwine. Love, sex, and mystery.

name: Block Paradise
summary: "Block Paradise" is an anime-styled Match 3 Game .

name: Bloom Echo
summary: The name of the game is simple: Find a way out of the maze in record time.

name: Blenderman
summary: Blender would love to have you for dinner. Dinner is served at 6 o' clock. You have until then to escape.

name: Blastgrid
summary: Join Sparkle, the adorable protagonist from Technopurge, in BlastGrid! Navigate futuristic mazes, detonate explosive traps, and outsmart VoltMech adversaries in this charming turn-based puzzle game. Uncover the secrets behind the uprising and restore order to the cybernetic realm!

name: Blast 3D The Arrival: Chapter 0
summary: Blast 3D The Arrival ~ Chapter 0 ~ Until one day...something of unknown origin came out of this world , a different kind of darkness one that this world has never experienced before... it all happened fast , at the edge of a small island ... where our unsuspecting hero.....

name: Black Screen
summary: This game is nothing more than a dark image covering the entire screen area, without the presence of any additional extraneous stimuli. The freedom of own imagination and interpretation of the experience is under the complete control of the player.

name: Bloodrun
summary: Completely redesigned Quake III Arena, it is already having 6 champions, following the same principle as in Quake Champions, it is planned to add more champions and add way more other champions. All mechanics and engine is Quake III Arena based, but the rest (maps, damage, weapons, champions) will be different.

name: Blocky Ascent
summary: A high-stakes first-person parkour platformer. Overcome dynamic obstacles like moving platforms and anti-gravity fields. Discover shortcuts to reach the summit faster, but beware, the climb demands mastery.

name: Bleakwood
summary: Bleakwood desecrates the foundation of chess in this roguelike deckbuilder. Enter a sinister fantasy world where corruption is key to success. Grow stronger with each run by unlocking cards, improving units, and making sacrifices, ultimately conquering your enemies. But remember, absolute power corrupts absolutely. Will you defile your morals to reclaim what is yours?

name: Blind Jump
summary: A brutally difficult platformer where all the platforms are invisible. Use your slime to unveil the platforms and carefully jump your way to the top.

name: Blonsters
summary: Blonsters is a fast-paced Roguelite FPS with an emphasis on run variation and randomization. Use high-powered weapons and perks to battle your way through hordes of randomized creatures in unique environments as you slay deadly bosses to claim victory.

name: BlackHoleMaze
summary: In this game, there are several young people who are very adventure and exploring.They discover a mysterious tunnel and embark on a series of fantastic adventures.

name: Blobbers Run!
summary: Blobbers Run! is a cute bubbly infinite runner for mobile android. Join adorable slimy characters as they set off on a journey to find their paradise - The Blob Kingdom.

name: Bloodsaint
summary: BLOODSAINT is not a remaster of a 94's retro-hardcore minigame about a cleric performing a ritual for a ruthless syntetic deity, but pretty close.

name: Blocked-Out!
summary: Conceptualized during the development of Hamtex, this is a community project focused on Block-Outs for Classic Doom.

name: Bloody Roses
summary: Unravel the sinister secrets of St. Ludmilla's Academy. Navigate eerie hallways, solve chilling puzzles, and escape the nightmare that lurks within. Can you survive the terror?

name: Bluma
summary: Join Bluma in this puzzle-platforming adventure where you make the platforms. It’s up to Bluma and her magical tail to unite the realms by solving physics-based puzzles and farming vegetables.

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Classic II: Dominique's Curse
summary: Classic II: Dominique's Curse brings retro-gameplay action to Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night! Featuring a larger map, canon Bloodstained storyline and brand-new gameplay, it's a brand new, old-school adventure. Which ending will you get?

name: Blinky Bill's Ghost Cave
summary: Blink Bill's Ghost Cave is an interactive story book with some smaller games and activities besides the main story.

name: Blast Circus
summary: Have a BLAST with your friends on the most explosive game show in VR!

name: Blocksworld
summary: Build anything from characters that run around to mighty machines that drive, blast, crawl, and fly! Then play with your creations in action-packed games, share what you’ve built with your friends, and explore creations made by people all over the world!

name: Blockage
summary: Find the source of your strange symptoms.

name: Blood of Vladula Jr.
summary: Blood of Vladula Jr. is a 2D platformer inspired by the platformers on the Nintendo Game Boy system. Jump, run, bonk monsters on the head, and turn into a bat, through 8 different levels, including a final boss stage. Help Count Vladula jr. regain the respect of the monster community and defeat his arch-nemesis.

name: Blood of Old: The Rise To Greatness
summary:
Blood of Old, Indie, Strategy game with RPG elements, with an in depth story.

This is your story! Begin from a young age and make a name for yourself, become a great Lord who keeps his people happy and a epic city builder!

name: Black Licorice
summary: Here come the lil' trick-or-treaters, aren't they adorable? Be sure to give them a lot of their favourite caramel candies. WARNING: Whatever you do, don't stick these kids with that nasty old black licorice left over from last Halloween

name: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls
summary: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

name: BloodBoarderz
summary: Race to the finish line and satisfy your murderous wishes while you go down the bloody mountains dodging obstacles and slaying your enemies!

name: Black State
summary: A secret group of scientists called the Architects summons you for a mysterious mission. Save the captives and uncover the truth behind a cataclysmic event. But none of you know what's behind the doors. Are you ready to open them?

name: Blaze From Outer Space
summary: Blaze crashes upon a planet and needs to find a way to escape from there

name: Blow'em Out
summary:
Do you think blowing out candles on your birthday cake is easy? What if the flames come to life and start chasing you while trying to put out all the candles?

Blow'em Out is an addicting arcade style game that isn't a cakewalk. Make your way through 10 stages to get the Happy Birthday you deserve!

name: Blitz
summary: Blitz is a speedrun type of game that you can run around in and see if you can get the best time. Levels range from the tutorial level, to a level that is just called "Hell". This game can get you glued to your screen for hours.

name: Bloodstone Courtyard
summary: A short doom-style level.

name: Blake Turner: Ace Attorney
summary: A little girl is found dead at the foot of a cliff, but her body suffered such injuries that it is not identified. A clumsy witness, a shabby prosecutor and a sharp attorney may lead to a "Not Guilty". Then who did really kill her?

name: Blink
summary: Every time you blink, you teleport somewhere new. Can you take control of this curse, and find loopholes to use it in your favour? An open world puzzle where you learn the rules as you play.

name: Bloodreaper
summary:
Farm. Kill.
Inspired by the Evil Farming Game
WASD/Arrows and Space
Playtime: 10-15 minutes

name: Blood Foundry
summary: 3 vanilla speedmaps made by Egg Boy.

name: Block Tower TD 2

name: Blightwreck

name: Block Siege VR

Players can choose to casually build and save their own worlds or fight waves of robots in their world or in one of the unique environments. Players can utilize blocks and weapons to fight off waves of robots.

name: Blood Punk
summary: Blood Punk is a hyper violent fast-paced retro FPS where you must exchange your health for bullets. Eviscerate giant abominations with the blood of an angel using deadly weapons in a dark fantasy comic book world.

name: Blok Shot VR
summary:
Embark on an interstellar journey with Block Shot VR, where the cosmos is your playground and every shot counts. Dive into a visually mesmerizing universe, complete with vibrant planets, pulsating audio, and challenging block adversaries that stand in your way. See you on the leaderboard! ​

Highlights of Block Shot VR:

​Dynamic Shooting: Challenge your reflexes and accuracy as you target and blow-up floating blocks and bombs.​Time-Based Challenges: With the clock ticking, every second matters. Strategize your shots, earn points, and strive for the highest score before time runs out. The Armory Awaits: After each victorious round, venture to the Store and use points to buy more lives and better weapons! ​Audio Emission: Vibe with the music and the blocks oscillating, vibrant colors Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide and see how your skills stack up on the global leaderboards. Regular Updates:

name: Blood Lust
summary: Fight against your friends in this multiplayer arena combat game and choose between different characters with occult skills.

name: Block Rancher
summary: Harvest Nature. Make the Goods. Please the Company. ESCAPE THE PLANET. In this sandbox Action-Roguelike you’ll work at a sprawling conglomerate, harvesting creatures and turning them into disposable trinkets for mass consumption.

name: BlastLast
summary: Old classic Bomber Man in new point of view! Your goal is simple: Blast all enemies by the bombs. Go alone with up to 8 players or assemble the party in online PvP. Choose one of 4 characters, use your specific ultimate, be smart and create strategies to win.

name: Bleak House
summary: It is based around a large mansion, with emphasis in exploration and close-quarters combat.

name: Black Hole Survivor
summary: A physics based twin-stick shooter about surviving as long as possible and getting a high score. Use your gravity beam or your gravity mine to destroy endless waves of enemies situated around a black hole.

name: Black Site
summary: BLACK SITE is a 1-4 player co-op horror game. Explore the levels with your partner to gather info about some government experiments, while trying to communicate with your partner without being too loud. Free monthly content updates with new levels.

name: Bloody Sky
summary: This is a game where you defeat three bosses. The hero's challenge continues until all the bosses are defeated.

name: Block Bot: Puzzle Journey
summary: BlockBot: Shape-shifting puzzle adventure in a vibrant pixel world. Transform, solve, explore. Each level unlocks new potential. Perfect for quick plays or long sessions, offering unique challenges every time you dive in.

name: Blu-Dude In The Quest for Chocolate Milk
summary: Blu-Dude in the Quest for Chocolate Milkis a whimsical and lighthearted puzzle game that invites players into a world of fun and silliness. Join Blu-Dude, a quirky sprite who loves to flap his arms, on a delightful adventure to find the ultimate treat—chocolate milk!

name: Black Submarine
summary: Deep into the unknown, navigate the shadows to uncover forgotten treasures. Every click, a choice; every shadow, a secret. Embark on a sinister underwater journey in search of a lost pirate legacy.

name: Blood for the Old Gods
summary: Play with up to 4 players local or online, in Blood for The Old Gods. A flintlock fantasy rogue-lite where you shoot, summon, and survive your way across the war torn countryside, once quaint villages, and sprawling industrial towns culminating in the final showdown against the New Gods.

name: Blood Sea
summary: In this game, you transform into a blue-black bat engaged in a heart-pounding escape from an ancient brown castle.

name: Blackwoods
summary: Alternate history Cold war FPS. Join the Blackwoods unit and unravel a conspiracy which threatens to end your resistance once and for all.

name: Black Bird
summary: It is a dynamic pixel style shooting game that focuses on fast-paced survival challenges and intense battles against endless zombie waves. The game adopts retro pixel art design, with full color graphics and strong visual impact.

name: Blubber
summary: This game is a mechanically-styled flying hazard avoidance game

name: Blow Out
summary: Blow Out is a "non-violent" arcade game where you can't kill your enemies, you can only blow them back! It's very fun.

name: BlueAge
summary: BlueAge is a brand new 32 map limit removing megawad made by Skronkidonk and @DCGRetrowave.This megawad was made in 1 1/2 years on and off & was tested on DSDADoom.Pistol start was made in mind and is designed for UV, but lower difficulties are implemented as well.

name: Blocus
summary:
Blocus is a Breakout variant with bright neon graphics. The gameplay builds on the classic formula of controlling a paddle near the bottom of the screen to bounce a ball and remove bricks from the field, but it adds some new elements. There are two types of paddles and they are divided into three parts. When the ball hits one of the paddle's three sections, it becomes warmer and when it is hot, bullets are shot automatically, destroying the bricks above. Particles have physics and will collide with the paddle or the walls. The player is rewarded for clearing columns and that increases the speed of the ball.

The game can be played in an endless mode or in a set of procedurally generated levels where the difficulty level is gradually increased. Destroyed bricks often leave behind power-ups such as additional balls or explosions. Diamonds can be collected as a currency to upgrade the paddle multiple times, improving the fire power. The game is free-to-play with an in-app purchase to remove the advertisements.

name: Blades of Light & Shadow
summary: Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 1 is the first book of the Blades of Light and Shadow series. It is followed by Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 2.

name: Blades of Light & Shadow II
summary: Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 2 is the second book of the Blades of Light and Shadow series. It succeeds its first book, Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 1.

name: Blood Bound
summary: Bloodbound, Book 1 is the first book of the Bloodbound series. It is followed by Bloodbound, Book 2 and Bloodbound, Book 3. It is the predecessor to its spin-off, the Nightbound series.

name: Blood Bound II
summary: Bloodbound, Book 2 is the second book of the Bloodbound series. It succeeds its first book, Bloodbound, Book 1 and followed by Bloodbound, Book 3.

name: Blood Bound III
summary: Bloodbound, Book 3 is the third and final book of the Bloodbound series. It succeeds its first two books, Bloodbound, Book 1 and Bloodbound, Book 2.

name: Blood Bound: Dark Solstice
summary: Bloodbound: Dark Solstice is a holiday special book of the Bloodbound series.

name: Blood Bound Origins
summary: Bloodbound Origins is a VIP-exclusive short form special of the Bloodbound series.

name: Blackjack Elf
summary: Play this casino gambling card game with some elves and win big money.

name: Blight
summary: Blight is a short exploration game with environmental storytelling.

name: Blades of Light & Shadow III
summary: Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 3 is the third book of the Blades of Light and Shadow series. It succeeds its first two books, Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 1 and Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 2.

name: Bloons Card Storm
summary: A turn-based collectible card game set in the Bloons universe.

name: Blackthorn Arena: Reforged
summary: Re-experience the thrill and challenges of managing a Gladiator arena in this management/simulation game. With new content with over 10 hours of gameplay, new graphics, Quality of Life updates, and all DLCs packed into this new experience, this is how Blackthorn Arena was meant to be experienced.

name: Block Factory
summary: Block Factory is a production and automation game focusing on creating 3D figurines from building blocks in a factory. Shape your models, design and optimize your assembly lines to bring your creations to life!

name: Bloody Rust
summary: A small community project where the maps are reminiscent of a rusting, aging, tech environment.

name: Bloody Rust 2
summary: A small community project where the maps are reminiscent of a rusting, aging, tech environment.

name: Bleemcast! for Metal Gear Solid
summary:
Bleemcast!, also known as Bleem! for Dreamcast, is an unlicensed commercial emulator developed and published by Bleem! for use with the Sega Dreamcast. By taking advantage of loopholes within the Dreamcast's Mil-CD format, Bleemcast! software allows the system to run select PlayStation games, often with enhanced graphics. Each Bleemcast! disc is intended for a single PlayStation game only, and is utilized by first booting the Dreamcast with the Bleemcast! disc, and then later swapping in the PlayStation game at a specific time.

While running under Bleemcast!, PlayStation games adopt anti-aliasing and bilinear filtering, as well as an increased resolution of 640x480 (double the PlayStation's 320x240). All released Bleemcast! games require a dedicated VMU to play and save progress, while also supporting the Jump Pack for vibration.

name: Blobbton
summary:
The eccentric Architect of a utopian future society has decided to build a skyward city out of hexagon-shaped blocks. Unfortunately, the Architect is a perfectionist, and his ever-changing mood constantly alters the ideal plan. As his apprentice, it's your responsibility to fulfill his ever-changing wishes for the perfect possible layout and to earn his approval!

Blobbton is a bright and colorful world of hexagon-based puzzles. With its casual yet challenging-to-master approach, players of all skill levels can enjoy quick and peaceful puzzle-solving sessions!

name: Blockdude
summary: Blockdude is a remake of the well known TI Caluculator game from Brandon Sterner as well as the blockman game from Soleau Software. This version of the game for the vircon32 fantasy console is based on the Playdate port which was in itself a port of the GP2X port of blockdude made over a decade ago.

name: Blocks Challenge
summary:
Blocks Challenge is a game where you will have to use all your wisdom and skill to put together 3 or more pieces of the same number to make them increase.

The goal of the game is to make as many combinations as possible while you have room on the board.

The game has global rankings and monthly prizes.

name: Blueprint Hell
summary: Does your code have enough scalability?

name: Blokdoku
summary: Sudoku and block puzzle game

name: Black Cat Blitz
summary: Welcome to Black Cat Blitz! A game of magic, wonder, and gambling your life away. Play as Nemo (or Mimi if you're a gamer girl rawr) as you try to make the best hand possible by collecting cards, climbing stairs, grabbing chips, and avoiding obstacles. Try playing with a friend in co-op mode! or dont... and be lonely

name: Blobl.io
summary: Blobl.io: A strategic 2D multiplayer RTS game where you build and defend your base, capture resources, and outmaneuver opponents in tactical gameplay.

name: Blobun
summary: You are a blob bunny. Your goal? Touch every tile!

name: Bleeding Roots
summary: Bleeding Roots is a short horror walking simulator taking place throughout the seasons. Water the plants in your garden, learn about them, and grow along them over time. Immerse yourself in a story about loss, grief and obsession. The controls are simple, moving the character through tank controls and reading up on the environment with an interact key.

name: Blob the Klex
summary: Step into paws of Klex and use your cat powers to explore the charming town of Katzburg in this 3D platformer, Blob The Klex!

name: Blind Date Simulator
summary: A role-playing game where players will interact with various female characters and try to find their true love from them.

name: BloomTale
summary: BloomTale is a cozy flower shop simulation game where creativity meets management. Arrange beautiful flower compositions that speak the language of flowers, manage your shop, and satisfy your customers in a world of blooming possibilities.

name: Blood & Play
summary: Hot single vampires in your area wanna give you the SUCC?! Blood & Play is a gay T4T visual novel about a guy who just lost his job in the tech industry and the centuries-old vampire who's willing to buy his blood. A deal this good can't actually be real, right...?

name: Blasphemous II: Mea Culpa
summary:
The ascension to penitence never ends. Strike down the enemies who stand in your way as you reveal pathways within Cvstodia to forgotten areas. Retrieve the shards and feel the stinging pain in your hands from the punishment you embraced, once more.

You can expect new quest alongside with new attacks, combos and special abilities. The DLC contains two new zones and two new bosses to fight.

name: Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain
summary:
A port of the classic PS1 action-adventure title, Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain is a dark fantasy action-adventure game set in a vampire-ruled kingdom shaped by murder, magic, and revenge.

The game features extensive voice acting, dynamic lighting, and over 25 minutes of full-motion video sequences. Its narrative-driven structure supports exploration across a large game world, with a focus on combat, spell use, and progression over a lengthy single-player experience.

name: BlockWorld Ai
summary: RPG puzzle game in which players train a mysterious AI, Hoshihabito-kun, who learns how to move puzzles and the results, and fight powerful bosses together with players

name: Blade Bouncer 2: Revolution
summary:
Customize your blade, perfect your fighting style, and be the best blader!
Fight your way to the top by unlocking new blade parts, leveling up your spirit animal, and perfecting your unique fighting style!
Become the best blade bouncer in this sequel to a belowed game.

name: Bleach: Soul Puzzle
summary: A Bleach themed puzzle game for mobile devices.

name: Bloodshed
summary: BLOODSHED is an exhilarating fusion of Score Chasing gameplay and Roguelite elements, combined with lightning-fast and captivating, retro-styled first-person shooter action.

name: Bloons 2: Spring Fling
summary: Spring is here! Bloons is back with a basket full of brand new Spring themed levels. Help Monkey find his lounge chair on the beach by getting through all 48 levels - and can you find the 2 secret levels?

name: Block Puzzle
summary: An addictive Block Puzzle game, become a block puzzle master.

name: Blasphemous II: True Torment
summary:
Blasphemous II: True Torment update includes New Game Plus mode, expansion of existing zones, new zone connections, new abilities, new enemies, new prayers, quality-of-life features, accessibility features and more.

In more detail:

Expanded zones: Choir of Thorns, Sunken Cathedral, and Basilica of Ancient Faces have all been reforged with new challenges to explore and conquer.
New connecting zones: Quicker traversal between previously explored areas.
A new challenge: the Labyrinth of Tides presents a new challenge for this ready to face it.
New Game +: Totally adjustable difficulty options from stronger enemies to deadlier spikes and lethal falls.
New Enemies: Cvstodia’s denizens rise to face you, are you up to their challenge?
A host of upgrades for the Penitent One, quality-of-life improvements, and new achievements.

name: Blast Course
summary: Blast Course is a first-person platformer centered around the classic game mechanic of Rocket Jumping. Control Kit in a day at work testing "Hyperboom", a revolutionary transport technology based on explosives.

name: Black Dust
summary: Explore a hand-drawn world of trash with your giant robot, trusty orb, and (lack of) platforming skills! These hostile lands will test your understand of many bizarre mechanics, and a complete exploration can only achieved by the most devoted of players.

name: BlightFog
summary: Journey across a dying world. Manage your resources. Build relationships with anthropomorphic characters. Find a new home or become a fuel drinking madman.

name: Blue Light
summary: Blue Light is a horror adventure game set in the year 2029. The main character goes in search of his missing sister, exploring the most dangerous and paranormal places in the city.

name: Blood: What Lies Beneath
summary: Follow Caleb who is lost at sea to a mysterious island. What will he discover beneath the surface, in the bowels of the island? A dark cult has taken over a mansion, its surroundings and the secrets beneath the reef. This is a non-linear addon for Blood. Fight the way you want, choose your own path through the island and find places otherwise kept a secret. Find clues to progress with tomes around the island

name: Block Koala
summary: Flamingus has stolen all the water! Solve puzzles to defeat him and save the park!

name: Blessed Curse
summary: Blessed Curse is a 4-player, online co-op, psychological horror game. Take on a rumor you've received of a haunted location in Japan. At the scene utilize your entity-hunting equipment to gather evidence and figure out what might be residing there.

name: Blue-Sky-Blue(s): Sora o Mau Tsubasa
summary: The Dreamcast port removes all adult content, and added new graphics and story elements.

name: Bloody Painter Dating Sim
summary: You have unfortunately been captured by a serial killer, and you must increase your chances of survival within seven days. Your choices will determine how he treats you and the outcome of your relationship. What will your final relationship with him be...?

name: Block Fortress 2
summary: "Block Fortress 2" lets you build an impenetrable fortress in almost any way imaginable, then puts you in the action trying to defend it! Place walls, turrets, traps, and tons of other specialized defenses to build your base. Choose from dozens of guns and equipment, build an army, and join the fight to defend your stronghold! Put your skills as a builder, commander, and fighter to the test as you try to fend off the relentless enemies of the Blockverse!

name: Blood & Company
summary:
Blood & Company is a work of interactive fiction with multiple endings, and about 3,000 total words in total, written for The Queer Vampire IF Jam.

"Your name is Zach. You’re 23, you were an art major in the two years of college you completed, oh, and you’re a vampire."

Play as Zach, who has survived his blood-sucking life so far by keeping to himself, never getting attached to the people he relies on for sustenance. Tonight, though, he's starting to feel a connection with the chatty grad student he plans to bite...

name: Blackjack and Pomodoro Mystery
summary:
"Human, go to work."

In the library, you are stuck with Blackjack, an unknown living creature that looks like a cat. Unexpectedly, lots of tomatoes appear in the library. It's also up to you and BJ to solve the mystery and identify the person who left the tomatoes lying around.

This is Pomodoro timer which has 25 minutes working-5 minutes resting and 60 minutes working-10 minute resting plans for player to select and work along with the moving black cat playing around the room.

name: Blink and Die Replay
summary: Blink and Die is a musical bullet hell with arcade aesthetics, in first-person, where you must move 360 degrees to dodge bars that moves to the song's rhythm and comes from all angles.

name: Blood of Calamity
summary:
Hoshu Washin is a nation ruled by four clans. Kenshiro, the ruler-in-waiting of the Totsuki clan, prefers to spend his time chasing skirts and abhors the training he's forced to endure on a daily basis.

One day, the Totsuki clan is attacked by mysterious beings in Oni Masks. Kenshiro vows revenge and sets off on a journey to bring them to justice with his faithful retainer and friend, Tatsuto.

name: Blood: Endless Pursuit
summary: It's a horror game,you should press wasd to move and f to interact，with all the tools you find you can escape from the house and the glown.The enemy will chase you by your blood.The environment light is dark and you have initial iight surrounded yourself

name: Blood of Mehran
summary: In Blood of Mehran, explore sweeping sand dunes, bustling bazaars and sprawling palaces. Go blade to blade with enemies, pick them off from a distance with your arrows, or slip by them like a ghost. Level up and build your legend.

name: Black Star
summary:
After failure on your last mission and recovering in hospital growing a new arm and leg, you have had time to find and study the base of the Cosmic Guerillas, the Black Star. The location is a huge industrial complex on an asteroid and when you have fully recovered you are going to attempt to destroy it. Now fully recovered and your Svelgian Raider craft rebuilt and modified you are flying over the base looking for the valley containing the energy ducts. After one run you prepare yourself to fly down the valley again and finally destroy the base.

The game is a 1st person shooter where you fly down the valley and using your sight drop bombs on the energy ducts that you pass. You can speed up or slow down your craft and you are able to move your sight left or right. Below your sight is a small radar and this shows any ships flying behind you. On the sides of the main playing area you can see a timer counting down, amount of bombs, fuel levels, power, speed and score. The faster you travel the more power and fuel you use.

name: BloodLight
summary: BloodLight is a cooperative first-person horror game for up to 5 players. While working as a night watchman, you will face a demon that constantly changes form. Set out in a team or alone through the chilling environment to complete all the tasks.

name: Blindfire
summary: Blindfire is the first FPS game set in complete darkness. Rely on your insincts to eliminate your opponents. It's either hunt or be hunted... Ready to light 'em up?

name: Blips
summary: Blips is a remake of the dos bips game made by Bryant Brownell, its a sokoban style puzzle game but with exploding dynamite and collecting coins

name: Bloody Rune
summary: Turn-based single-stroke drawing roguelike deck-building game. Draw and use various runes to defeat all enemies and win the Rune War.

name: Blob-Y
summary: Play as Blob-Y, a sentient blob yearning for freedom. Push the testing facility to its limit as you overcome mind-bending levels. Discover how to combine mechanics in creative ways to outsmart your creators in this challenging puzzle game.

name: Blockdock
summary: Move, rotate, and place blocks to fill platforms. Play against the clock, be accurate, or just relax with endless play in this Tetris-inspired game.

name: Blood=Bullets
summary: Blood=Bullets is a bullet hell boss rush action platformer where you dash into bullets to refill ammo. In order to kill the blood itself, one must hack into the sequence.

name: Black Myth: Destiny Man
summary: 500 years after the Western Heaven Sutra. The four members of the pilgrimage group have all returned to the west. Those scriptures have also been scattered in various places. Nowadays, despite the absence of saints, demons still run rampant.

name: Black Death Interactive
summary: Travel back to 14th century Venice during history's deadliest pandemic. This interactive historical narrative puts you in the shoes of Giana, a young baker's daughter, as you face impossible choices in a city gripped by plague.

name: Blind Exposure
summary: Navigate through claustrophobic, completely dark world illuminated only by scans you manage to create; listen carefully to sounds coming from the darkness, and don’t let dread and paranoia get to you.

name: Black Inc.: Go to Work
summary: Black Inc.: Go to Work is a pixel-style RPG game created using RPG MV, the game has 2 characters and 8 endings, the game is inspired by China's overtime culture, players accumulate energy and work hard to achieve the ultimate game goal.

name: Blosics 2
summary: Blosics sequel. Bigger, stronger, better!

name: Blockoverse: The Legend of the Pix
summary: Blockoverse: The Legend of the Pix is an upcoming 2d sidescrolling collect-a-thon platformer. After a group of hammy villains (The Cubies) accidentally unleash an ancient demon named Vertex, a square named Red must harness the powers of 5 archaic spirits, known as the Pix, in order to defeat Vertex. Traverse 5 unique worlds, each sporting their own unique enemies and challenges, on your search to find the 5 Pix, harness their awesome power and bring peace and justice back to the universe.

name: Blades & Battles
summary: Blades & Battles is a fantasy Beat'Em Up game that takes players to the heart of the legendary world of King Arthur in his barbarian youth. A modern version of classic titles such as Golden Axe.

name: Blood West: Dead Man’s Promise
summary: Blood West: Dead Man’s Promise offers you a new story chapter of immersive stealth FPS action. The course of which will take you to a familiar place at an unfamiliar time. As Twen’s father, you will have to pay your debt to the God of Death and wrangle lost souls for his herald. Be prepared for another Weird West adventure with new eldritch horrors and new weapons to send them back to where they came from.

name: Bloxcalibur
summary: Find your sword, and press the space bar to swing it. Your goal is to run, jump, and slash your way to the portal in each level.

name: Blade: Trinity
summary: In this Marvel-licensed game you are Blade: half human, half vampire, and a feared vampire hunter. You need to track humans collaborating with the vampires, and then take on the creatures themselves with your gang of Nightstalkers - human vampire hunters. Vampire leader Danica has resurrected Drake, the original vampire, and they plan to use his blood to make all vampires immune to daylight. The action is shown with a top-down perspective as you move Blade through different locations. In the beginning of the game, you are locked up because you have killed a human disguised as a vampire. You soon discover that your interrogators, Chief Reede and Dr. Vance, are slaves of the vampires themselves.

name: Blade of Dawn
summary: This is a third-person hack-and-slash roguelike game. You will play as a Knight of Light defending against the invasion of the Shadow Empire. Using the power of holy light, you can convert shadow-infected enemies into allies. Try to survive until dawn!

name: Blank
summary:
BLANK is a horror/romance visual novel with an unconventional structure, made for the Spooktober VN jam.
Make your wish, and change the world to fit your desires. But should the world unravel, and should it return to its blank state, all will be lost, and you will begin anew.

Will you repeat this loop forever? Will you ever understand what this place is, and why you're here?

... do you want to?

name: Blob
summary: Embark on a chemistry-packed adventure! Collect elemental blobs, combine them into powerful compounds, and build the ultimate periodic table collection. One element drop per hour, with more drops influenced by your blobventory!

name: Black Pine: Incident Response
summary: Black Pine is a 4-player online co-op horror survival game where you and your crew are hired contractors, sent into the Appalachian Mountains to restore critical infrastructure after unknown events devastated the area. Take on important repairs and stay alert—nothing is quite as it seems.

name: Blur Overdrive
summary:
Blur Overdrive is a racing game from the overhead perspective that, despite having different camera views and controls from the original Blur (PC, XBox 360, and Playstation 3), still offers up a similar experience of driving in lightning-fast races with all kinds of dirty tricks.

You have more than twenty different vehicles to choose from, all of which you can personalize by changing colors and adding different upgrades. Of course, the majority of them need to be unlocked by winning competitions and saving up money from different races.

Your objective during each race is to come in first, but that doesn't necessarily mean that you have to be the fastest. To help things go your way, you can use up to eight different power-ups that allow you to activate shields, drop mines, launch lightning bolts, and much more.

Blur Overdrive is a fun three-dimensional racing game that, in addition to boasting excellent graphics, has truly great gameplay. Its control system, which is often a problem in other Android racing games, is a true delight.

name: Blue Night Laundromat
summary: A short 2D exploration adventure in a retro style! Explore a laundromat in the middle of the night and try to clear it!

name: Blip's Supermassive Adventure
summary: Play as a tiny black hole named Blip and adventure out into the cosmos, absorbing your enemies' powers and exploring several space-themed levels in order to save your best friend, a star named Shimmy! All the while proving just how supermassive you can really be!

name: Blood Cleaner
summary: In Blood Cleaner, you’re Amaan, a cleaner hired to tidy up an old mansion. But as eerie clues and bloodstains emerge, you’re left wondering—was there a crime, or is something haunting these walls? Clean up…or get caught in the mess.

name: Blightstone
summary: Blightstone is a challenging, dark fantasy turn-based roguelike that brings unique twists to combat through freedom of character placement, interactive environments and hardcore resource management. Dying, learning, and meta-progression will be key in your mission to destroy the Blightstone itself

name: Blood Within: Star's Shadow Armor
summary: Unlocks the cosmetic content for Captain Thorne.

name: Blood Within: Thunderstorm Armor
summary: Unlocks the cosmetic content for Valu'ur.

name: Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain
summary: This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain. Chronologically, this takes place in an alternate timeline, between the events of Blood Omen and Soul Reaver, and lets players experience Kain's epic adventure on PS4 and PS5 for the first time.

name: Block Puzzle
summary: An interesting block match puzzle game.

name: Block Jam
summary: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!

name: Blue Revolver: Double Action
summary:
After a long time in development and a fruitful public beta, Blue Revolver: Double Action is now available for all players. Go forth and flourish!

Double Action is a large, free update to our game. We wanted to give players the best possible version of the game. There's rebalancing, new weapons, new content, a ton of new features and options -- including a super-smooth 120Hz mode!

name: Block Blaster DX!
summary: New block puzzle game, offering a relaxing yet challenging experience for all ages.

name: Blast Judgment
summary: Wield an unholy arsenal in this FPS Roguelite. Plunder arcane relics and practice forgotten rituals to take on armies of twisted foes. Seek the cruel gods that pulled you from your grave, and inflict your BLAST JUDGMENT.

name: Blast-a-Bug!
summary: Giant Bugs have invaded our planet and as a soldier it is your duty to help Corporal get rid of them ! Hop into your specially designed ball engine and crush them while trying to preserve citizens integrity !

name: Blasphemous 2: Mea Culpa Edition
summary:
Blasphemous 2 is the critically acclaimed second installment in the brutal side-scrolling metroidvania series.

Unveil the deepest secrets with the Blasphemous 2 Mea Culpa Edition, combining the base game and Mea Culpa Expansion.

name: BlockTanks
summary: A web browser tank game focused on multiplayer battles in a simplistic format. Featuring multiple battle modes, weapon types, maps, and community maps.

name: Blackjack Tavern
summary: Set in a magical tavern, choose your class and build your deck from over 300 cards to defeat your tavern opponents.

name: Blippo+
summary: Never bland and non-demand. You simply can’t find television like this anywhere else. Change the way you channel with Blippo+. Coming soon.

name: Blast-A-Finn
summary: A 2D physics-based platformer. play as a fish who can only move by blasting arm cannons in a direction and getting launched the opposite way.

name: Blackfrost: The Long Dark 2
summary: A year after the Aurora’s appearance & the world went dark, the people of Harmont & its vast wild environs struggle to survive the Quiet Apocalypse. Survive alone or with others against a host of new hazards & a fresh new survival sandbox from a pioneer of the genre. Live together. Die alone.

name: BlackGate
summary: In this asymmetrical multiplayer experience, every player has a unique role to play, with one ultimate goal: survival. Up to 4 Engineers are pit against an alien specimen controlled by a 5th player.

name: Black Fairy
summary: A new wintery map: Black Fairy on its black red wings! Contains lots of enemies, explosions, boom-booms, and there's also one snowman. In addition, it contains a calmer variation of the map called "White Noiz" which is meant to be played after Black Fairy

name: Blasted Dice
summary: Blasted Dice is a roguelike deckbuilder where you assemble a deck of dice to blow up your enemies. Achieve masterful combos, acquire legendary items, meet strange characters and blow up your enemies with your very own dice launcher.

name: Blasting Bad
summary: It's Blastin' Time!

name: Black Armor: Battle For Survivors
summary:
In a world on the brink of chaos, Black Armor, Spicy, Charlie and other heroes fight to maintain balance, while the Grim Reaper and his dark forces threaten to destroy everything. Prepare for a story full of bravery, betrayal and redemption, where every fight counts.

Experience the most visceral and challenging combat. Don't miss it!

name: Blocktopia
summary: Blocktopia is a vibrant and humorous clicker city-builder game. Gather resources, build your town, and defend it against nightly raids! In this chaotic world where justice prevails, survive and dive into a fun city-building experience!

name: Blacksmith Simulator
summary: Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op is a medieval simulation that combines survival, building, and trade. Gather wood and ore to develop your base and character, forge powerful weapons, and survive across three regions themed around Snow, Castles, and Egypt. Fight monsters and grow through trade!

name: Bloody Bar Simulator
summary: In this fantastical world where creatures and humans coexist, open your own bar. The customers of this bar aren't humans, but creatures. Hunt humans to cook meals. Order ingredients from merchants. Prepare the orders given by your customers. Earn money and develop your bar however you like.

name: Bloons 2 Christmas Expansion
summary: Ninja Kiwi brings you a special exclusive pack of Christmas themed Bloons 2 levels. Have a happy and safe Christmas!

name: Bloody Cleanup
summary: A co-op roguelike horror game where you descend in an endless elevator and complete assigned tasks. Each floor brings new monsters, new locations, and new challenges.

name: Blepp Quest!
summary: Blepp Quest: an adventure RPG about getting treasure, smashing baddies and gross close-ups. Seek the legendary Gaia's Opal... a shattered gift from the Gods.

name: Blood Night
summary: A puzzle roguelike that features strategic battles utilizing chess movement rules.

name: Blades of Mirage
summary: Embark on an epic isometric action RPG set in a Southeast Asian-inspired world. As Mira, use your ability to create water-based weapons and explore ancient ruins scattered across unique islands. Confront corrupted, powerful creatures and solve intricate puzzles to secure the ancient relics.

name: Blackblade Revenant
summary: Blackblade Revenant is a Sekiro-like action RPG with parry-focused combat set during the fall of an ancient dynasty. Rise from the dead as Revenants and return to the mortal realm with one mission: Kill the King who cheated death.

name: Blockus
summary: A russian game similar to KLAX, the object is to catch assorted color falling tiles and create columns of a single color.

name: Block Slender-Man 3D: Lucky Survivor - Worldwide Multiplayer Edition
summary: Block Slender Man in Multiplayer Mode! Now with Worldwide Mode! Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character and then show off on the battle field!

name: Black Beacon
summary: Black Beacon is an action-packed RPG set in a world where ancient prophecies come to life. After the arrival of the "Seer," a mysterious black monolith known as the "Beacon" activates, unleashing strange anomalies around the Tower of Babel. These anomalies are far from mythical—they hide powerful secrets that could reshape humanity's future.

name: Bluejeweled
summary: A mod for bejeweled 3 to add more blue.

name: Blockbuster
summary: Blockbuster was released by Elcon Industries in 1977. Blockbuster is an arcade cabinet featuring five different games that can be played: Magic Squares, Tennis (Pong variant), Soccer (Pong variant), Gravity Ball (Pong variant with gravity) and Blockbuster (Breakout variant). Depending on the game up to four players can play. The game is available in four different cabinet styles (round cocktail, octagonal cocktail, rectangular cocktail and cabinet).

name: BlockBuster
summary: The mobile game Block Buster is a Breakout variant. The player controls a paddle at the bottom of the screen used to to hit a ball, which in turn hits the blocks. Sometimes when the ball hits a block, an item drops from it, providing multiple balls, a change of speed or altering the paddle size. To move on to a next stage, all blocks need to be removed from the screen. The game has 8 stages.

name: Black Mesa: Military
summary: Experience the consequences of the resonance cascade scenario once again, and play as one of Hazardous Environments Combat Unit marines, Steven Mills. You are not a survivor, you are sent on a mission. Secure Black Mesa Research Facility with the rest of your squad and eliminate any hostile forces. This mod is not a recreation of any existing mods. It's the mod developers own creation and all maps and plot are being developed by them. You will experience Black Mesa disaster from a perspective of the villains and even see Gordon Freeman in person.

name: Blackbox
summary:
What if a game was nothing more than a peaceful place where curiosity was rewarded?

Blackbox, the evolution of the Apple Design Award winning puzzle game for iOS, leaps beyond your fingertips, through the confines of glass, and into your home and being. Poke bubbles, ponder puzzles, and let the rest gently unfold around you. Become enveloped in reactive visuals, perplexing sounds, and perhaps find something profound.

name: Blockxy Puzzle Adventure
summary: Fill in the missing pieces and start a puzzle adventure

name: Bleeding Code
summary: Bleeding Code is a psychological horror game set in a decaying fantasy world long abandoned by its creator. As an unnamed traveler, you must collect the pieces of the shattered kingdom and uncover the truth behind its downfall while trying to keep your sanity and evading a sinister group who want to complete a mysterious ritual tied to the creator’s disappearance

name: Blimpy
summary: Gather your friends to assemble your racing vehicle and together, drive it across the track. Select from a wide array of parts and adapt your vehicle to the challenges ahead. Can you put everything together in 90 seconds and then make the best time on the track?

name: Blueman
summary: Blueman is an office-worker simulator set in a demonic corporation. Each floor tests your attention to detail, and mistakes send you back to the start of the workday.

name: Black Light Wave
summary: This is a casual and relaxing game based on the classic fable of a turtle and rabbit race

name: Blades, Bows & Magic
summary: Blades, Bows & Magic is a casual medieval fantasy multiplayer / singleplayer strategy card battler. Based on the mechanic of Rock, Paper, Scissors - but with Warriors, Archers, Mages - fighting with special abilities.

name: Bloodpath
summary: An intense and challenging shooter with slow mo and lots of blood, inspired mainly by SUPERHOT and Hotline Miami

name: Bleach: Soul Resonance
summary:
BLEACH: Soul Resonance is a 3D action game that immerses players in thrilling sword-fighting battles. Roleplaying as Ichigo Kurosaki, players will wield their powerful Zanpakuto as they lose themselves in an original storyline while fighting alongside friends and growing stronger. The game features smooth swordplay, diverse battle strategies, and gameplay mechanics like collecting and developing multiple characters and teaming up with others for battles.
As BLEACH fans ourselves, we are honored to have the chance to develop a game for the franchise we love. We are committed to expressing our passion and love with this labor of love, and we hope that more people will discover its charm and experience it for themselves.

name: Bloons TD 6: Rogue Legends
summary: Rogue Legends is a rogue-lite adventure across a huge variety of Bloon infested maps. Build your Monkey Party and make strategic reward choices at key steps to advance. Win and Buy Artifacts to boost your Party's power and defeat the Boss!

name: Black Raven
summary: Black Raven is a dark 2.5D action-adventure rooted in Slavic Folklore set in 14th-century Eastern-Europe. Play as Ivan, a man consumed by vengeance after a brutal raid shatters his family. Journey through grim landscapes and fight brutal enemies in this dark tale of loss, rage, and resilience.

name: Blast Damage Days
summary: Blast Damage Days is a short story with visual and audio elements. Explore a story about lesbian love and healing from trauma in this queer-themed furry visual novel.

name: Blaze Rush
summary:
Blaze Rush is a 2.5D platformer similar to Sonic Rush but it only features everyone's favorite lavender feline, Blaze The Cat!
Boost through levels and see if you can beat your record time while smashing and burning robots along the way!

name: Black Mystery: Wujing
summary: Hot Blood NPC man hit bottom! Kill for love! Follow in the footsteps of the Big brother to the West! Sha Wujing is the protagonist this time! Seriously play, have a good rest, just do it!!!

name: Bluesky Map Jam
summary: This project started as a way for Doom mappers and modders to find each other on the new social media site and to show off their skills. The result was 44 maps from mappers of all disciplines with all kinds of aesthetics and gameplay styles.

name: Bloody Hell 2
summary: Pulverize demons as a small Angel wielding a GIANT DEMONIC HAMMER! Explore Hell's deepest layers, and uncover the truth of how Heaven fell in this Bullet-Hell Metroidvania. Will you succeed, or die in the chaotic depths of BLOODY HELL 2?

name: Blaze of Storm
summary: Blaze of Storm is a vertical scrolling shmup in which you use explosions from a variety of sub weapons to destroy enemies in cyberspace.

name: Blue Wyrm
summary: Blue Wyrm is a first-person skill-based action game, where you take upon a role of the Red Knight Gabriel, armed only with her trusty sword to fight off a tight, but varied roster of enemies in a nonsensical surreal dungeon. Learn the ways to use your movement and position, directional attack variety and timing to perfect your battle technique and succeed in your quest to save her.

name: Blackbeard's Treasure
summary:
Toss coins and rule the high seas!
Golden riches slumber on the treasure islands that await you!

name: Black Light Kills
summary: Welcome to the darkness of the town; here, you walk a fine line between reality and dreams, questioning your sanity. Black Light Kills takes you deep into Aiden’s mind, where nightmares begin as reality fades.

name: Black Hole Void: Survive The Hole
summary: Black Hole Void: Survive The Hole DLC Experience a thrilling escape adventure, improve your skills in the Upgrade Shop, and compete for the top of the new leaderboard. Are you ready to escape the Black Hole and prove your survival skills?

name: Bloodkill: Goreblast Overkill
summary: BRUTAL First Person Shooter, explore the world to become stronger to achieve the main goal - kill the boss.

name: BlazBlue Cross Tag Battle: Additional Color Set 1
summary:
Download an additional color for your characters!
Color code 13 is included.

name: BlazBlue Cross Tag Battle: Additional Color Set 2
summary:
Download an additional color for your characters!
Color code 14 is included.

name: BlazBlue Cross Tag Battle: Additional Color Set 3
summary:
Download an additional color for your characters!
Color code 15 is included.

name: Blade Ball Arena
summary:
Blade Ball Arena is a fast-paced, easy-to-pick-up PVP game for you and your friends.
No tricky rules. No tutorial. Just you, a blade, and a heat-seeking dodgeball. Got what it takes to come out on top in the Blade Ball Arena? Jump in for a game or two!

name: Blackshard
summary: Blackshard is a first-person exploration game. Wander through a strange megastructure, the Labyrinth, to unravel its mysteries... Your behavior within the Labyrinth will define the outcome of your journey. What path will you choose to take?

name: Blueprint Bob
summary: Stack, twist, and balance your way to record-breaking heights. Create the tallest, most daring structures imaginable, and help Bob reach for the sky!

name: Blessing in the Darkness
summary: Blessing In The Darkness has an unique turn-based combat system, into a dungeon scroller perspective, with survival horror elements! There is no map, go ahead and try to survive till the end!

name: Bloodmoon Rush
summary: Brave through Dracula's castle to retrieve Davids true love; his car! In this 2D platformer with stunning visuals, you'll face goons and ghouls, fight off Dracula's loyal staff and explore the castle on your way to the final boss, the big man himself.

name: Blade & Soul Neo
summary:
Blade & Soul NEO is a modern reinterpretation of Blade & Soul's iconic Wuxia-themed, fantasy world, offering unparalleled action-based combat and character customization. Players can reconnect with the original spirit of the free-to-play, open-world MMORPG in a richer, visually enhanced experience set in a world of Asian mythology where fast-paced combat collides with the stunning visual beauty.

Gamers will re-live the original storyline as a hero determined to restore honor to their clan that’s been wiped out by enemy forces. Players can pick one of four playable races based on animal lore, including the Dragon, Qilin, Phoenix and Turtle, and amongst seven classes, including Assassin, Blade Dancer, Blade Master, Destroyer, Force Master, Kung Fu Master, and Summoner.

name: Blessed with Death
summary: Blessed with Death is a FNAF-Like playing in its own universe with its own story and characters. It brings a twist on the original formula by cleverly removing the electricity system and instead having uniqiue door and item mechanics that were never seen before.

name: Bloxpath
summary: A minimalist roll playing puzzle game. About 10 unique puzzle mechanics, around 150 puzzles, and satisfying smooth procedural animations.

name: Blackhole Simulator
summary: Enter the life of a small black hole at the center of the smallest galaxy. What you seek is to become the legendary super black hole.

name: Blades of Fire
summary: Introducing Blades of Fire, an all-new action adventure that takes you across a beautiful world full of uncertainty and challenge. You take on the role of Aran de Lira, firstborn of the King’s Ward. The newly crowned Queen Nerea has cast a powerful spell that turns steel into stone and only her arms of abominations wield the divine metal against which other blades shatter…

name: Blumgi Slime
summary: Blumgi Slime is an arcade game that will put your timing and aiming skills to the test by jumping to the finish line. You control a cute, bouncy character that can only move around by jumping.

name: Bless You Again
summary: Lily” is a magician and a homunculus. She challenges a dungeon named “Tomb of Blessings” in search of a certain blessing! The player controls a character faithfully reproduced from the cel animation and defeats many monsters in search of a powerful blessing.

name: Blood Curse Legions
summary: This is a RTS game where you primarily control cavalry units in battle. Utilize the vampire's abilities to command in battle, develop unique vampire heroes based on the game's evolving situation, and form a powerful Blood Curse Legion to dominate the world and establish a vampire nation.

name: BlockFront
summary: a WWII Total conversion FPS for MInecraft

name: Black Square
summary: Black Square: This game is a vertical labyrinth where players must navigate various paths—some leading to dead ends—to find the correct route and reach the top. The main advice: after jumping, use a crouch to climb higher obstacles. Thank you

name: Bloons Junior
summary: Play 50 all-new challenging levels, and a new special balloon type! Some of these levels are very hard, and should keep most of you busy for a while!

name: Bloons Player Pack 5
summary: Bloons is a strategy game in which players throw darts at a series of floating balloons in an effort to pop them all. Players are given a limited amount of darts and must pop a certain amount of balloons to progress to the next level.

name: Bloons Player Pack 3
summary: Bloons is a strategy game in which players throw darts at a series of floating balloons in an effort to pop them all. Players are given a limited amount of darts and must pop a certain amount of balloons to progress to the next level.

name: Bloons Player Pack 2
summary: Bloons is a strategy game in which players throw darts at a series of floating balloons in an effort to pop them all. Players are given a limited amount of darts and must pop a certain amount of balloons to progress to the next level.

name: Bloons Player Pack 1
summary: Bloons is a strategy game in which players throw darts at a series of floating balloons in an effort to pop them all. Players are given a limited amount of darts and must pop a certain amount of balloons to progress to the next level.

name: Bloons Player Pack 4
summary: Bloons is a strategy game in which players throw darts at a series of floating balloons in an effort to pop them all. Players are given a limited amount of darts and must pop a certain amount of balloons to progress to the next level.

name: Blobbs Remastered
summary: Blobbs: Remastered combines simple but addictive gameplay, colourful and cartoony visuals, witty humour and ever so satisfying popping sounds. Ping, pop, zap, freeze and even explode your way through real time puzzles, attempting to create spectacular chain reactions in order to clear the screen in as few clicks as possible.

name: Bliss Valley
summary: While running errands, you'll meet three cute furry characters that you can potentially date, romance, and eventually seduce. This game contains explicit sexual content.

name: Bloody Night Cult
summary: Step into a 2000s-inspired horror experience with gritty, VHS-style low-poly graphics. Uncover the dark secrets behind your brother's disappearance.

name: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls - Deluxe Edition
summary: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

name: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls - Ultimate Edition
summary: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

name: Blobbert 64
summary: A 3D platformer interpretation of Blobbert's Bouncy Breakout. Venture through different worlds and realities, encounter different foes, and play as multiple characters. Stop Araka Monoi.

name: Blind_Site
summary: Explore dark corridors, snap photos, and survive hostile entities hunting you. Use your camera's flash to reveal the way, but beware - each flash draws unwanted attention.

name: Block Trucks Multiplayer Racing
summary: Block Trucks is a competitive, real time, ranked multiplayer racing game. Race against opponents on a variety of challenging track surfaces, upgrading your truck and ranking up as you win races.

name: Bloodletter
summary: Bloodletter is a medieval deck builder all about using your cards to heal bizarre villagers. Protect their bodies and minds from the torment of mysterious entities by customising your unique deck and enhancing your dubious healing methods.

name: Black Market
summary: Black Market is an item shop simulator where you are a shopkeeper that pawns items and strikes deals with your villainous customers in order to make rent. It's a cutthroat world out there.

name: Blackout: Director's Cut
summary: Upon abandoning your previous life, you find your past has finally caught up to you. Your world has gone dark, and you aren't alone. You must use your eyes to navigate through the dark and uncover the truth of the Meyer City Prison. You can't escape your inner demons. Your end is near.

name: Blend_IT
summary: Blend_It gives players a simple black-and-white image. The image has a value of 1 for white and 0 for black. These color values are combined through three operators: multiplication, addition, and subtraction Make it a more complex image!

name: Block Dude Deluxe
summary: Your primary goal is to reach the exit door in each level. stack blocks strategically, creating pathways and staircases that allow you to traverse the environment. Each level presents a unique puzzle, requiring careful planning and precise execution

name: Blockhead
summary: In Blockhead, you take control of various blocks and move them around to solve puzzles. Many blocks can move left, move right and jump, but others have different restrictions and mechanics that you'll need to deal with. You'll need a combination of brains and skill to beat all 50 levels!

name: Block Mover Challenge
summary: Block Mover Challenge offers a captivating puzzle experience with minimalist graphics and subtle sound effects. Use the white block to push others into the door and complete each level. Navigate obstacles and increasing complexities. Test your problem-solving skills with engaging gameplay.

name: Block Twist Challenge
summary: Dive into a captivating puzzle game where your goal is to clear the grid by strategically placing blocks. Arrange the pieces on the board to form complete rows or columns, which will instantly clear, opening up more space for your next move.

name: BlockUrbs
summary: BlockUrbs is a small city builder game where you can place a variety of structures and roads on tiles to create tiny, detailed and beautiful city sections without worrying about any goals or scores.

name: Bloodline
summary: Revenge against the forces of good! That is the goal of the dark elf Belphora, who wants to avenge the death of her father. Explore the beautiful pixel art world, find items to improve yourself and fight various enemies in this Metroidvania-like game. Fight for glory and revenge!

name: Bloodlust
summary: Bloodlust is a dark gothic short narrative exploration game in which you play as Vandor, a vampire desperately trying to survive in the daytime. Your only goal is to quench your bloodlust by taking down the plagued townspeople to give yourself enough strength to reach the safety of your castle.

name: Blood & Lust
summary: Don’t fall prey to the eternal hunger of the night as the initiation rite is getting closer! Dive into a dark world of seduction and explore the vampire academy in Blood Lust [18+]🩸 - an adult visual novel telling the story of an ordinary guy in extraordinary circumstances.

name: Blood Rising
summary: This is a roguelike game with card battles as its core. Players need to play as a vampire ancestor to resist the attacks of a large number of adventurers and defeat three great heroes to achieve ultimate victory.

name: Blood X Thirsty
summary: Serve drinks, enhance your brew, and fight off unruly customers in this fast-paced bartending sim!

name: Blast Killer
summary: A retro and very cool fps game, blood-curdling fast-paced combat, high mobility displacement, adrenaline-pumping plasma effects, all in the most intuitive way to experience the aesthetics of violence!

name: Blood Accord
summary: A horror visual novel exploring the dark sides of friendship and the dangerous paths taken to save it.

name: Blue Rabbit, Black Future
summary: A thrilling 2D platformer, with cute and minimal pixel art style! Enjoy 24 challenging levels and a couple boss battles, all wrapped in a short but intense story with animated cinematics. A compact and intense experience that’s sure to keep you hooked!

name: Block Rush
summary: Block Rush is a fun and engaging puzzle game that challenges your strategic thinking. Place blocks on the board, clear full lines, and create powerful combos to maximize your score! With increasing difficulty levels, unique power-ups, and colorful visuals, the game keeps you entertained for hours.

name: Blightborn
summary:
In a dystopian future ravaged by an unstoppable blight, you play as a young scientist on the verge of discovering a cure. But just as you near a breakthrough, a series of deadly “accidents” begin to threaten your life.

Before uncovering the truth, you black out only to awaken in an underground facility. As you struggle to escape, you met... him.

name: Blanksword
summary: You’re a fallen Angel, your brain is missing and half of God’s country wants you dead (again!). Battle legions of weird monsters with your smiling sword. Find and customize a large number of skills. Rebuild your brain from scratch and rise against a tyrannical God in this turn-based roguelike RPG!

name: Blitzr Ball
summary: An arcade style game where you control a bumper to bounce the blitzr ball! Destroy all blocks to beat levels. Discover power ups and unlock perks to help you along the way!

name: Bloodbark
summary: Bloodbark is a short horror game based on the works of Eduardo Valdés-Hevia, a known horror artist. While specially inspired on his artwork "Bloodbark", many of his other works are also featured on this game.

name: Blazing Sails: Undead Pirate Pack
summary: Hope you believe in ghost stories scallywag! This DLC contains 3 unique styles of full-body skeleton skins in both male and female variations. The skeletons are all combinable with almost all existing cosmetic items! And that's not all. This DLC also contains unique ghastly voice lines so you can both look and sound like an undead spooky pirate!

name: Black Myth: Heaven
summary: Inspired By the well-known rogue-like game Hades, slash out of the God Field all the way down to the Demon Domain and defy The Overlord Thanatos in the Deep Frost Hell in this rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Blue: Store
summary: You come into a store that sells haunted and cursed things. You can go around the store and look at things without buying them, or maybe talk to the storekeeper.

name: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect x Dead Cells
summary:
New Playable Character (Prototype) – The Prisoner
Step into the boots of the iconic Prisoner from Dead Cells, wield 27 signature weapons, skills and mutations from the original game as well as 20+ combo variants that pay tribute to other Dead Cells’ iconic gears.
Exclusive Challenge Biome
Dive into a new roguevania-inspired challenge biome built for The Prisoner, where Dead Cells’ fast, fluid combat meets BBEE’s satisfying combos!

name: Blossoms of Eternity
summary: The story of three high school students who must overcome the boundaries of time and dimensions in a death spiral to save their world from higher beings who threaten their world.

name: Black Mirror: Thronglets
summary: Cross over into the world of "Black Mirror" and experience "Thronglets," the retro virtual pet simulation at the center of the Season 7 episode "Plaything." These pixel art critters won't just take over your phone; they could take over your life.

name: Blade vs. Undead
summary: This is a top-down survival shooter game where players must fight for survival on a battlefield filled with skeleton soldiers.

name: Blood Sword
summary: An ancient evil returns. A sword lost to legend. A party bound by fate. Forge your legacy in a story-rich RPG of turn-based combat and branching choices, inspired by the classic Blood Sword saga.

name: Black Hole Havoc
summary: Black holes are appearing all over the galaxy and wreaking havoc. Match the size of the black holes, aim your cannon and avoid the obstacles to eliminate the black holes and save humanity.

name: BloodRealm: War of Gods
summary: BloodRealm: War of Gods is a card-based strategy and role-play game. BloodRealm: War of Gods offers some intense turn-based combat against the computer and an ever-advancing story.

name: Blasto X
summary: In this new adventure, Blasto will have to explore various more or less familiar places and face tough opponents until confronting a nemesis believed to have been defeated for some time. Explore all the 13 levels and fight against the 5 bosses. Try your hand at an 80s-style scrolling beat'em up. Play matches like in the old days, Slap scum, AND ENKINDLE THIS!

name: Blood Bowl 2: Norse
summary:
The NORSE race comes with its own official players (Lineman, Berserker, Runner, Thrower, Ulfwerener, Yhetee) along with a couple of star players: Wilhelm Chaney and Icepelt Hammerblow!

Norsemen are homicidal maniacs who love battle and beer! This rolling roadblock may not be the fastest team on the pitch, but with most players benefiting from Block it’s certainly one of the toughest.

The Yhetee is the Norse’s very own walking mountain. It's a special kind of Troll from the northern lands, adapted to the cold, harsh environment in order to survive. Norse team coaches include Yhetees in their Blood Bowl teams thanks to their deadly combination of claws, fierceness, and natural talent for destruction.

name: Blood Bowl 2: Nurgle
summary:
The teams of Nurgle come with their Rotters, Pestigors, Nurgle Warriors and Beasts. They are joined by the Nurgle legendary star-player - Lord Borak the Despoiler.

Nurgle teams are a form of Chaos team, whose players worship the god Nurgle - the Chaos god of corruption and disease. He rewards his players by granting them a rather unpleasant disease known as “Nurgle’s Rot”. If anyone gets close enough to get a decent sniff, they’ll contract one of Nurgle’s nasty diseases and usually die before anyone can suggest a new personal hygiene regime.

As with most Chaos teams, the Nurgle team is at its best when it can get stuck in and directly take on opposing players. What it has in strength and toughness, the Nurgle team lacks in agility. Nurgle Warriors have a lousy Agility value and Move rate, and do not make good ball bearers. With such a terrible average Move rate, these worshippers of the Chaos god Nurgle could find themselves being beaten not just by the opposing side, but also the clock!

name: Blood Bowl 2: Chaos Dwarfs
summary:
Chaos Dwarfs are the twisted descendants of Dwarf explorers who have been terribly affected by the forces of Chaos, turning them into evil, self-centered creatures. In one way they haven’t changed at all, they still love playing Blood Bowl! They are joined by the legendary star-player Zzharg Madeye.

The Chaos Dwarfs are defence-oriented team, benefiting from the great velocity of their bull centaur retrievers and from a very powerful front line that can endure (and apply) a lot of pressure. Also, one of their strongest characteristics is that powerful players, like bull centaurs, unlock their powerful skills very quickly.

The main weakness of the Chaos Dwarfs stands in their poor ball-handling skills. Indeed, due to their tiny size and low agility, they have to rely on hobgoblins in order to push the game forward. Hobgoblins are quite agile, but are also very prone to getting crushed by any opponent.

name: Black ICE/White Noise
summary: Black ICE\White Noise is an unreleased action-adventure video game that was in development and planned to be published by Atari Corporation on a scheduled December 1995 release date exclusively for the Atari Jaguar CD. The player would have followed the story of a group of three characters in a fictional United States city in the year 2042, as they performed multiple missions and tasks such as assassination, computer hacking, exploration, street fighting and other assignments. Originally conceived internally in 1994 as a mascot platform game by Sam Tramiel to represent Atari Corp., it later evolved into a more mature title involving a cyberpunk setting. The games was cancelled alongside Thea Realm Fighters as part of Atari dropping support for the Jaguar. A leaked prototype build would eventually leak online and be preserved.

name: Blue Protocol: Star Resonance
summary: Blue Protocol: Star Resonance expands the Blue Protocol universe with a vibrant MMORPG experience. Create your own hero, team up for strategic raids, or simply relax and have fun with friends fishing, crafting, and endless exploration. Adventure awaits!

name: Blacksmith: Ignite the Forge
summary: Blacksmith: Ignite the Forge is a mix of a simulator, strategy, and auto-battler. Become a master smith, craft various weapons, and enhance them with magical runes. Equip a team of adventurers with your hand-made tools, send them on missions, gather loot to upgrade your forge, and save the land!

name: BlazeRush: Star Track
summary: The update featuresA campaign that includes 30 missions New type of vehicles — spaceships New types of weapons: laser, mines and chain lightning Special space-themed race track for multiplayer New powerful enemy — a massive spaceship

name: Blitz: Race Against Time
summary: A 32 map megawad created by the Russian Doom community, featuring maps of various themes and gameplay styles, all centered around a single concept: The exit permanently closes after 30 seconds.

name: Blast Rush LS
summary: Ever played a difficult shmup wishing for just one more bomb? Blast to your heart’s content in Blast Rush LS, a fresh explosive experience with infinite bombs, other powerful abilities, and extra challenges that demand more than just big booms. Escaping an exploding mothership isn't easy, after all!

name: Blue Hill Wendigo
summary: Arm yourself with weapons, traps, and supplies in this survival horror FPS. Battle ruthless bandits and a relentless wendigo as you uncover the truth and fight to survive in this open world horror game.

name: Blight Night
summary: The shadows whisper secrets you were never meant to hear. Step into Blight Night, a retro survival horror where the past won't stay buried. Relive the chilling VHS-era terror of the 1980s, where every sound makes you question if you're truly alone.

name: Blasfemia
