summary: Blasfemia is a first-person horror game. You are trapped in a seemingly normal apartment but realize early on that you're not alone. Explore a handcrafted, detail rich environment in a tense and terrifying atmosphere and try to find a way out before an ominous entity gets to you.

name: Blind Spot
summary: Blind Spot is a story-driven puzzle adventure game. Solve various puzzles all over the room to proceed, and explore every detail of surroundings to find what really happened.

name: Bleepfrog
summary: The crankiest clockwork frog in the city is on a rampage throughout the metropolis. Aid him in his quest to jump over buildings and flatten passing cars, powering him up in the process, but watch out: take too many hits and it's lights out!

name: Blungo's Dungeon Luncheon
summary: Blungo's Dungeon Luncheon is a bite-sized, fast-paced, action-packed dungeon crawler about killing for money and getting food.

name: Black Cat
summary: This game is based on the story of Edgar Allan Poe and was created to convey a unique atmosphere of horror and hopelessness. This is a terrible story about man, who standed on the path of cruelty and learned all the facets of madness.

name: Blob's Adventure
summary: Guide your bouncy hero, Blob, through a series of challenging levels! Navigate carefully to avoid dangerous spikes and other traps as you aim to reach the flag and complete each stage!

name: Bloodstone Rising
summary: Bloodstone Rising is a high-intensity co-op FPS roguelike where space dwarves battle waves of relentless zombie hordes to reclaim their ancestral kingdom. Mine resources, forge upgrades, and enhance your abilities between waves to survive the onslaught.

name: Block Plop
summary: Pick colors, plop down blocks, and conquer the board! Relax solo or challenge your friends in this delightful puzzle-strategy game. Coming in June. Wishlist to stay updated!

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 9
summary: Blood Bowl III season 9 introduces the Khorne faction, known for their aggressive playstyle and Frenzy skill specialization. The update brings the Eternal League single-player mode with enhanced AI and themed competitions, along with a new Redraft system that allows teams to reset and rebuild every 20 matches. Players can participate in the Bloodthirst Challenge event to test the Khorne faction and earn rewards, including legendary skins. The game combines tactical strategy with the violent spectacle of fantasy football, as teams compete in both single-player campaigns and online multiplayer matches.

name: Blocky Games
summary: The story of three girls' indie game studio.

name: Blood Mall
summary:
Dated November 4th, 1988.

Massacre at Dayton County Mall! Hundreds dead, over 350 injured.

Experts are still investigating what exactly happened, but it appears a... Dinosaur?... Materialised in the mall and went feral...

name: BloodBound Knights
summary: BloodBound Knights is a fast-paced roguelike shoot 'em up where you battle through procedurally generated levels, unleash powerful spells, and upgrade your gear. Choose your class, master unique abilities, level up, customize your playstyle, and become unstoppable.

name: Black Zen White
summary: Black Zen White is a puzzle platformer where the world flips every 10 seconds between two versions: black and white. Think, time your moves, bend time, and interact with strange creatures in this contemplative, hand-drawn journey inspired by East Asian ink paintings.

name: Blacksmith Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own blacksmith shop in this immersive simulation game! Craft and sell swords, shields, armor, and more to satisfy your customers, earn profits, and expand your business. Manage your forge with a dynamic day-night cycle and become a legendary blacksmith!

name: Blade Blitz
summary: Blade Blitz is a casual, yet competitive, local multiplayer game to play with your friends. Simply spin, slice, and poke your way through the opponents in a tug-of-war push to score the points for your team. Power ups provide tense matches, evening the odds as each team closes in on victory.

name: Blow-Up: Avenge Humanity
summary: BLOW-UP: AVENGE HUMANITY is a single-player fast paced first person shooter campaign where you take control of an industrial robot rewired by the last human being to violently dispatch the alien race accountable for Earth’s destruction. Are you ready to become the ultimate avenger?

name: Black Rain
summary: black rain is a free fangame of the surrealist 2004 RPG Maker game Yume Nikki. It is a collaborative project led by Murasaki no Yume, and anyone can contribute to it at any time.

name: Blue Bell
summary: Story Driven Stealth/Horror

name: Blitzstrike
summary: Blitzstrike is a fast-paced 2D action-platformer where a pink-haired bounty hunter blazes through waves of robotic enemies with style and fury.

name: Black Hole Fishing
summary: Black hole fishing is a completely normal incremental game about fishing. Don't expect to stock the pond with genetically modified fish, discover an infinite cavern full of ponds to consume, or destroy the entire planet by feeding infinite fish to a singularity. Honestly, it's just a fishing game.

name: Blade of One
summary: Blade of One is a methodical 2D swordfighting game with simple controls. Strike down foes in a single hit, before they do the same to you.

name: Blu-dude in the Quest of Reality in Time
summary: In Blu-Dude in the Quest of Reality in Time, you're not just playing—you’re joining Blu-Dude on a profound search for truth. What starts as a lighthearted adventure transforms into an exploration into his reality. What is your purpose?

name: Blokoto
summary: Blokoto is a sandbox and online platform where players can build their own worlds, assets, games and avatars in an easy and fun way!

name: Blankspace
summary: Blankspace is a tactical roguelike where emojis are your tools of strategy. Combine them to generate science, culture, magic, and money. Maximize points with clever synergies. Each run brings new challenges, testing your strategic thinking in a game where no two runs are the same.

name: Blobtown
summary:
In Blobtown, it’s super easy to create your own avatar! Want to recreate your favorite character? Come up with an OC? Or maybe spend a day as a chair—or a bowl of soup? Your imagination is the only limit!

Blobtown’s super simple yet powerful creation tools, combined with the VR camera, let you build anything and record the fun to share with the world. There are already tons of Blobtown creators with their own studios and characters. It’s super easy to get started!

name: Blind Touch
summary: Blind Simulator, offering a new perspective and immersive sensory experience. Step into a world of darkness using your guide cane.

name: Bleb
summary: Bleb is a platformer in which you will have to think, jump and die! You'll encounter a variety of levels, ranging from simple platforms to epic boss battles. Immerse yourself in a black and white adventure that will break your brain.

name: Blitzkrieg Express
summary: Survive and defend your land against the armored train in this arcade achievement-attack puzzle. Think smart, find the right sequence to create combos by destroying wagons with different bonuses to speed up and boost your cannon, and stop the train before it stops you.

name: Block Basher 3D
summary: A clean, modern 3D twist on the classic brick-breaker. Smash through block patterns, switch camera angles, and use power-ups in this stripped-down arcade experience. Buy now and get the future expanded sequel for free.

name: Blades of Jianghu: Ballad of Wind and Dust
summary: "Blades of Jianghu: Ballad of Wind and Dust" is a single-player game that combines text adventure with turn-based combat and exploration. As someone aspiring to become a great hero, your journey through the martial arts world will not always be a solo endeavor.

name: BlackVein
summary: A Retro Survival-Horror Mining Game, mine for resources, survive horrors and descend deeper in to BlackVein mine.

name: Block King Demands Red Squares
summary: Automate a network of towns producing the required shapes for the ever fickle Block King while keeping the citizens happy. Remember, if you fail, you will get fired.

name: Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement
summary: Unravel the dark history of the Bloodstained universe and explore a hauntingly immersive 16th-century England steeped in a 2.5D gothic atmosphere, enthralling players in strategic battles, crafting, and exploration across a sprawling, cursed land.

name: Black Dungeon: Draw A Card
summary: Once a lowly servant of the Arcane Illustration Society, you triggered a portal while reading the forbidden Codex Obscura and were cast into the Devourer Dungeon. Branded by its core, you gained scrollbinding powers. Explore, collect lost cards, and seal the Demon Devourer: Taotie.

name: Bloom Paradise
summary: A fixed-screen action game offering a 2-player coop mode.

name: Blossom Breeze
summary: Blossom Breeze, take a breath and calmly clear some petals.

name: Blessed
summary: Blessed is a fast‑paced, 2D top‑down co-op arena shooter where you and your friends team up as "blessed" heroes to battle endless waves across elemental realms, and more in intense action.

name: Blade & Soul Heroes
summary: This thrilling free-to-play Collectible Action MMORPG offers the duality of turn-based strategy & real-time action. Experience exciting cross-platform play and embark on an epic quest where numerous stories are waiting to be discovered alongside your five member team. Unite your heroes!

name: Blighted
summary: Battle your way through a psychedelic western nightmare to reclaim the memories of your people in this action RPG from the creators of Guacamelee! Harness the power of the deadly, reality-altering Blight and unravel the mysteries of a twisted world.

name: Blightened
summary: Blightened is a 2.5D action platformer where corruption fuels your strength. Unleash powerful abilities, survive collapsing realms, and fight your way through a broken world shaped by blight.

name: Block Block Block
summary: Design your dream space! In this tiny cozy building game, stack and arrange uniquely shaped wooden blocks to craft charming dioramas. Design cozy bakeries, elegant living rooms or quirkiy studios, create beautiful spaces filled with warm and personality.

name: Blood Storm: Alien Purge
summary: In this intense first-person rail shooter, you play as Aiden Cross, an agent of the Federal Bureau of Anomalies (FBA). Sent to investigate alien sightings at a remote desert facility in Nevada, what began as a routine mission quickly spirals into a deadly battle against unknown creatures...

name: BlackDog
summary: A dark themed pixel-art game of exploration, where you will have to find clues and solve puzzles to move forward in the story.

name: Blades for Hire
summary: Blades for Hire is a captivating strategy game where you lead a mercenary guild. Dive into the story of a man fighting for survival, facing daily choices between morality and pragmatism. Guide your guild to prosperity—or ruin—as you navigate the harsh realities of a mercenary’s life.

name: Bloop
summary: Bloop is a 6-10 player underwater spy game set in a seaweed-drenched town. Each round, play as an innocent fish, a traitor, or a neutral party . Wag your tail to win—or sink!

name: Blockremental
summary: Blockremental is an incremental game mixing management, exploration, and strategy. Control a drilling platform, dig through a mysterious island, face powerful golems, and challenge a legendary dragon in a calm and captivating adventure.

name: Blademancer
summary: Blademancer is a brutal and bloody JRPG where every choice shapes the fate of the realm. Explore a vast world, descend into treacherous dungeons, and endure relentless battles. Will you become the savior the world needs, or the scourge that brings its downfall?

name: Blackjack
summary: Blackjack pulls you into the thrill of the gamble—every card flip is a rush, every decision a test of nerve. Feel the tension rise as you chase 21, balancing risk and reward in a game where one move can mean triumph or defeat.

name: Blippo+
summary: Blippo+ is a live-action, off-cable TV simulator. Channel-surf the stars and discover the staticky, radical world of Planet Blip through its soaps, sitcoms, news, weather, and talk shows. But don't touch that remote—everything's about to get bent.

name: Blaster Boy
summary: Blaster Boy 2d shooter boss gauntlet. Players will Blast their way through a variety of bosses while completing challenges to unlock new playable characters, more game modes and other in-game content.

name: Blood Country
summary: Blood Country is a roguelike shooter set in the Wild West. Kill outlaws with your guns, knife, and dynamite. Defeat the gang's leader, and free the country from outlaws, bandits, and scoundrels.

name: Blackroot: Medieval Survival
summary: Survive in a dark medieval world plagued by the undead. Gather resources, build shelter, and face the horrors of Blackroot.

name: Blocky's Short Quest
summary: Play as Blocky with super high jumping height in this 2D adventure platformer. Discover new worlds where Blocky's abilities change.

name: Bloodface
summary: Unable to endure the ruthless tyranny of the Lord, the people rise in rebellion, plunging the entire country into civil war. As the Lord and his family abandon the throne and flee, a bloody battle erupts across the lands.

name: Block it
summary:
Don’t let the puck escape! Close the cage by tapping the screen at the right moment when the puck is about to get out. Challenge your friends around you and through Game Center.

What is your best score?

name: Bloxiti
summary: Bloxiti is a photorealistic builder where you snap and stack blocks to craft cozy cabins, massive megastructures, or peaceful dioramas.

name: Blitzpoint
summary: A minimalist modern military strategy tower defense game where you build and defend a forward operating base. Strategically place defenses, manage resources, and repel relentless waves of enemies. Build by day, defend by night, and command your forces in fast-paced, action-packed gameplay.

name: Blue Mansion
summary: We integrate decryption into Roguelike cards to create a single player card adventure full of deadly suspense. Everytime you step into the mansion, you will face deadly opponents, randomly triggered mechanical rampage events, and various mysterious relics hidden behind the frame.

name: Black Souls
summary: Black Souls is the censored release of a dark fantasy, souls-like RPG game inspired by Dark Souls and various fairy tales, where you are an unnamed undead who has awakened imprisoned within the Lost Empire. Freed by the brave Holy Knight Jeanne D'Arc, your freedom is short-lived as a fearsome dragon claims both your lives. Now you have one goal - to infiltrate the Lost Empire and defeat Cinderella, who spreads the fog that drains souls and drives everyone to insanity, but to get there, you will need to defeat or enter into a covenant with the Demonic Princesses.

name: Black Beacon: Forsaken Eternity
summary:
Version 1.1 - Forsaken Eternity has been released, which includes:
• New main story quest: Chapter 7
• New characters: Ji Xia, Yuli
• New weapons: Zenith Abyss, Graceful Cloudplay
• Special events in progress
• ...and more!

name: Black Paradox Reloaded
summary: Experience chaos in this remastered, hyper-stylized roguelite. As bounty hunter Black Paradox, travel through space to defeat the Hellraisers – now with enhanced pixel art, rebalanced gameplay, new synthwave tracks, and an intense boss rush mode.

name: Block Party DX!
summary: Welcome to block party puzzle game, offering a relaxing yet challenging experience for all ages.

name: Bleu Bayou
summary: A lonesome crawdad sets out to destroy the bayou’s vicious syndicate of loan sharks and robber barons—and erase his debts once and for all.

name: Blade and Madness
summary: Blade and Madness, a roguelite deckbuilder where turns play out simultaneously and every choice matters. As madness creeps in, your cards change, the battlefield twists, and enemies grow more unpredictable. Adaptation isn’t optional, it’s the only way to survive… or give in to the dark.

name: Blood Soaked Bastard!
summary: Blood Soaked Bastard! Is an RPG set in a dreary medieval fantasy setting. Become a much abhorred Blood Knight and kill monsters in turn based combat, alongside a cast of freakish companions. Draw the blood of wretched monsters, you Bastard!

name: Blood Oath
summary: BloodOath is a Souls-like game in a world ruled by enslaving gods. You play as a martial arts master, trained since childhood, who vows to save humanity. Battle god-forged monsters across your journey. Master skills, wield diverse weapons, and destroy all foes. Achieve deicide to liberate the world.

name: Blightspire
summary: Blightspire is a fast-paced, wave-based survival shooter. Battle through a cursed graveyard as undead abominations rise in endless waves. With only your reflexes and firepower, survive the darkness in a world where death is never the end.

name: Bloodrise
summary: Face nightmarish demons and zombies in a randomly generated, blood-soaked asylum. As a roguelike shooter, you'll fight through relentless hordes, using firearms to find the key to the next floor. Explore the terrifying environment for money, and earn more by defeating enemies.

name: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect - Hazama Character Pack
summary:
BlazBlue Entropy Effect Hazama Character Pack includes following content:
- New Prototype: Hazama
- A set of Prototype Palettes applicable to Hazama, Hakumen, Ragna and Λ-No.11-.
- A brand-new exclusive Avatar.

name: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect - Rachel Character Pack
summary:
BlazBlue Entropy Effect Rachel Character Pack includes the following content:
- New Prototype: Rachel.
- A set of Prototype Palettes applicable to all characters (including future IP characters).
- A new exclusive Avatar trail effect.

name: BlazBlue Entropy Effect: Bullet Character Pack
summary:
BlazBlue Entropy Effect Bullet Character Pack includes following content:
- New Prototype: Bullet
- A set of Prototype Palettes applicable to Mai, Bullet, Es, and Taokaka.
- A brand-new exclusive Avatar.

name: Blue Area
summary: Blue Area is an engaging RPG set in a city that has endured an apocalypse, governed by an AI known as Tai Yi. Players assume the role of a procurator tasked with unraveling the mystery behind Tai Yi's betrayal of humanity. The game features a fully voice-acted narrative, enhanced by professional artists and a compelling script that immerses players in a story of rebellion against a self-created deity.

name: Bleak Haven
summary: Bleak Haven is a cinematic survival horror where faith is twisted, every shot matters, and survival hangs on what you can build. Explore haunted ruins, abandoned villages, and face a cult preparing the world for a god no one should ever witness.

name: Blood Message
summary:
Blood Message is a narrative-driven, linear action-adventure single-player game developed by NetEase ThunderFire's 24 Entertainment 临安（Lin'an）Studio, coming to PC and console platforms. The game is based on the true historical event of "Dunhuang's Uprising".

Set in the late Tang Dynasty in 848 AD, players take on the role of Dunhuang, a messager who embarks on a perilous eastward journey to deliver a message that holds the fate of his homeland.

Alongside his son, they must survive relentless enemy sieges and a treacherous three-thousand-li odyssey, fighting against impossible odds to return to the heart of the Tang: Chang'an. Amidst the desert sands, they etch the final tale of loyalty in the Great Tang.

The world has heard too many stories of emperors and generals—Blood Message is an ode to the unsung heroes.

Powered by Unreal 5 Engine.

name: Blast Processed
summary: Blast Processed is a first-person platformer built around an infamous movement quirk of early FPS games: Rocket Jumping.

name: Blue Delta
summary: Blue Delta is a visual novel about adventures in a strange world.

name: BloodLoop
summary: BloodLoop is a third-person multiplayer Hero-Shooter set in a dark, dystopian future where humanity lives across interstellar colonies following Earth's catastrophic destruction.

name: Block By Block: The Amulet
summary: Block By Block is an minecraft-animated series adaption of Telltale's Minecraft Story Mode video game. It'll be taking the narrative of the point-and-click adventure game, and putting it into a new medium in the form of an action-adventure, fantasy animation series! Characters, plotlines, and worlds will be reimagined into a new story that's aiming to be fresh, unique, and different to the original game in order to create a new experience for lifelong fans and newcomers alike to enjoy.

name: Block 17
summary: Block 17 is a sci-fi action game in pixel art style with many different and unique enemies, and an oppressive atmosphere of a terrible prison for especially dangerous criminals. What happened here? How do you get out? Try to answer these questions yourself.

name: Blind Simulator
summary: “Blind Simulator” is a unique VR simulation game where you explore the world without sight, using only a white cane. By experiencing the daily life of a visually impaired person, the game invites you to discover a new way of seeing through sound, vibration, and spatial awareness.

name: Bloodpunished: No Time Por Patience
summary: BLOODPUNISHED is a horror platformer where you try to escape a mysterious place with very little room for error. Presented through hand-drawn sketches in his diary, you'll step into the shoes of this victim as he documents his descent into madness.

name: Bling: Fortune Memories
summary: Explore a temple filled with traps and secrets in Bling: Fortune Memories. Use your wits, collect gems, and activate your invisibility ability to overcome challenges while searching for your missing brother. With tactical grid-based movement and a minimalist style, will you achieve fortune?

name: Bleap
summary: Bleap is a fast-paced 3D mobile runner rhythm game that combines the thrill of the chase with some sick tunes! Tap, hold, slide, flick, avoid cars, and ride on rails to the beat today for free with Bleap!

name: Black Beacon: Whispers of the Stars
summary:
Version 1.2 - Whispers of the Stars has been released, which includes:
• New extra story: Eons Reverberations
• New characters: Phaenomena, Ariadne
• New weapons: Stellar Wedge, Shadows of Reverie
• Special events in progress
• ...and more!

name: BloomKeeper
summary: Spread nature and breathe life back into a world of ash by guiding the Pouics, naive and curious little creatures. They dream of reawakening the world, but they can’t do it alone. Guide them, calm them, protect them and help them restore life to a forgotten land.

name: Block Beast
summary: Build the strongest Beast and claim your title as "King Of The Jungle!" With thousands of possible combinations, which Beast will reign supreme in this fast paced Auto-Battler

name: Black OX
summary: Black OX is a roguelike deckbuilder where Blackjack meets Tic-Tac-Toe in a wild, tactical clash of cunning combos. Stack cards, twist values, and unleash powerful Oxchips to outsmart your opponent—and flip the game on its head. This isn’t just Blackjack. This is Black OX.

name: Blueberry Weather
summary: A melancholic, dialogue-driven game with themes of depression, dreams and loss. You visit your childhood friend, that has been in a coma for a long time, battling a rare illness.

name: Blobun Mini
summary: You are a blob bunny. Your goal? Touch every tile! Enjoy 60 bite sized puzzles across 5 different worlds in this casual puzzle game.

name: Blood Vow: Survive the Night
summary: Defend the people of Sodermark from the hordes of darkness. Fight as an army of one, or online with up to four-player PvE multiplayer in this wave-based, action-survival game.

name: Blizz!
summary: 90s Teen-Magazine Typing adventure

name: Black Goat
summary: The game is a BL Cthulhu-style narrative romance game. It tells the story of the protagonist struggling to survive on a cruise ship filled with strange events after losing their memory. The game's setting is modern with a Cthulhu-inspired narrative.

name: Blanket Fort
summary: BLANKET FORT is a single player, first-person horror exploration game. Navigate a cozy maze of blankets and pillows which grow increasingly claustrophobic as you help plushies with their troubles but be careful - keep your favorite teddy close or he might get jealous. Don’t get lost… or found.

name: Blood Line: A Rebel Moon Game
summary:
Take on intense combat missions in this online multiplayer action game. Build a rebellion against the Motherworld and fight for your planet's freedom.
This sci-fi adventure set in the Rebel Moon universe combines the action of a twin-stick shooter with the epic world and deep customization of a role-playing game. Choose from four unique rebel classes—each with their own strengths—and team up to take down the Imperium, one mission at a time.

name: Blop, Your Virtual Buddy
summary: Blop is always alive, even when you don’t have the game open. He needs your attention to stay happy, healthy, and full of life.

name: Blackjack by MobilityWare
summary:
Win BIG at your next casino trip by playing this Blackjack app, with the best casino-style experience. Learn to master the most popular card game found in casinos all over the world, from the best Blackjack developer in the App Store.

Real Blackjack Strategy: There’s more to this Blackjack app than just Hit or Stand. Just like a real casino, you have the option to split, double down, and even take insurance!

Card Counting Feature: Our Blackjack game has Hi-Lo and KO card counting strategies. Both strategies are perfect for beginners interested in learning card counting!

Multiple Table Option: Think you’re ready to play with the High Rollers? Try your hand in the high stakes tables! Start with Beginner’s Luck and work your way up to The Penthouse! Compete with players around the world by working your way to the top of the Leaderboards.

name: Blindfold
summary: A first-person horror game that uses a webcam to recognize your face. The goal is to escape from the monsters by using a system that closes your eyelids in the game when you close your eyes in real life.

name: BlockBlasters
summary:
This game has been flagged as containing malware, and has since been delisted.

Blast your way through waves of crab monsters in this action-packed 2D platformer! Armed with a powerful blaster, fight, dodge, and survive as you take down creepy crawlers and face off against relentless enemies in BlockBlasters!

name: Black Vultures: Prey of Greed
summary: Black Vultures is a tactical first-person shooter set in a fractured warzone where trust is scarce, resources are limited, and every mission begins with a choice. Navigate ruined infrastructure and contested zones. Intercept transmissions, track movements, and recover intel to locate your objective before rival squads close in. Engage only when necessary. Retreat when survival demands it. The deeper you push, the higher the risk, but greater the reward.

name: Bleeping Spaceships MR
summary: A mixed reality bullet-hell arcade game where your living room transforms into an explosive battlefield. Pilot your starfighter from your hand using VR motion controls. Blast enemies, dodge split-second barrages, and master dozens of handcrafted levels and challenges.

name: BloxAR
summary: Challenge your spatial awareness as you strategically rotate and position falling blocks to complete intricate three-dimensional puzzles. Add an exciting twist to the classic block puzzle genre by exploring the possibilities that AR technology brings.

name: Blind Trust: The City
summary: Blind Trust: The City is a co-op game for 2 to 5 players, where only one player can see while the others are completely “blind.” The seeing player must guide their teammates verbally through traps and obstacles. Each round demands precise communication and high trust, as any mistake restarts the team. The game is fun, intense, and relies more on teamwork and communication than visual skill.

name: Block Master 3D Puzzle
summary: Test your mental skills with Block Master 3D Puzzle! Master this classic block puzzle game with realistic 3D graphics, strategic game modes and addictive gameplay. Race for the record without wasting time!

name: Bloom for Me
summary: 'Bloom for me' is about two young girls and their struggles to cope with the world around them.

name: Blade of Wiz
summary: A female knight returns to her cursed kingdom after years of battle. On her journey, she meets a magical black cat, and their fates become entwined. Together, they venture into a mysterious, perilous realm of magic, facing unknown enemies and uncovering the truth of an ancient mystery.

name: Blazing Dragon Slayer · Divine Weapon Awakening
summary: "Blazing Dragon Slayer · Divine Weapon Awakening" is a casual game. The game features a rich weapon and equipment enhancement system, allowing players to efficiently boost their combat power. Players can enjoy a comfortable gaming experience simply by using the mouse to choose upgrade directions.

name: Blyte
summary: A wacky and hilarious walking simulator that throws you into a surreal universe alongside EVA (who cares about her name, anyway?), filled with improbable misadventures and traps worthy of a master troll. A breath of mocking fresh air in an industry that's far too tame!

name: Blackjack Simulator 2025
summary: Blackjack Simulator 2025 puts you in position to build your bankroll and experience what it's like to be a competitive blackjack player. Will you succeed or lose all of your money trying?

name: Blackrock
summary: Command the BCF against sentient Blackrocks in this tactical top-down shooter base defense. Deploy Bravelings, fight Glimmergrubs, and destroy the Blackrock before it overwhelms everything.

name: Blue Book
summary: Blue Book is a visual novel that blends science fiction and detective genres. Investigate mysterious disappearances in a small provincial town as an FBI agent. Interrogate residents, analyze their words, and uncover the secret: are the kidnappings caused by people… or something else?

name: Blackout Football Manager
summary: Blackout Football Manager is a football-club management sim where you build a squad, devise training plans and tactics, upgrade facilities, handle high-level finances, and join local and international federations (guilds). A card-based management system lets you boost players on the field, heal injuries, and train harder, while players’ distinct mental and physical attributes shape match strategy. Scout opponents, trade on an in-game market, and unlock tech trees to expand infrastructure, refine training regimes, and customize formations on the path to league success.

name: Black Tower Enigma
summary: Puzzle-Solving Game Boy Adventure about an Orc inside a Mysterious Tower looking for his Wife

name: Blood Lily: Killers Can't Sink a Yuri Ship
summary: A B-horror mystery comedy adventure game. Having a crush on your bestie is hard enough without serial killers in the way! Lily's vacay plan to romance her crush Sally goes wrong when killers keep cropping up and ruining the mood. And that means war. "How dare you come between Sally and me!"

name: Blocate
summary: blocate is a 2d puzzle platformer about moving blocks around and solving puzzles.

name: Block Pile
summary: This game is a fun and easy casual puzzle game. Stack colorful blocks, throw your ball, and smash same-color blocks to score big! Simple controls, happy colors, and exciting combos.

name: Blast Radius
summary: Your goal: clear all fruits, avoid capture, and escape each level alive.

name: Black Pieces Move First
summary: Chess, but with a unique twist: you freely control a rebellious black pawn, determined to change the rules of the game. Dozens of chess sokoban puzzles with a touch of action and a tale of revenge.

name: Bloom Boom Casino
summary: Unpack your gardening gear and grow the biggest online-casino slot machine bonuses of all time! Discover Bloom Boom Casino now, the brand new 888 online casino from the developers of Slotpark and GameTwist. Bloom Boom Casino offers famous Novomatic online-casino slots such as Sizzling Hot, Book of Ra Deluxe, and a variety of wonderful 3D Gardens with unique slot themes, such as Boom Beach.

name: Bloodseed: The Last Helsing
summary: Bloodseed is a game that combines two very distinct but terribly addictive genres; card combat and survival.

name: Black Souls II
summary:
BLACK SOULS II is the censored release of the Dark Fairy Tale Fantasy x Psychological Horror RPG focusing on the themes of "Exploration of a Mad World" and "Life or Death Combat against Demonbeasts".

Despair. Fear, Madness, once again. An original work based on "Alice in Wonderland" and "Through the Looking-Glass."

name: Blocks
summary: Drag and drop figures from blocks. Fill empty cells on the field. Completed rows of blocks are removed. Get points for removed blocks.

name: Blade of Chaos
summary:
The amazing vertical idle MMORPG with 3× fun! Faster, stronger and better!
One-handed operation, smooth movements, intelligent feedback, and casual gameplay make it easy and enjoyable for you.

name: Blank_01
summary: blank_01 is a short, narrative-driven experience about routine, isolation, and quiet horror. You live in an ordinary house. You work a simple job. Every day is the same. Until something shifts.

name: Bloodbreaker: Labyrinth of the Witch
summary: Prepare to descend into the Labyrinth. Bloodbreaker: Labyrinth of the Witch combines the best elements of the roguelite and Metroidvania genres into an unforgiving, yet rewarding experience.

name: Blox
summary: Destroy the field of colored blocks, but be quick because they keep coming.

name: Blood of the Tyrant
summary: Experience the weight of gladiatorial combat in this techno-Roman survivor where every weapon swing matters. Clone warrior seeks freedom through arena bloodshed in a cycle of power and corruption.

name: Block Droppin
summary: Block Droppin’ is a fast-paced puzzle game to train your brain and test your reflexes: swap blocks to match three or more blocks of the same type, and use special blocks like bombs to your advantage. Block Droppin’ takes quick wits and concentration, so make sure your block-swapping skills are up to the task!

name: Bleaklight Falls
summary: Bleaklight Falls is a 2D top-down Action RPG Tower Defense game. Play as Meelu, a boy living in the secluded forest village of Bleaklight Falls. More than a century ago, the Dreadblight consumed the world. Only the Bleaklight, a mysterious everlasting flame, protects Meelu and his friends from the encroaching darkness. But when the Bleaklight's protection wanes, the Dreadblight monsters invade at nightfall. Meelu and the other villagers must defend their home - the last bastion of humanity - or their light will be snuffed out for good.

name: Blackthorn Witch
summary: A psychological horror story set in the town of Blackthorn; a place that lives in constant fear of a witch. The two main suspects? Levis mom and sister! His only lifelines to the outside world. Can they live a peaceful life? Or will they be dragged down by the dying town?

name: Block Droppin Blitz
summary:
Slide blocks to make shapes. Drop shapes to score points. But be careful about where those shapes end up!

Block Droppin’ is the latest fast-paced puzzle game to train your brain and test your reflexes. Combining elements of sliding tiles, falling blocks, and old school puzzle games, Block Droppin’ takes quick wits and concentration, so make sure your sliding skills are up to the task!

name: Blockade
summary: This is a fun game with little men, a wall and many trees. So-there are some men, the mark for yourself the player is constantly on his heels. Behind the wall - here the game begins, there is some protection. However, only hiding is not true-because in no time mull the player also run from tree to tree and Mark them as his property. How? Simply place under the tree and press the trigger button on the drill. The crown of the tree disappears. A total of 10 trees are to be created within one level before it goes to the next and more difficult level. And there are a total of ten - as well as a total of 4 players per game.

name: Blue Powder Grey Smoke
summary: Blue Powder Grey Smoke is a game in which the operational and tactical encounters of the American Civil War are covered.

name: Blindernoth
summary: Jack Cunningham is a partially blind private investigator. Help him escape from rooms reaching the light, rescue little kittens or recover valuable objects. An innovative game where your good memory, skill and patience will be key to completing the rooms. Platforms 2D game. Test your patience.

name: Blastermancer
summary: Blastermancer is a crunchy, lo-fi platform shooter where you control a robot whose sole purpose is to obliterate space demons. Beginning as a mix of 80s arcade and rogue-like, the game transforms into a cacophonous ballet of lasers and pixel dust.

name: Blade and Dragon VR
summary: Blade & Dragon VR is a thrilling action RPG game that blends sword fighting with powerful magic. Face off against ancient beasts like Dragons and Krakens. Gather gold from defeated enemies and upgrade weapons, unlock new spells, and enhance your stats.

name: Blackjack Saloon
summary: Saddle up for classic 21 in BlackJack Saloon! Play against the dealer in a stylish Wild West setting with smooth gameplay, crisp visuals, and authentic saloon vibes. Bet smart, hit or stand, and walk away a legend—or busted.

name: Blaster Bunny Chronicles
summary: In this adventure, Your siblings are being controlled and calling themselves "The revengers of Millonaire Bunny" approaching with the mission of steal the Blaster Power from Gunner Bunny and the new protagonist Imitator Bunny.

name: Bling Bling Bankruptcy
summary: A gambling game where you gamble to try and pay off your debts.

name: Black Hole Visitor Center
summary: Collect visitors, avoid asteroids, make money!

name: Blade of Jinshu
summary: Betrayed and left to die, you rise as a cybernetic-enhanced warrior on a relentless path of revenge. Slash through corporate enforcers, master high-speed combat, and survive deadly challenges in a fractured world where every move counts. Upgrade your abilities and carve your way to vengeance!

name: Blindsided Labs
summary: Recruit Swordsmen, Archers, and Templars, then watch your pixel squad auto-battle across the screen. Crush the enemy base before its ever-tougher waves crush you in an endlessly escalating tug-of-war!

name: Blighted Deep
summary: Blighted Deep is a minimalistic, linear roguelite in a dark, mysterious setting. Encounter various strange figures and evil creatures on your quest to cleanse the deep. Equip shackles, items and heirlooms to make your character more powerful.

name: Bloom 'N' Buzz
summary: Serve your hive in this relaxing tycoon-style game. Fill the role of a dedicated worker bee, pollinate flowers! Build up your hive! Produce honey.

name: Blackwood: Beneath the Silence
summary: Search for a missing student in the long-abandoned Blackwood school. A narrative, exploration-driven psychological horror with environmental puzzles and choices that lead to multiple endings.

name: Black Shadow
summary: Black Shadow is a first-person survival horror game built with UE5. Players take on the role of investigator Eric Stone, who ventures into a dark-matter zone. You must explore warped timelines, sneak through the shadows, and evade unknown threats while gradually uncovering hidden secrets.

name: Blue Hawaii Aniki's Soft Ore Demand Debut
summary: The Blue Hawaii Aniki's legend begins. The debut of the late-night variety show-style novel game is here! Experience the puzzling and hilarious developments of the cast and their eccentric characters. The next installment is scheduled for release in November 2025!

name: Blooming Suspicion
summary: Investigate, solve mysteries, and maybe even fall in love in Blooming Suspicion — a witchy visual novel set in modern Seoul with a magical twist.

name: Blendkins
summary: Explore the jungle in search of Blendkins, masters of camouflage! Everyone wants these adorable pets, but beware: keeping them may bring unexpected consequences. Discover their secrets in this unique adventure!

name: Blood Bear
summary: Blood Bear is a single player survival horror game. You must get to the bottom of what occurred the night before. Navigate the map, interact, and avoid the park’s residents. Use and upgrade items from around the park in your search for answers.

name: Blacktop Hustle
summary: Blacktop Hustle is a sim-cade street racer where you pick your car, hit the events and race to the finish line. Customise your car, take on the competition, and make it yours.

name: Bloodright
summary: 2.5D Survival Horror, painted in four colors. Gather resources, craft what you need, and defend yourself against every shadow in a haunting minimalist world.

name: Blackwood's Dilemma
summary: Step into detective Brian Storm’s shoes and unravel a grim 17th-century mystery. Interrogate villagers, gather clues, and piece together the evidence in a deduction system where every secret matters.

name: Blanky
summary: Blanky tells the story of a young boy named Jacob, who is thrown into a nightmarish world, filled with his biggest fears. With the help of his Blanket, nicknamed "Blanky" Jacob unlocks new abilities in search of the courage needed to defeat the evils within his own mind.

name: Block+Hole
summary: Welcome to the world of classic puzzles! Slide the blocks and use ice, conveyor belts and walls to reach BLOCK+HOLE. Fill in all the BLOCK+HOLE and you win the game. Fall into the charm of classic puzzle games with simple rules and in-depth gameplay.

name: Bloodmatch
summary: The arena beckons. Sharpen your steel. Slash, stab, and spear your way through the ranks of Rome’s toughest warriors, taking yourself from a lowly pit slave to the land's most glorified gladiator. Your audience awaits…

name: Bloodquest From Hell
summary: Bloodquest From Hell is a first person exploration game made in Unreal Engine. You play as a humble fry cook, who must journey through a mysterious portal in order to keep your job.

name: Bloodless Heart
summary: Squeeze the heart, gain elements and eventually synthesize your own blood. In this incremental game, every organ (not only your heart) matters. Use their synergies to achieve your ultimate bloody goal.

name: Blight's Grasp
summary: Explore a foreign planet on a journey to find your lost sister and a cure for this corrupted world. Fight through waves of enemies using a combination of this world's elements. Will you be able to piece together a solution or will it already be too late?

name: Black Friday
summary: This is a new attempt to integrate store opening and promotion with dungeon exploration (war chess) gameplay. Everyone is welcome to experience it.

name: Blue Notebook
summary:
What if a mysterious notebook could write your life’s story before it even happens?
In Blue Notebook, a gripping story-driven visual novel, you step into the shoes of Leo, a 17-year-old boy struggling with loneliness, new beginnings, and a strange diary that seems to know his every move—even predicting his final day.

After moving to a quiet town with hopes of starting fresh, Leo discovers an unsettling blue notebook hidden beneath his bed. Its pages are filled with personal memories, private feelings, and even future events no one could possibly know—not even his only friend, Rita. As Leo searches for answers, reality blurs, friendships are tested, and an ominous countdown begins.

Your choices will shape Leo’s fragile journey. Will you uncover the truth behind the notebook? Can you change the course of fate, or will you simply follow the story already written for you?

name: Blue Shutter
summary: Uncover the secrets of the night in a 2.5D pixel art adventure. Explore, unveil mysteries and fight.

name: Blest
summary: In BLEST, you are responsible for defending the sacred statue. You must use all your wits and the goddess's divine power to eliminate all the monsters that enter through the cathedral's main gate. May the goddess be with you!

name: Bloody Boobs
summary: Dare to enter a chilling labyrinth where you, a captivating young woman, are destined for a gruesome sacrifice! In this intense stealth horror game, you must use your wits and cunning to outsmart your captors and escape the clutches of an ancient evil.

name: Black Cat Bundle
summary: Black Cat Bundle is a 2D arcade platformer that consists of two games: Black Cat Blitz and Black Cat Brawl. Avoid obstacles and reach a high score either alone or with a buddy in Black Cat Blitz. Either that or grab seven of your friends and duke it out in the team-based showdown Black Cat Brawl!

name: Blenzzle
summary: A relaxing puzzle game about blending shapes and separate colors.

name: Blackjack 21: Blackjackist
summary: Blackjack is an exciting game that any player is sure to enjoy. Place your bet, get more points than the dealer and win chips. Feel the risk as you dive into the casino atmosphere and hit the big time!

name: BlueLine
summary: A visual narrative experience about a Bangkok millennial, Blue, balancing authenticity and social media pressures in a digital age. Engage in mindful activities, engaging conversations, as well as navigate the tension between authenticity and the need to impress.

name: Blood & Bananas
summary: Enter the world of corporate politics, in this cold war grand strategy, become a monopoly of resources, buy the market, build an army, drop a nuke or hire a spy as you conspire against your peers and leaders. Become the greatest power via trade or war, in blood & bananas

name: Blinky's Adventure
summary: Blinky's Adventure is a pixel platformer about beating up the biggest trouble of the grand year of 20XX, the British. After Blinky's cousin-brother-in-eighth-degree-law, Clemorot, mysteriously goes missing overnight, Blinky has to go across the entirety of Memlia island, connecting with its incredibly strange inhabitants, powering over its stranger gimmicks, and one overarching flower-based infection, all in vain, to find out where the heck he went.

name: Bloodfire
summary: A fast paced, old school arena shooter with satisfying movement and precise gunplay. Fight through endless legions of demons and become the undisputed champion of hell.

name: Block Rush: Mega Obby
summary: Think you’ve got what it takes to conquer the ultimate parkour challenge?

name: Block Bounce
summary: Block Bounce is an endless, obstacle-dodging gauntlet where you’re just a humble block... with dreams of bouncing forever. Too bad the world is out to stop you.

name: Blastforge Breach
summary: In this game, you must defend yourself by firing cannon shots at evil pigs and bats.

name: Block Granny Horror
summary: Survive on the island and protect your family. Granny comes to hurt your wife or child. Craft weapons (bow, club, arrows) and fight Collect the food and feed your family.

name: Bleeding Metal Rainbow
summary: Focus! Your battle will be short and sweet! Dodge and take your aim precisely. Spraying bullets all over the place gets you nowhere! How fast can you defeat the boss enemy?

name: Blokes on Blocks!
summary: BLOKES on BLOCKS is a casual party game where you push your friends around. With simple controls this game is easy to pick up and play, suitable for everyone. Your actions happen just by moving around. Timing is everything so predict your blokes' next moves and knock them off their blocks!

name: Blind No.8 Chick Shoot
summary: This is a pinball game to recall your childhood. Here, you may find the feeling of squatting in the corner when you were young and playing pinball. Of course, perhaps you will also be as young as when you were a child, so abused by your partners that you can't find the north.

name: Blast Head
summary: Blast Head is a fast-paced action roguelite/bullet heaven with absurd weapons, powerful runes, and non-linear weapon skill trees. Dive into 10–30 minute runs, discover wild synergies, and unleash chaos across alien arenas.

name: Blop
summary: Explore a mysterious dungeon, brew potions and solve puzzles to help the blop find the way out!

name: Blitz Smash Ultimate
summary: This game rolls roguelite and run and gunner into a tight experience with 1-4 couch co-op. Combine bullet powers found on the field to create unique bullet types. Dash to avoid attacks but also to crash enemies or deflect bullets.

name: Blackjack Simple
summary: A single player simple blackjack game with standard rules. The player plays against a computer (dealer). The game contains customizable card themes as well as unlocks and rewards such as color changes to the tables and menus. Standard blackjack rules, and can be played with 1-10 decks at a time.

name: Blind Man's Sun
summary: A short visual novel with graphics inspired by “milk-like” horror and a storyline straight out of 2000s comics. You play as a blind man who made a deal with a strange ghost. For those who don’t like pixels, an alternative visual style is also available.

name: Blightseed
summary: A space roguelike, where you fight waves and decipher the language of your enemies. Take breaks between fast action sequences, to translate the attacks and buffs you collected. The more you understand the easier it will be to find the winning synergies to defeat your foes.

name: Black 9
summary: Black 9 is a third person shooter that takes place in the year 2080 where Earth is full of crime, chaos, and despair. The Illuminati, the most powerful of the cartels, have decided to assert their dominance by eliminating the competition. Now all nine members of the Illuminati are plotting against each other, all secretly hoping they will emerge victorious to rule over what's left of the planet. You are their only hope but you have no loyalty or do you?

name: Blood West: Endless West
summary: Endless West brings a long awaited endless randomizer mode to Blood West! See how long you can survive as you meet familiar friends and old foes in the never ending weird wild west!

name: Bladepink
summary: A dark game in a medieval setting where you play as a wounded hero trying to survive in a world invaded by the undead.

name: Blind and Stumbling
summary: A bright-pink adventure through over-the-counter delirant abuse.

name: Blind Memory
summary: Dive into a haunting mystery where you wake up half-blind and amnesiac, trapped in a time-looping nightmare. Uncover the truth through shifting 3D and 2D perspectives, where every revelation twists reality further.

name: Blackhill Keep: Heir of the Night
summary: Explore the cursed Blackhill Keep in this survival horror immersive sim. Solve environmental puzzles, fight or flee dangerous creatures, manage dwindling resources, and survive in this labyrinth of gothic horror.

name: Black Cat Book Club
summary: A magical library you can place on your desktop. Help the black cat study ancient tomes and learn spells in this cozy idle game.

name: Blade Blazer
summary: This is a Chinese Xianxia JRPG, you are a swordsman who fights with a mythical Sword. You will adventure In Swirl-Wind City, where humans and monsters coexist post a celestial triumph over demons. Your quest: locate the Five Elements Soul Stones to vanquish demons and defend the city.

name: Blood for the Throne
summary: Blood for the Throne is a tactical war strategy game with auto-battler combat and RPG progression. Command your general and army across a medieval world, equipping troops, managing resources, and battling rivals, monsters, and kingdoms to claim the throne.

name: B-Line
summary: B-Line is a short knowledge-based walking simulator game. Explore different worlds and discover how to get out of the station.

name: Block Puzzle Sudoku
summary:
Classic block puzzle game with a TWIST! A wood puzzle meets a sudoku grid. Step into a peaceful wooded setting where you’ll embark on a relaxing and brain-teasing journey through a variety of wooden puzzles. It’s a calm way to challenge your brain and keep your mind sharp.

Solve puzzles in this engaging and addictive game! Place blocks in the 9×9 board and fill rows, columns, or squares to clear them from the game. Play for as long as you can without running out of space to beat your highest score!

name: Blood Crucible
summary: A no-turns deck builder roguelike game. Time your ability and combo enemies while you frantically play cards. Explore hexes to power up with stats, xp-gaining-cards, and artifacts. Get bloody through this stylized crucible.

name: Blunderworld
summary: Blunderworld is a roguelike where you shoot a disc around a board to take over Hell. Create chaotic combinations of upgrades, rack up devilish multipliers, and meet the Lords of Sin as you attempt to overthrow Hell itself!

name: Black Cat Brawl
summary: Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends that you truly are better at gambling than them? Here's your chance! Black Cat Brawl has you going up against 7 of your friends in a team-based slamfest!

name: Block Sky Rise
summary: Welcome to Block Sky Rise – a relaxing yet engaging game where you’ll build towers while considering physics and gravity! Simple mechanics, an exciting process, and a variety of game modes for those who want to unwind and enjoy construction.

name: Blood: Refreshed Supply
summary: Things are about to get… bloody! Soak up 42 pulse-pounding levels dripping with Lovecraftian atmosphere as you battle your way through armies of sycophantic cultists, zombies, gargoyles, hell hounds, and other insatiable horrors, in your quest to defeat the loathsome Tchernobog.

name: Blablublas Battle Royale Shooter
summary: Cats are armed. You are warned!

name: Bloodlust.exe
summary: You need to stake the vampire that bit you. Hunt down your enemy, kiss them maybe, and fall in hate (& love) in our dark romance Vampire Hunter x Vampire dating chatsim. Customise your Hunter, descend into a gothic urban dystopia, and dance with the devil with our 3 dangerous love interests...

name: Black Idea
summary: Black idea is a multiplayer and single player psychological horror game

name: Blossom
summary: Terraform a dead planet back to life in this open world survival crafting game. Explore ruins, gather resources, print machines, drive modular vehicles, grow forests, biomes, and ecosystems and create life and make it thrive with your own hands.

name: Black Orchestra: Worldfront 37-54
summary: Black Orchestra: Worldfront 37–54 is a total conversion mod for Rising Storm 2: Vietnam. It re-creates Red Orchestra 2 and Rising Storm, including Heroes of the West. The mod also includes the North African campaign and plans to bring completely new theatres to the series.

name: Black & White
summary: "Black & White" is a dystopian visual novel + war chess game: black and white, sensibility and reason, freedom and order: follow your beliefs and join your camp.

name: Blasteroids
summary: Blast your way through waves of space debris in order to reach what is waiting for you on the other side. Find your fighting style with multiple unlockable ships in this fast paced space adventure!

name: Blackwood
summary: By day, you run a DVD store in 2012 New York. By night, you’re a ruthless assassin. BLACKWOOD is a cinematic third-person shooter with grounded melee combat, brutal takedowns, responsive gunplay, and a double life to manage.

name: Bleakmoor House
summary: Bleakmoor House is a psychological horror game where you navigate a shifting maze of dark rooms, solve puzzles, and uncover the mansion's secrets. Face terrifying encounters and unravel the twisted history to survive the deadly traps within.

name: Black Jacket
summary: The blackjack-inspired rogue-lite deck builder where you gamble your way out of hell, supercharge your deck and play impossible combos.

name: Blooms of April
summary: Blooms of April is an experimental narrative game where poetry unfolds as you pluck petals from a sunflower. Each gesture reveals shifting fragments of verse, creating a contemplative, ever-changing poem through play

name: Blood Invasion
summary: Ugh, all these humans are running around your castle, time to show them who’s in charge and make them fear you!

name: Blade Tempest
summary: Blade Tempestis a 3D action Roguelike — tear through the cycle in an eternal storm, and carve your endless saga of slaughter with raging blades!

name: BlastMorph: Pinball
summary: A free pinball game for both Windows and Xbox. You start with one board with four more to unlock by doing various objectives. Also features over 10 ball multiball and plenty of minigames per board.

name: Blast Bebop
summary: Blast Bebop is an easy-to-pick-up action-incremental game, combining dodging, shooting, collecting, and upgrades, set to retro pixel visuals and psychedelic music for a short, relaxing combat experience.

name: Blazing War World
summary: 3D Apocalypse Level-Based Action Game. Players navigate radiation-ruined areas, using walking, jumping, shooting, exclusive ultimate skills to fight mutated zombies, wasteland thugs, agile creatures, elites. Core goals: defeat bosses or finish tasks to advance, with classic level challenges.

name: Blitloop
summary: A fast-paced, side-scrolling retro shooter where you play as “Blit" on a mission to rescue orb pods. Blast enemy swarms and face off against bosses in this bullet-hell shoot 'em up. Earn power-ups and get ready for fluid arcade action in a stylish world with an 80s synthwave soundtrack.

name: Blackjack Wars
summary: A fast-paced, dynamic, and extraordinary blackjack experience set on dark-themed tables, blended with epic hero battles! With fate decided by coin tosses, four-round short matches, special abilities and diverse table combinations, prepare for breathless battles where wit and luck collide.

name: Blackwood Division
summary: Fight supernatural creatures with your forces in this fast paced Roguelike RTS game!

name: Bloodville
summary: BLOODVILLE is a retro FPS game where you play as Cane, a retired hitman dragged back into killing - and slowly losing his mind.

name: Blaster Force 3000
summary: A nostalgic first-person shooter full of action

name: BL Werewolf:Doki-Doki Summer vacation
summary: A werewolf game based on BL manga! Split into the straight camp and the lewd camp and protect your chastity!

name: Bleeping Spaceships
summary: A fast-paced bullet-hell where your room becomes the battlefield!

name: Bloodplague Lockdown
summary: In this third person action adventure inspired by classic survival horror games, you will play the role of an FBI agent and travel to a secret research base that has been sealed off for many years to investigate the source of the virus.

name: Bloodthirsty Sword
summary: Bloodthirsty Sword is a top-down fantasy action-adventure game where you will fight non-stop in order to survive, thus embarking on an adventure full of excitement and thrills

name: Blood Moon Massacre
summary: Build a fortress, set traps, and blast your way through hordes of bloodthirsty creatures. Blood Moon Massacre is a fast-paced horde shooter featuring customizable builds and chaotic monster-slaying mayhem. Can you survive the night?

name: Blazing Maidens
summary: In this pixel action shooting game inspired by the classic gameplay of Vampire Survivors.

name: Black Mesa: Route to Evacuation - Part 1
summary: Route to Evacuation is a story based singleplayer mod. You'll get to take the role of Howard Nevill, a scientist who works in the analytical laboratories at Sector C. A distinguished individual with a scientific degree will go through the horrors of the Black Mesa Incident in a desperate attempt to survive. As you are a regular scientist, this will be harder than usual.

name: Black Border II
summary: Black Border 2: Night Shift is an intense border patrol simulator where you inspect documents and use special tools to detect forgeries and stop smugglers after dark.

name: Blightveil
summary: Blightveil is an Action-MOBA with WASD movement and non-targeting combat. Enter a brutal world where the genre takes a fresh twist. Battle in arenas where two teams of four clash for one goal: destroy the enemy relic and become champions.

name: Blackout Tonight
summary: A side-scrolling puzzle adventure where a power outage hits an apartment building during a stormy night. Play as an amateur detective, visit diverse residents, uncover secrets, solve puzzles, and restore power before midnight... Stop rummaging through those useless trash cans!

name: Bluey's Quest for the Gold Pen
Blossoming Ruins
summary: Reclaim your land in this cozy idle kingdom simulator that quietly grows at the bottom of your screen as you go about your day. With 'The Great War' behind you, lead your villagers into an era of peace and prosperity, cultivating crops and rebuilding from the ruins.

name: Blightfell
summary: Choose your house, build a unique deck, and summon powerful minions to claim victory in Blightfell, a card-battler full of tight decision-making and strategic depth.

name: Blues Brothers 2025
summary: Blues Brothers 2025 is a 23 map megawad by Ravendesk and General Roasterock that takes you on a calcium-rich journey down the deepest depths of a collapsing society and below. Explore a bustling Escher civilization that hides a world under its skin, discover the balance of this slice of life and reach the full potential of chaos and carnage therein.

name: Blackjack Ascension
summary: Blackjack Ascension is a classic blackjack game where you have access to an upgrade tree to get various upgrades.

name: Black & White
summary:
Black & White is a critically acclaimed strategy game designed by Peter Molyneux and developed by his then-new company, Lionhead Studios. Though released on PC, a port was planned for the Sega Dreamcast, but was canceled (along with a port to the PlayStation). It is assumed that had it been released, publishing would have been handled by Sega.

Unlike many canceled Dreamcast games, Black & White was heavily advertised, appearing at E3 2000 and as a video in Dream On Collection 4. A number of screenshots of the Dreamcast version were distributed by Sega Europe around this period, which suggest that the game would have taken a slight graphical hit if released on the system.

According to Peter Molyneux, the Dreamcast would have been VMU support, where players could upload their creatures and have them fight others. It would have also featured online multiplayer.

Black & White was originally due to appear in late 2000 before being pushed back to "the first half" of 2001. It missed this deadline and did not appear at E3 2001, with rumours stating that Sega had scrapped the project following their decision to leave the hardware business. The PC version was released in March 2001.

name: Blue Balls
summary: 2D Action Adventure

name: Blood High!
summary: A vampire cursed to live with head and body separated. Shoot blood as ammo, execute enemies with your flying head, and survive. Overflow your HP to unleash Blood High Mode! Dive into hardcore, over-the-top boomer shooter action soaked in blood.

name: Blank Light
summary: ――いつの間にか、思い出せなくなった夢。 そんなものは、元から無かったようなものだろうか？「ブランクライト」は、記憶喪失になった売れない作家の青年が、夢の世界を旅しながら、失ったものを取り戻すアドベンチャーゲームです。

name: Blade.exe
summary: System rebooting… File executed: BLADE.EXE Welcome to the arena. Here, every mistake results in death. Random power-ups, endless waves of enemies, and deadly boss battles. Every choice is a risk, every level is a reward. BLADE.EXE – survive, grow stronger, own the leaderboard.

name: Blooming Cards
summary: Grow plants, craft new cards, and manage your dream flower shop. Stack cards to discover new seeds, serve charming customers, and uncover your own story through heartfelt conversations and dialogue choices. Grow your shop, your garden, and yourself one stack at a time.

name: Black Screen
summary: Trade to make your fortune in this lo-fi, laid back space adventure, where you'll get help from anthropomorphic animals, gear up your ship, and search for the mythical key to immortality hidden in the depths of space.

name: Blaster Master SNES Port
summary: A straight port of Blaster Master (NES) for the SNES.

name: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect X
summary: In BlazBlue Entropy Effect X, you’ll face off against surging hordes across ever-shifting dimensions in an action-focused roguelike platform adventure. The Sea of Possibility is envisioned as a descent through multiple levels, each filled with threats you’ll need to suppress while harvesting Shards of Possibility. Along the way, you’ll uncover a completely new, original story that expands the BlazBlue Entropy Effect X universe in unexpected ways. Read the swarm, weave through danger, and strike back with combos and strings that never let up.

name: Black Castle
summary: BLACK CASTLE is a dark fantasy adventure set in the depths of the Black Forest. Explore the castle, solve grid-based puzzles, meet ghostly inhabitants and unveil its secrets. Can you vanquish the Dark Lord and rescue your sister?

name: Blind Spot
summary: Multiplayer co-op, survival horror game. Play with your friends as you monitor and secure a residental house that is haunted by an entity. Use cameras to keep sight on the family, you must stop them from escaping, watch your back and try to survive!

name: Black Pellet
summary: An epic western tale about a man and his dog travelling through a postapocalyptic world in a claymation style. Open world third person shooter.

name: BlueBirdRP
summary:
BlueBirdRP is a multiplayer role-playing experience built for Grand Theft Auto V using the FiveM framework. Set in a fictionalised version of Melbourne, Australia, it focuses on long-term character stories, community-driven roleplay and a persistent online world.

Players can take on civilian, emergency services or criminal roles, including careers such as police, ambulance, fire and transport, or running player-owned businesses like cafés, mechanics, nightclubs and retail stores. A custom economy, progression systems and server-wide events support both everyday life roleplay and larger story arcs.

BlueBirdRP requires a PC copy of Grand Theft Auto V and the FiveM client to play. It is an online-only experience hosted on community-run dedicated servers and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.

name: Blue Swift Wind
summary: A vibrant arcade plane racer! Battle with power-ups across 12 stylized tracks, from serene to chaotic scenic routes. Use power-ups and master drifting in dynamic weather to become the swiftest pilot in this stylized, anime-inspired world, With more free tracks arriving in future updates.

name: Bladefall
summary: BladeFall is a fast-paced hack-and-slash game featuring fluid melee combat, 2.5D movement, and challenging battles against varied enemies and powerful bosses. Master timing and skill-based attacks as you fight through an evolving system built to test your abilities.

name: BlazBlue Entropy Effect X: Deluxe Edition
Blast Racer
summary: "BLAST RACER" is an arcade-style bullet hell game. You’re humanity’s last hope. Drive an upgradable, transformable battle race car. Blaze through deadly tracks, dodge waves of bullets, and save the world in flames!

name: Blind Box
summary: Collect blind boxes and unbox them to get cute figurines! Display them in your home and passively earn fame to unlock new decorations! Show off your collection to your friends and unwind!

name: Black Blood
summary: Escape a quarantined hospital haunted by a dark entity. A short but gripping horror experience blending puzzles, action, and cinematic QTEs that will test your courage.

name: Black Geyser: Couriers of Darkness - Tales of the Moon Cult
summary: The Cult of the Night Goddess is on the move, and only you have a chance to stop them. Embark on a thrilling journey through lethal caverns and cannibal-infested lands to uncover their dark secret - and bring the truth to light!

name: Blobbymite: Hero of Power
summary: Experience the complete adventure of Blobbymite: Hero of Power with a full campaign, powerful level editor, online leaderboards, and expanding story content that reveals the dark past of the Rebelord Pirates. Online accounts can be made to save progress and acess online features!

name: Blade & Sword 2: Ancient Legend
summary: This game is an action-adventure RPG game that unfolds around an ancient Chinese mythology. 40 years after the defeat of the Emperor Jo, Chiyou's spirit, which had been suppressed for 3000 years was once causing trouble again.

name: Black Sun
summary: Black Sun is a survival horror RPG game about a world that has fallen into disrepair as a result of alien occupation. There are no more government and law enforcement agencies. Humans are looking for any opportunity to live one day longer, while aliens pursue their mysterious goals.

name: Black Spire
summary: Black Spire is an atmospheric FPS set in a ruined post-apocalyptic city. Fog covers the streets, buildings stand empty, and enemies lurk in the shadows. You’ll have to move through dark districts, scavenge for supplies and weapons, and cling to life where death is waiting at every corner.

name: Bleak
summary: Dissatisfaction and frustration are common feelings in life. You face a path where every choice can bring you closer to or further from the improvement you so desire. Difficult decisions require strong wills.

name: Blitz
summary: Blitz is a challenging, fast-paced platformer with infinite procedurally generated levels. Build a new unique character each run and fight one action-packed room after another! Dropkick, decapitate, and incinerate your foes. Do you have what it takes to conquer Blitz?

name: Bloodmoon
summary: Slay relentless hordes of monsters, unleash devastating spells, upgrade your equipment, and battle unique bosses in a fast-paced hack-and-slash arcade experience.

name: Blood Drive
summary: Drive, drift, and blast your way through massive hordes of up to 4,000 zombies in this high-octane vehicular survival game. Customize your ride, recruit gunners, and carve a path of destruction through the undead apocalypse.

name: Blockhead
summary: Blockhead is lost. Can you help Blockhead find his way home? Move through 50 challenging levels by getting tokens, avoiding the bullies and getting help from the characters around you. Use keyboard and X Box controller to move and jump through this 2D platform game.

name: BlockGame
summary: 3D fixed top view shooter, a total of three levels, you can choose one of the levels to play, you can't save the game progress, if you die, you need to start over.

name: Bloodpact
summary: Cut down endless demon hordes, unlock new abilities as you level and grow stronger by forging bloodpacts with archdemons.

name: Bloom
summary: Bloom is a short point-and-click narrative puzzle game. Step into the role of a housewife haunted by the terrifying Root-Man. Search for keys, unlock doors, and fight to escape. Will you wake from the nightmare, or remain trapped forever?

name: Blue Flow
summary: Follow our blue hero through a challenging 2D platformer filled with precision jumps, fast-paced shooting, and clever puzzles. Each pixel-art level rewards skill, timing, and persistence. Overcome tricky obstacles and uncover new mechanics as the journey unfolds.

name: Blue
summary: You play Blue, a simple cube lost in a world he hasn't visited in a long time. Help him move forward despite the difficulties.

name: Blackjack Roulette
summary: Blackjack rogue-like with a Roulette "spin". Purchase Insurance Policies with unique abilities give you the edge while taking on a larger Roulette wheels with even larger Buy-In Costs.

name: Blood Mall: Part II
summary: Blood Mall: Part II is a retro-style dinosaur horror game that picks up exactly where Blood Mall left off. Are you prepared to put an end to the Hastovenator Crisis, or have you bitten off more than you can chew?

name: Blades or Bets
summary:
Blades or Bets is a unique dark fantasy RPG blending strategic first-person turn-based combat with HnS-style loot and a gambling system that can make or break the game!

You play as a squire thrust into a dark conspiracy after your caravan is ambushed. It's up to you to rebuild the broken village of Corvarg and face the challenges ahead.

name: Bloodsmith
summary: A fierce, action-packed narrative RPG; Play as Quentin Ashborne, the archaeologist whose duty has brought him to fight tooth and nail against the damned souls. If you are to survive, you must learn to manage & manipulate blood. Ride the downward spiral.

name: Bloodspill
summary: Bloodspill is a fast-paced, PvP, retro fps with one hit combat, featuring classic gamemodes like deathmatch, capture the flag and conquest!

name: Blurry Shopping
summary: Did you think going to the supermarket was easy? Ha! Welcome to Blurry Shopping, the ultimate simulator of getting lost between endless aisles, fluorescent lights, and products that all look the same… because they literally are, at least for you.

name: Block ‘Em Sock ‘Em
summary: Your goal in Block'Em Sock'Em is to control John Hancock through 25 different levels to destroy boxes of the same color. Your aim is to get the block counter below the goal number with a limited number of tosses. If you toss a colored block and it hits another color, then your block will change to that color. There are three difficulty settings.

name: Black Sailors
summary: Command a fleet of formerly enslaved people who became pirates in Brazil’s Bay of All Saints. Challenge colonial oppression, fight for freedom, and rewrite Atlantic history in turn-based tactical naval battles.

name: Bloons TD 6: Frontier Legends
summary: Become the new Sheriff, explore the new world, and deal with the notorious Bloon Gangs in Frontier Legends.

name: Blackthorne's Manor
summary: Blackthorne's Manor is a first-person mystery thriller, where logic, puzzles, and the supernatural collide. Search for your missing friend, uncover the secrets of Blackthorne Manor, and escape before the house claims you too.

name: Bluey: Bust-a-Move
summary: Jump, dance, cook, and laugh alongside Bluey and her family.

name: Black Hole: Farmageddon
summary: Grow your ever-growing black hole as you chase panicked animals across levels with janky physics. Catch them, stack incremental upgrades, and dive into fast runs that always tempt ‘just one more’.

name: BlitzRift
summary: BlitzRift is a fast-paced, 2D 360 degree multiplayer battle royale game. Engage in 60-second PvP rounds, navigate dynamic arenas with traps and hazards, and use diverse weapons to outsmart opponents. Customize your character, team up with friends, and dominate the Rift.

name: Blade Trick
summary: Utilize the memories of defeated foes in turn-based combat. Fantasy RPG/Adventure.

name: Blood for the Queen
summary: A card-based roguelike and auto-battler where your fighters are meant to die. Their blood is a precious resource, while their lives are worthless. Command deadly battles, collect the bloody tribute, and quench your Queen's thirst.

name: Blindfold
summary: Blindfold is an asymmetric co-op game: one player is a blindfolded prisoner, the other a guide with a map and bodycam. Work together to escape, avoiding guards, traps, and creatures. Each level adds new hazards and dynamic weather. Communication is key.

name: Blackjack Descent
summary: You're locked in a room where your only chance of survival is to play blackjack against a sinister dealer. Every hand isn't just a gamble, it's a deal with fate. Fail to repay your debt on time, and you'll fall into darkness... or something far worse.

name: Blitz Strasse
summary: Japan-exclusive Mideval warfare strategy/simulation game for Windows 95, developed by Artdink. Released in 1996.

name: Blindfold Chess
summary: Blindfold Chess is a minimalist strategy game where you play chess entirely from memory. Practice with blindfold exercises, improve your visualization, and battle Stockfish AI or online players without ever seeing the board.

name: Blood Red Rebirth
summary: Drive, shoot, and blow up your way through an East Bloc hellhole with a beaten-up sedan, an AKM and a post-punk soundtrack. Your mission is to steal three nuclear missiles – and so is everyone else's.

name: Blossaria
summary: Blossaria is a puzzle-based city builder where you create a growing world on a hex grid. Rotate and place landscape shapes to find the perfect fit. Fulfill village needs, expand your map, and unlock beautiful landmarks. A meditative, relaxing experience at your own pace.

name: Blood Expedition
summary: “Blood Expedition” is a survival horror game set in 1955, centered around the discovery of a massive, unknown organism—dead, alive, or something in between.

name: Black Sector
summary: In 1999, investigative journalist Łukasz uncovers dark secrets in a hidden underground prison in Lower Silesia, Poland. Navigate eerie corridors and face unknown horrors in this atmospheric horror adventure.

name: Blackhole Maker
summary: Blackhole Maker is a simple, casual game. Pour resources into your flask and merge them together to create ever-larger resources. Upgrade your flask to hold even greater masses, and ultimately strive to create a black hole.

name: Blocky Heli Rescue
summary: Take off with your rescue helicopter and search and save the life of the wounded soldiers in the field, often under fire. If you can't, nobody else can!

name: Blossom Sort
summary: Looking for a fun and relaxing brain-teasing logic puzzle game? Welcome to Blossom Sort - Mind-Bending Flowers Logic Puzzle! A flower sort puzzle experience—train your brain with pattern recognition, deduction, and sorting games and sort game patterns. This flower game delivers concise brain teasers that steadily challenge your reasoning using flower sort.

name: Blob Wars
summary: Blob Wars is a turn-based tactics game where efficiency is key. Use each Blob's unique abilities to defeat the enemy army in as few turns as possible, the fewer turns you take, the greater the reward. Traverse a branching world map and carve your own path through this replayable experience.

name: Blue Crow
summary: Help the blue crow reach his goal. Achieve a success that few people achieve.

name: Bloodfall: The First Temple
summary: High-speed physics-based first-person melee combat. A brutal, high-mastery gameplay system with directional attacks and blocks, precise timing, and deliberate control of every move. Enter a forgotten age buried in myth and blood, where gods demand sacrifice in exchange for divine favor.

name: Blood Moon Reckoning
summary:
The Blood Moon Reckoning is a survival RPG that thrusts players into a dangerous and ever-changing world under the shadow of a cursed blood moon. Alone or alongside allies in co-op play, you must fight to survive against harsh environments, mysterious events, and relentless threats that test both skill and strategy.

As you explore this vast and immersive world, every decision matters. Gather resources, build settlements, and shape the rise of powerful civilizations that can endure or fall with the coming reckoning. The world is alive, filled with secrets, challenges, and moments of wonder that reward exploration and courage.

Still in development, The Blood Moon Reckoning aims to deliver an eventful, exciting, and deeply engaging survival experience where players carve their own legacy beneath the blood-red sky.

name: Blind Box Shop Simulator
summary: Open your own blind box store in the anime city of Akihabara. Stock the shelves with the latest blind boxes, or unbox them to collect rare hidden editions. Create a trendy blind box shop that attracts customers and expands your business.

name: Bloksie (For Now)
summary: Enforce the Internal Revenue Code. Turn Hundreds into Decillions. Praise BirdJesus. The Rouge-Litest Arithmetic 'Em Up.

name: Bloodsaint 2
summary: BLOODSAINT 2 is the most recent, barely playable, fast-paced, retro-hardcore, top-down arena-shooter minigame from Walter Machado.

name: Bluegrass
summary:
A spatial audio ASMR-narrative rhythm life-sim. Laid off, Linda is seeking peace on the Appalachian Trail. Guide her pulse as she unveils her Granny’s old hand-drawn illustrations and makes new memories in this relaxing spatial audio journey to Mt. Katahdin.

Bluegrass is an experiential episodic interactive audio narrative through the soundscape of Appalachia. In a linear adventure to Mt. Katahdin, tune your ears into the relaxing audio cues. Allow yourself to be guided by Linda's inner Conscience as you keep the heart pace steady by regulating her breathwork. Influence Linda's behavior via feedback at critical moments in this interactive theatrical.

name: Block Cascade
summary:
Block Cascade is a puzzle game in which players clear groups of matching blocks to trigger chain reactions and progress through levels. The game features 150 levels with varying layouts, obstacles, and objectives that require planning and strategic use of moves.
Players can use power-ups such as time manipulation, block removal, and block attraction to solve puzzles more efficiently. Gameplay focuses on creating cascades and managing board space to complete each stage and advance through the game’s progression.

name: Black Omens: House of Crimson Silk
summary: Black Omens: House of Crimson Silk is a first-person, single-player, escape room puzzle horror game set in a fictional Edo Japan. Assume the role of Idate Chiyo, a paranormal investigator, tasked with investigating an abandoned mansion and unveiling a family's dark and horrifying secret.

name: Blood Permafrost
summary: Suddenly alone in a snowstorm, a camper is haunted by strange visions. A short, cinematic, mind-bending psychological horror nightmare. Beware the rifleman.

name: Blocks Ahoy!
summary: Gunners, to the ready! Now, blockward ho!

name: Blobular
summary: Blobular is a simulation virtual-pet game. You are tasked with researching these strange Blob creatures. Take care of and mess around with your blobs, how you interact with each individual blob will influence how they grow up by changing their looks, color and personality!
